[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/khri brgyad ka ba bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D10}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya aSh+Ta da sha sA ha sri kA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[1b.2\]]po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi 
[\[1b.3\]]phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur 
[\[1b.4\]]pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_
[\[1b.5\]]srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma gtogs 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]pa ni 'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/grags 'dzin ma dang /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya tsam dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rab tu mang po thams cad kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[2a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa/_mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul pa/_ma brtags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa thob pa/_chags pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa/_
[\[2a.3\]]mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa/_gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa/_tshul 'chos pa med pa/_kha gsag med pa/_shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa'i sems med pa/_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa/_chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[2a.4\]]thob pa/_bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed cing rnam par dbye ba ston pa la mkhas pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/_gsong 
[\[2a.5\]]por smra ba/_bzhin khro gnyer med pa/_pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis brjod pa la mkhas pa/_sems zhum pa med pa spobs pa mi chod pa/_'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/_bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas pas 
[\[2a.6\]]nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang chu zla dang rmi lam dang brag ca dang mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /_mos pa dang phra ba mkhyen pa khong du 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/_sems thogs pa med pa bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa thams cad rnam par bkod pa'i smon lam gyis 'jug pas yongs su zin pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[2b.2\]]grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/_lta ba dang bag la nyal dang /_kun nas dkris pa dang /_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bya ba 
[\[2b.3\]]la mkhas pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba 'bum mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_rin po ches byin dang /_rin chen byin dang /_ded dpon bzang po dang /_
[\[2b.4\]]chu lha'i lha dang /_phug sbas dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_blo gros dam pa dang /_blo gros khyad par can dang /_blo gros 'phel ba dang /_blo gros mtha' yas dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_blo gros sgrib med dang /_shin tu yang dag zhugs dang /_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 
[\[2b.5\]]dang /_brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang /_rtag tu brtson dang /_rtag tu sbyor dang /_brtson pa mi gtong dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_blo gros dpe med dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa 
[\[2b.6\]]dang /_rdo rje blo gros dang /_lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_rtag tu phyag brkyang dang /_snying rje cher sems dang /_bkod pa chen po dang /_bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_lhun po'i rtse mo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa de dag dang /_gzhan yang byang 
[\[2b.7\]]chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig go/_/de nas de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/_skyil mo krung bcas te/_sku drang por bsrang nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste bzhugs so/_/der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud pa dang 'dus pa dang 'ub cing yang dag par gzhol ba ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_lha'i spyan gyis 'jig 
[\[3a.2\]]rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs so/_/rnam par gzigs nas sku thams cad kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/_de'i zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 
[\[3a.3\]]'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/de bzhin du zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang /_byin pa gnyis dang /_pus mo gnyis dang /_brla gnyis dang /_sta zur gnyis dang /_lte ba khung dang /_rtsib logs gnyis dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thugs ka'i 
[\[3a.4\]]dpal be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang /_sku phrag pa gnyis dang /_mgur dang /_tshems mche ba bzhi dang /_
[\[3a.5\]]tshems bzhi bcu dang /_spyan gnyis dang /_snyan gnyis dang /_shangs kyi bu ga gnyis dang /_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang steng gi gtsug tor dang zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung ste/_'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu po de 
[\[3a.6\]]dag thams cad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po des khyab par snang bar byas so/_/de bzhin du lho 
[\[3a.7\]]dang nub dang byang phyogs dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po des khyab par snang bar byas so/_/sems can gang 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]dag gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_gang dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer bkye ste/_spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od 
[\[3b.2\]]zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung nas/_'od zer de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/_de dag gis shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par snang 
[\[3b.3\]]bar byas so/_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des khyab par snang bar byas so/_/sems 
[\[3b.4\]]can gang dag gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_gang dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od gang yin pa'i 'od 
[\[3b.5\]]des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen po des khyab par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho 
[\[3b.6\]]nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen po des khyab par mdzad do/_/sems can gang dag gis 'od de mthong ba dang gang dag 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bla na med 
[\[3b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]de/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/_'od zer de dag thams cad la rin po 
[\[4a.2\]]che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa/_blta na sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_kha dog bzang ba/_dri zhim pa/_'jam pa/_ka tsa li di ka ltar reg na bde ba sha stag kun tu gnas par gyur te/_pad mo 
[\[4a.3\]]de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/_de dag shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/_
[\[4a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[4a.5\]]bye ma snyed dag tu gshegs shing /_de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/sems can gang dag gis chos bstan pa de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi 
[\[4a.6\]]ldog par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas 
[\[4a.7\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]so/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/_'jam pa dang /_snum pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed par gyur to/_/
[\[4b.2\]]de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par gyur/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang med par gyur te/_sems can de 
[\[4b.3\]]dag thams cad mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang 'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/de nas mi 
[\[4b.4\]]de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/
[\[4b.5\]]de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dang /_lho dang nub dang byang dang phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng dang phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer yang /_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_
[\[4b.6\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par gyur/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang med par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad lha dang mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang /_
[\[4b.7\]]mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/_sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong ste phyin nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_thams cad thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can long ba gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis ni/_gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/
[\[5a.2\]]sems can 'on pa rnams ni sgra dag thos par gyur to/_/smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed par gyur to/_/sems rnam par g.yeng ba rnams ni sems rtse gcig par gyur to/_/gcer bu rnams ni gos rnyed par gyur to/_/dbul po rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to/_/bkres pa rnams ni zas 
[\[5a.3\]]rnyed par gyur to/_/skom pa rnams ni btung ba rnyed par gyur to/_/nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad med par gyur to/_/dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po yongs su tshang bar gyur to/_/lus ngal ba rnams ni lus ngal ba med par gyur to/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las 
[\[5a.4\]]kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams ni/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang /_'tsho ba mi dge ba dang bral bar gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la 'di lta ste/_pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang /_phu nu dang sring mo dang mtshungs 
[\[5a.5\]]pa'i sems dang mdza' bshes dang nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam par gyur to/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod la/_gtsang zhing nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/_mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang 
[\[5a.6\]]bral bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad 'byor par gyur te/_dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/_
[\[5a.7\]]'di ltar sbyin pa ni legs pa'o/_/dul ba ni legs pa'o/_/legs par sdom pa ni legs pa'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs pa'o/_/srog chags 'byung po rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni legs pa'o/_/zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/_kye ma sems can 'di dag 'di ltar sbyin pa ni legs pa'o/_/dul ba ni legs pa'o/_/legs par sdom pa ni legs pa'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs pa'o/_/
[\[5b.2\]]srog chags 'byung po rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni legs pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa'i shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du 'di lta ste dper na yongs su 
[\[5b.3\]]dag pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma stobs dang ldan pa dang /_zla ba nya pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du/_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/_khor yug dang bcas pa/_lha'i 
[\[5b.4\]]gnas dang bcas pa/_dbang po bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dbang byed dang bcas pa/_gnas gtsang ma dang bcas pa/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te/_mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du bcom 
[\[5b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag_/'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis zil gyis mnan to/_/lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_
[\[5b.6\]]phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag_/'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis zil gyis mnan te/_mdzes shing /_lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni de las 
[\[5b.7\]]gzhan pa'i ri thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go_/'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go_/'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]'khor ni de las gzhan pa'i snang ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha 
[\[6a.2\]]dang bcas pa/_dbang po dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_gnas gtsang ma dang bcas pa/_lha dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te/_mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[6a.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi lus ci 'dra ba de dang 'thun par sku tha mal pa bstan to/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams nas/_tshangs ris dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang 'phrul 
[\[6a.4\]]dga' dang dga' ldan dang /_'thab bral dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyi bar ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/_de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas/_dga' 
[\[6a.5\]]ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_lha'i me tog dag khyer zhing lha'i me tog phreng dang /_lha'i spos dang /_lha'i byug pa dang /_lha'i phye ma dang /_lha'i bdug pa dang /_lha'i ut+pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_na lin dang /_dri mchog dang /_lha'i me tog 
[\[6a.6\]]klu shing gi me tog dang /_tam la'i lo ma dang /_lha'i gos dang /_lha'i rgyan dang /_lha'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag khyer te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang /_snod 
[\[6a.7\]]du gyur pa'i mi gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas thang las skyes pa dang /_chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnams khyer te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]lha de dag dang mi de dag gis lha'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan de dag dang /_chu las skyes pa dang /_thang las skyes pa'i me tog de dag de bzhin 
[\[6b.2\]]gshegs pa'i sku la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/de nas me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi char dang /_thang las 
[\[6b.3\]]skyes pa dang /_chu las skyes pa'i me tog gang dag bcom ldan 'das la gtor ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[6b.4\]]kyi tshad tsam zhig tu red de gnas par gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha'i me tog dang /_dar gyi lda ldi dag 'phyang /_rab tu 'phyang /_mngon par rab tu 'phyang ste/_me tog gi lda ldi dang /_dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis kyang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[6b.5\]]rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu phyogs bcur 'phros pa des kyang phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag khyab par snang bar gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[6b.6\]]khams 'di na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang mi de dag so so nas 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/de bzhin du nub kyi ba glang spyod dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_
[\[6b.7\]]byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang /_mi de dag thams cad 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du yang 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'dzum pa'i snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[7a.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gsal bar gyur te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[7a.3\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag mthong bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/_dge 
[\[7a.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyis lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og 
[\[7a.5\]]dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de 
[\[7a.6\]]dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[7a.7\]]khams rin chen can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]nyid ston to/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer zhes bya ba 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[7b.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di dang /_dog sa cher g.yos pa 'di dang /_
[\[7b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[7b.4\]]rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston 
[\[7b.5\]]te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas la byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_
[\[7b.6\]]phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag blta ba'i 
[\[7b.7\]]slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer la pad ma rin po 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la pad ma 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du spyod cig_/
[\[8a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas las/_rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad 
[\[8a.3\]]ma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang /_bu mo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_
[\[8a.4\]]shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad la/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis 
[\[8a.5\]]bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der phyin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas/_phyin 
[\[8a.6\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[8a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/_
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis pad ma 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad ma de dag bzhes nas/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[8b.2\]]snyed po de dag ga la ba de logs su gtor to/_/pad ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag khyab par gyur te/_pad ma de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sku dag bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos 
[\[8b.3\]]ston to/_/sems can gang dag gis chos de thos pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba de dag dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i 
[\[8b.4\]]rtsa ba de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha 
[\[8b.5\]]rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[8b.6\]]dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[8b.7\]]sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/byang phyogs na 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal 
[\[9a.2\]]bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/_'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[9a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas phyogs 
[\[9a.4\]]gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma mchog gi dpal 
[\[9a.5\]]zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad ma zhes bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na/_'jig 
[\[9a.6\]]rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgron ma mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[9a.7\]]dpa' chen po nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na/_'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/'og gi 
[\[9b.2\]]phyogs na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma mchog ces 
[\[9b.3\]]bya ba 'dug pas zhes bya ba nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/de nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[9b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_
[\[9b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 
[\[9b.6\]]'jig rten du byung ba 'di dang /_dog sa cher g.yos pa 'di dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems 
[\[9b.7\]]dpa' dga' bas byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal la/_byang chub sems 
[\[10a.2\]]dpa' dga' bas byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal cher gzhon nur 
[\[10a.3\]]gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab 
[\[10a.4\]]par shes na khyod song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la pad ma rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin 
[\[10a.5\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la pad ma 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas 
[\[10a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal las rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang /_bu 
[\[10a.7\]]mo bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_steng gi phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]la/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas nas/_byang chub sems 
[\[10b.2\]]dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der phyin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs 
[\[10b.3\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol 
[\[10b.4\]]te/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i dpal gyis pad ma 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la bskur ro/_/
[\[10b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/_pad ma de dag bzhes nas/_steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ga la ba de logs su gtor to/_/pad ma de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag khyab 
[\[10b.6\]]par gyur te/_pad ma de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sku dag bzhugs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/sems can gang dag gis chos de thos pa de dag kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[10b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba de dag dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bsti stang du byas/_bla 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur te/_me tog sil ma sna tshogs 
[\[11a.2\]]kyis gang ba dang /_dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pa dang /_pog phor nas bdug pa dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa rgyan dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs kyis yal ga'i rtse mo g.yur za ba dag dang /_me tog gi shing ljon pa dag dang /_'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang /_
[\[11a.3\]]spos kyi shing ljon pa dag dang /_me tog phreng gi shing ljon pa dag dang /_phye ma'i shing ljon pa dag gis mdzes par byas par gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa dang /_
[\[11a.4\]]lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid che ba/_gzi brjid che ba gzhan dag kyang gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can bzhin du gyur to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_gleng gzhi'i le'u 
[\[11a.5\]]zhes bya ste dang po'o//_//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/_lha dang mir bcas pa 'dus pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[11a.6\]]dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[11a.7\]]thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'tshal bas/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang 
[\[11b.2\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas pa med pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sbyin par bya ba dang /_sbyin pa po dang /_len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_
[\[11b.3\]]yongs su gtang ba med pa'i tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang /_lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/'khrugs pa med pa'i phyir/_
[\[11b.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma gtang ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/ro myang ba med pa'i phyir/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/
[\[11b.5\]]chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[11b.6\]]pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting 
[\[11b.7\]]nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]par 'jug pa dgu dang /_'du shes dgu bsgom par bya'o/_/dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_phyed du chad pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos 
[\[12a.2\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong gi 'du shes dang /_rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes te/_de dag ni 'du shes dgu'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su 
[\[12a.3\]]dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa bsgom 
[\[12a.4\]]par bya'o/_/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang /_'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten thams cad la yid mi rton 
[\[12a.5\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_yongs su 'dris 
[\[12a.6\]]pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa dang /_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /_kun 
[\[12a.7\]]shes pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /_zad par gyi skye mched dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /_rnam par dgod pa bzhi dang /_sa bcu dang spyod pa bcu dang /_bzod pa bcu dang /_lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]pa nyi shu dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong shes pa dang /_rig pa gsum dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_yang 
[\[12b.2\]]dag par sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos drug dang /_nor bdun dang /_skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad dang /_sems can gyi gnas dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[12b.3\]]snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs 
[\[12b.4\]]par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/byang 
[\[12b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag chags dang /_mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_
[\[12b.6\]]de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'dod pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /_phyir mi ldog 
[\[12b.7\]]pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang rnam par g.yo ba shes par 'dod pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thob par 'dod pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan 
[\[13a.2\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[13a.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[13a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pas/_shes 
[\[13a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ched du sbyin pa chung ngu byin yang thabs mkhas pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos pas/_tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar 'dod pas shes 
[\[13a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims chung ngu srung /_bzod pa chung ngu sgom/_brtson 'grus chung ngu rtsom/_bsam gtan chung ngu la snyoms par 'jug_/shes 
[\[13a.7\]]rab chung ngu sgom yang /_thabs mkhas pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas/_de dag grangs med/_tshad med par 'gyur bar byed 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[13b.2\]]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[13b.3\]]bslab par bya'o/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye 
[\[13b.4\]]bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i sa gnon par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab 
[\[13b.5\]]par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_
[\[13b.6\]]ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bdag la 'byor par 'dod pa des/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[13b.7\]]spos dang /_gos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_khang khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_rgyan dang /_rin po che dang /_nor bu dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]shel dang /_byi ru dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_rgyal srid la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pa des/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[14a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[14a.3\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 
[\[14a.4\]]bskyed pa gcig kyang byang chub kyi snying po la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi zad par byed par 'dod pa des/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu dag na/_sangs 
[\[14a.5\]]rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag bdag gi bsngags pa rjod par 'dod pa des/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[14a.6\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig gis lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_
[\[14a.7\]]nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sgra gcig gis go bar byed par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[14b.2\]]dag sgra gcig gis go bar byed par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi 
[\[14b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa 
[\[14b.4\]]nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang 
[\[14b.5\]]bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas/_shes rab 
[\[14b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[14b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed yod pa de dag shes par 'dod pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang /_'bab chu 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang /_khron pa dang /_'bab chu'i dngo'i chu'i rdul phra rab rnams shes par 'dod pa dang /_me'i rdul phra rab rnams shes par 'dod pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rlung gi rdul phra rab 
[\[15a.2\]]rnams shes par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_bsregs pa'i bskal pa'i me 'bar ba kha'i dbugs gcig 
[\[15a.3\]]gis zhi bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'khrug pa chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor byung ste/_rlung gi dkyil na/_gang ri rab dang ri rab 
[\[15a.4\]]chen po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po nas bzung ste/_ri thams cad dang /_sa chen po thams cad g.yo bar byed pa dang /_rnam par 'thor bar byed pa dang /_rmeg med par byed pa'i rnam par 'khrug par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de sor mo gcig gi rtse 
[\[15a.5\]]mos gzhil bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_ri rab dang /_ri rab chen po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor 
[\[15a.6\]]yug chen po la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag skra nyag ma gcig gis sbams te/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med par 'phang ngo snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[15a.7\]]dpa' chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de thams cad skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par dgang bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams bsod snyoms gcig gis khyed par bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[15b.2\]]du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi sprin rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsti stang du 
[\[15b.3\]]bya bar 'dod pa dang /_bla mar bya bar 'dod pa dang /_ri mor bya bar 'dod pa dang /_mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang 
[\[15b.4\]]shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams bsod snyoms gcig gis 
[\[15b.5\]]khyed par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi sprin rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[15b.6\]]rgyas de dag la bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_bla mar bya bar 'dod pa dang /_ri mor bya bar 'dod pa dang /_mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong 
[\[15b.7\]]pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_ting 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phying 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir 
[\[16a.2\]]mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /_
[\[16a.3\]]nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[16a.4\]]dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/_'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA 
[\[16a.5\]]la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_
[\[16a.6\]]'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/_bsam gtan dang po thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[16a.7\]]gsum pa thob par 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/_bsam gtan bzhi pa thob par 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/_'du shes med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug par thob par 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/_sbyin pa 'di 
[\[16b.2\]]ltar byin na ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur bar shes so/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[16b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[16b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[16b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa ji ltar stsal na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa ji ltar stsal na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[16b.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu sbyin par bya ba dang /_
[\[16b.7\]]gtong ba po dang /_len pa po mi dmigs te/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/_ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang /_lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/_sems 'khrug 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]pa med pa'i phyir/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/_lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_kun tu rtog pa med 
[\[17a.2\]]pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin/_chos thams cad rab tu shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[17a.3\]]chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no/_/de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[17a.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[17a.5\]]'das 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thob par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi 
[\[17a.6\]]chos rnams kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid khong du chud par 'dod 
[\[17a.7\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings skye ba med pa'i mthar phyin par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sngon du 'gro bar 'dod pas/_
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[17b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nang gi 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang /_
[\[17b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thob par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[17b.4\]]shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ser sna'i sems tshar gcad par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems mi bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_gnod sems kyi sems 
[\[17b.5\]]mi bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_le lo'i sems dor bar 'dod pa dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dor bar 'dod pa dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems dor bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[17b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba dang /_zhal ta bya ba dang ldan pa dang /_rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i 
[\[17b.7\]]dngos po la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga bskyed par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ste/_sha'i mig dang /_lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mig ste/_de dag bskyed par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[18a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho 
[\[18a.3\]]dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lha'i mig gis blta bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[18a.4\]]dag chos gang ston pa'i chos de lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyis khong du chud par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[18a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na chos ston pa de thams cad thos nas dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa gcad du mi chod pas yang dag par gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[18a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du thams cad chud mi za bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das 
[\[18a.7\]]pa dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams blta bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams blta bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_
[\[18b.2\]]lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_gtan 
[\[18b.3\]]la bab par bstan pa'i sde gang ci bstan pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma thos pa gang yin pa de thams cad kun chub par byed par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[18b.4\]]dpa' chen po shar phyogs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang ci gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_klag par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod 
[\[18b.5\]]pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas 
[\[18b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang ci gsungs pa dang /_gsung ba dang /_gsung bar 'gyur ba de thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'dod pa dang /_gzung bar 'dod pa dang /_bcang bar 'dod pa dang /_klag par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod pa dang /_
[\[18b.7\]]gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]nag tu gyur pa gang na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od mi 'bab pa de dag thams cad snang bar bya bar 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig 
[\[19a.2\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa gang na nyi ma dang /_zla ba'i 'od kyang mi 'bab pa de dag thams cad 'od kyis snang bar bya bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[19a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrogs 
[\[19a.4\]]par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_
[\[19a.5\]]nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_gang na sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sgra mi grag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can rnams kyis sangs 
[\[19a.6\]]rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar 
[\[19a.7\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gcer bu rnams gos dag rnyed pa dang /_sems can bkres pa rnams 'grangs pa dang /_skom pa rnams skom ngoms pa dang /_sems can ngan song na gnas pa rnams ngan song 
[\[19b.2\]]thams cad las thar te/_mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[19b.3\]]ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /_bden pa ma mthong ba rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa 
[\[19b.4\]]nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o snyam pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_
[\[19b.5\]]nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur bar 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[19b.6\]]bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_smyon pa rnams dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gcer bu rnams gos dag rnyed pa dang /_sems can bkres pa rnams 'grangs pa dang /_skom pa rnams skom ngoms pa dang /_sems 
[\[19b.7\]]can ngan song na gnas pa rnams ngan song thams cad las thar te/_mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /_bden pa ma mthong ba rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o snyam pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[20a.2\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya'o snyam pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[20a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam la slob par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar 
[\[20a.4\]]brtag par bya ste/_nam zhig na bdag gis glang po che'i lta stangs kyis blta bar bya snyam pa dang /_ji ltar na bdag sa chen po la rkang pa sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg par 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan 
[\[20a.5\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 
[\[20a.6\]]'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che dang /_gnas gtsang ma dang /_gya nom 
[\[20a.7\]]snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_mi che dang /_mi gdung dang /_'og min gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha nas/_'og min gyi ris kyi lha'i bar dag byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du bdag gi stan 'ding bar 
[\[20b.2\]]'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[20b.3\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba'i sa phyogs de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[20b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag nyi ma gang la mngon par byung ba'i nyi ma de nyid la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_mngon par 
[\[20b.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_nyi ma de nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_'khor lo bskor nas/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing /_dri ma med pa rnam par dag par 'gyur/_sems can tshad med grangs med 
[\[20b.6\]]pa dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[20b.7\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_ji ltar na bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshad med grangs med par 'gyur/_chos bstan pa gcig gis sems can tshad med grangs 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]med pa dag stan gcig pa'i dgra bcom par 'gyur/_stan gcig pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med/_grangs 
[\[21a.2\]]med tshad med par 'gyur/_tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par 'gyur/_'od dpag tu med pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na bdag bla na med pa 
[\[21a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi sgra thams cad kyi thams cad du mi grag par 'gyur snyam na yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub 
[\[21a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_ji ltar na bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can thams cad sbyin pa ni legs pa'o/_/dul ba ni legs pa'o/_/legs par sdom pa ni legs pa'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni legs pa'o/_/srog chags 'byung po 
[\[21a.5\]]rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni legs pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa'i shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur snyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_dam pa'i chos nub pa'i sgra yang mi grag par 'gyur snyam 
[\[21a.6\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na/_bdag gi ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur snyam na yang /_
[\[21a.7\]]des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_yon tan 'di dag skyed par byed pa de'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi po gang dag 'khod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis lhung bzed dag phul ba ltar bdag cag gis kyang /_byang chub sems 
[\[21b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la lhung bzed bzhi dbul bar bya'o snyam du sems shing yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di snyam 
[\[21b.3\]]du/_de ltar na lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur zhing /_lha'i ris rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur bas/_bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la rim gro bskyed par bya'o snyam du sems shing yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/stong 
[\[21b.4\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa chen po dag dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha nas bzung ste/_tshangs pa thams cad dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha dag 'di snyam du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_
[\[21b.5\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du bdag cag gis gsol ba gdab par bya'o snyam du sems shing yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[21b.6\]]gis rnam par 'phel ba de'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang 'di snyam du/_bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i pha dang /_ma dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen 
[\[21b.7\]]mtshams dag tu 'gyur ro snyam du sems shing /_yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang 'di snyam du de ni sems can rnams byang chub la nges par sbyar ba'i phyir/_kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]chos rnams kyis kun tu mi sbyor zhing /_tshangs par spyod par 'gyur te/_de 'di skad du bdag sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_tshangs par spyad par bya'i/_mi tshangs par spyad par ni mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod pa rnams la bsten pa ni/_
[\[22a.2\]]tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba la yang bar du gcod par 'gyur na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_khyim nas mngon par byung zhing tshangs par spyad pa nyid 
[\[22a.3\]]kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'i/_mi tshangs par spyod pas ni ma yin no zhes smon lam 'debs pas na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa kun tu sbyor ba la mi 'jug pas/_yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[22a.4\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la pha ma dang /_mchis 'brang dang /_bu dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi 
[\[22a.5\]]gnyen mtshams dag nges par 'tshal lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig la ni pha dang /_ma dang /_chung ma dang /_
[\[22a.6\]]bu dag dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni sems dang po bskyed pa nyid nas bzung ste/_tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par len cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de rtag tu 
[\[22a.7\]]gzhon nur gyur pa nyid kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni thabs la mkhas pas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyad nas/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi 
[\[22b\]]
