[\[22b.1\]]nang nas mngon par byung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la gnas pa thob nas/_'dod pa'i nyon mongs 
[\[22b.2\]]pa rnams dang bral yang de dag sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar 'dzin par ston la/_yongs su spyod par ni mi byed do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa/_sgyu ma'i 
[\[22b.3\]]rig sngags dang sbyor ba shes pa/_legs par bslabs pa zhig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mngon par sprul te/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis bdag nyid rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa bstan na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu 
[\[22b.4\]]ma mkhan gyi slob ma des 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag la yongs su spyad pa yod snyam 'am/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[22b.5\]]po thabs la mkhas pas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su spyod cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gos pa yang med do/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub 
[\[22b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa rnams ni kun tu 'bar ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni smad pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni gsod pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni phyir rgol ba'o zhes 'dod pa rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[22b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_'dod pa'i yon tan rnams nye bar 'dzin to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_sems bskyed pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang 
[\[23a.2\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang 
[\[23a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mi spyod ces bya 
[\[23a.4\]]bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/spyod kyang spyod la/_mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs yang dag par 
[\[23a.5\]]rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ming de ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi_/stong pa nyid 
[\[23a.6\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ming stong pa ni ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' stong pa ni ma yin/_byang chub kyang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi_/stong pa nyid kyis byang chub stong pa ni ma 
[\[23a.7\]]yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi_/stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ni ma yin/_gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi_/stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ni ma yin/_tshor ba dang /_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi_/stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ming gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub 
[\[23b.2\]]sems dpa'i ming ma yin la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang byang chub sems dpa'i ming med de/_byang chub sems dpa'i ming nyid stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ming yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_byang 
[\[23b.3\]]chub sems dpa' ma yin la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang byang chub sems dpa' med de/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de byang chub ma yin la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[23b.4\]]las gud na yang byang chub med de/_byang chub nyid stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang byang chub yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[23b.5\]]med de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa dang /_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med de/_gzugs nyid stong pa nyid yin la/_
[\[23b.6\]]stong pa nyid kyang gzugs ma yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med de/_rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[23b.7\]]yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub ces bya ba dang /_shes 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam 
[\[24a.2\]]du zad pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid med pa la ni skye ba med/_'gag pa med/_'grib pa med/_'phel ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med/_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/_tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta 
[\[24a.3\]]bu/_'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/_'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sgyu ma yang ming tsam du zad de/_yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas pas sgyu ma mthong ba ni log par gyur pa ste/_yod pa ma yin zhing ngo bo nyid 
[\[24a.4\]]dang bral ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni chos gang la yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[24a.5\]]ngo /_/'grib par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/kun nas nyon mongs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[24a.6\]]mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gang la byang chub ces bya ba'am/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[24a.7\]]ming ni bcos ma yin pa'i phyir/_chos so so tha dad pa de dag ni btags pa ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa/_glo bur du btags pa'i ming gis rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_ji lta ji ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa de lta de ltar mngon par zhen to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/_ming de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[24b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/'di lta ste byang chub ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/'di 
[\[24b.3\]]lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[24b.4\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo zhes yongs su rtog go/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_bdag bdag ces brjod kyang bdag kyang mi dmigs sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag kyang mi dmigs te/_'di ltar ming gis tha snyad btags par zad kyi/_
[\[24b.5\]]mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang /_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[24b.6\]]bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ming gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa'i ming de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas ni/_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 
[\[24b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang gis mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba de yang des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis 'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od 
[\[25a.2\]]ma'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/_'bras kyi zhing ngam/_til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes 
[\[25a.3\]]rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab gang yin pa de 
[\[25a.4\]]ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig yongs su bsgoms pa gang yin pa des kyang nyan thos dang /_
[\[25a.5\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon to/_/shA ri'i bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta zhog gi_/shA ri'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shA ri'i bu dang 
[\[25a.6\]]maud gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_
[\[25a.7\]]rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams 'di shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta yang zhog gi_/shA ri'i bu gal te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]ma snyed dag shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur cing /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[25b.2\]]khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang /_de dag gi shes rab kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab nyin gcig 
[\[25b.3\]]bsgoms pa gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 
[\[25b.4\]]rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams kyi shes rab gang lags pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 
[\[25b.5\]]gang lags pa'i shes rab de dag thams cad ni tha dad pa ma lags pa/_dben pa/_ma skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das tha dad pa ma lags shing /_dben la ma skyes pa/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa la ni tha dad du dbye ba 'am/_khyad par mi 
[\[25b.6\]]dmigs lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab gdugs gcig bsgoms pa gang lags pa des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces 
[\[25b.7\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa/_sems can thams cad kyi don byed pas bdag gis/_chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byas la/_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o 
[\[26a.2\]]zhes nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab gang gi don du nye bar gnas pa ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab nye bar gnas pa yin snyama'am/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[26a.3\]]shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas la sems can thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[26a.4\]]dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems snyam 'am/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_khyod kyis 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams 
[\[26a.5\]]cad kyi shes rab gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod de/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon par rig par 
[\[26a.6\]]bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin 
[\[26a.7\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du sems snyam 'am/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[26b.2\]]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs 
[\[26b.3\]]su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems 
[\[26b.4\]]can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems so/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_srog chags kyi rigs srin bu me khyer ni 'di snyam du bdag gi 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar bya zhing /_bdag gi 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[26b.5\]]khyab par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas 
[\[26b.6\]]te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[26b.7\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar bas ni 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bas khyab 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]par byed cing /_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bas gsal bar byed do/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 
[\[27a.2\]]yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[27a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[27a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' zhing /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[27a.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[27a.6\]]med pa'i chos rnams la gnas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las shin tu 'das nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob bo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[27a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gang la gnas na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa nas/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rtag par rgyun tu nyan thos dang /_
[\[27b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_'di lta ste dge ba bcu'i 
[\[27b.3\]]las kyi lam rnams dang /_yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 
[\[27b.4\]]dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/pha rol tu 
[\[27b.5\]]phyin pa drug dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[27b.6\]]ba'i chos de dag 'jig rten du byung bas/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag yod pa yin/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag yod pa yin/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 
[\[27b.7\]]rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_sems can 'du shes med pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma gya nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye 
[\[28a.2\]]mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin no/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung ba yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba 
[\[28a.3\]]rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol 
[\[28a.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su sbyong bar bgyid dam/_'on te mi bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam grangs kyis sbyin pa yongs su sbyong 
[\[28a.5\]]bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po yin te/_ci zhig gi sbyin pa po yin zhe na/_dge ba'i 
[\[28a.6\]]chos rnams kyi sbyin pa po yin no/_/dge ba'i chos gang dag gi sbyin pa po yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang /_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag gi sbyin pa 
[\[28a.7\]]po yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyis na/_brtson zhes bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang /_'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i 
[\[28b.2\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[28b.3\]]bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_
[\[28b.4\]]lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam gyi 
[\[28b.5\]]stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_
[\[28b.6\]]skye ba dang /_rga shi'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[28b.7\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag gis brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' de stong pa nyid bdun po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_re shig brtson zhe 'am mi brtson zhes mi brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gzugs skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag 
[\[29a.2\]]par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam/_rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang 
[\[29a.3\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam/_rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[29a.4\]]chen po gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshor ba ni 'du shes dang /_'du shes ni 'du byed rnams dang /_'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar 
[\[29a.5\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_chos gang yang chos gang dang yang lhan cig yang dag par 
[\[29a.6\]]'du ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[29a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs su yod pa ma yin/_tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tshor bar byed pa ma yin/_'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de kun tu shes par byed pa ma yin/_'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan 
[\[29b.2\]]ma yin la/_gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/_gzugs nyid stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin/_de bzhin du tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[29b.3\]]'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/_rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA 
[\[29b.4\]]ri'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med/_rnam par byang ba med la/_'grib pa med cing /_'phel ba med pa ste/_de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'di 'dra ba gang 
[\[29b.5\]]yin pa de la ni gzugs med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/'du shes med do/_/'du byed rnams med do/_/rnam par shes pa med do/_/sa'i khams med do/_/chu'i khams med do/_/me'i khams med do/_/rlung gi khams med do/_/nam mkha'i khams med do/_/rnam 
[\[29b.6\]]par shes pa'i khams med do/_/mig gi skye mched med do/_/gzugs kyi skye mched med do/_/rna ba'i skye mched med do/_/sgra'i skye mched med do/_/sna'i skye mched med do/_/dri'i skye mched med do/_/lce'i skye mched med do/_/ro'i skye mched med do/_/lus kyi skye mched 
[\[29b.7\]]med do/_/reg bya'i skye mched med do/_/yid kyi skye mched med do/_/chos kyi skye mched med do/_/mig gi khams med do/_/gzugs kyi khams med do/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/rna ba'i khams med do/_/sgra'i khams med do/_/rna ba'i 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/sna'i khams med do/_/dri'i khams med do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/lce'i khams med do/_/ro'i khams med do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/lus kyi khams med do/_/reg bya'i khams 
[\[30a.2\]]med do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/yid kyi khams med do/_/chos kyi khams med do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/ma rig pa med do/_/ma rig pa 'gag pa med do/_/'du byed med do/_/'du byed 'gag pa med do/_/rnam par 
[\[30a.3\]]shes pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do/_/ming dang gzugs med do/_/ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med do/_/skye mched drug med do/_/skye mched drug 'gag pa med do/_/reg pa med do/_/reg pa 'gag pa med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/tshor ba 'gag pa 
[\[30a.4\]]med do/_/sred pa med do/_/sred pa 'gag pa med do/_/len pa med do/_/len pa 'gag pa med do/_/srid pa med do/_/srid pa 'gag pa med do/_/skye ba med do/_/skye ba 'gag pa med do/_/rga shi med do/_/rga shi 'gag pa med do/_/sdug bsngal med do/_/
[\[30a.5\]]kun 'byung ba med do/_/'gog pa med do/_/lam med do/_/thob pa med do/_/mngon par rtogs pa med do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa med do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/_/phyir mi 
[\[30a.6\]]'ong ba med do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid med do/_/rang sangs rgyas med do/_/rang byang chub med do/_/de la ni sangs rgyas med do/_/byang chub med do//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_
[\[30a.7\]]bam po gsum pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_
[\[30b.2\]]lus dang /_yid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am/_
[\[30b.3\]]mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig gi khams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams kyi bar dang /_chos kyi khams 
[\[30b.4\]]dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 
[\[30b.5\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bden pa bzhi la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[30b.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[30b.7\]]kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar brtson pa ni brtson pa zhes bya 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]bar rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/_mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/_stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/_/mtshan ma 
[\[31a.2\]]med pa dang /_mtshan ma med par sbyor bar mi byed/_mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/_mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/_/smon pa med pa dang /_smon pa med par sbyor bar mi byed/_mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/_smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/_/de 
[\[31a.3\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rnal 'byor yang ma yin/_rnal 'byor ma yin pa yang ma yin zhing /_de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yang rnal 'byor yang ma yin/_rnal 'byor ma yin pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[31a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'jug ste/_de ltar 'jug pa na gzugs 
[\[31a.5\]]la sbyor bar mi byed/_mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do/_/gzugs dang sngon gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/_'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su 
[\[31a.6\]]mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs dang phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/_'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs dang da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed de/_'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_
[\[31a.7\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang sngon gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/_'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa dang phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/_'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa dang /_da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed de/_'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni dus gsum mnyam 
[\[31b.2\]]pa nyid kyi phyir/_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_sngon gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byed do/_/da ltar byung ba dang /_sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/_sngon gyi mtha' 'am/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung bar sbyor 
[\[31b.3\]]bar mi byed do/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di ltar brtson par byed 
[\[31b.4\]]de/_ji ltar brtson par byed na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'das par sbyor bar mi byed de/_'das pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa dang sbyor bar ji ltar 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma 
[\[31b.5\]]'ongs par sbyor bar mi byed de/_ma 'ongs pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 'ongs pa dang sbyor bar ji ltar 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed de/_da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag 
[\[31b.6\]]par rjes su mi mthong na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung ba dang sbyor bar lta ga la 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[31b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_gzugs dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]rnam par shes pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du mig dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_mig nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[32a.2\]]ngo /_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_yid nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su 
[\[32a.3\]]mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_chos nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab 
[\[32a.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang 
[\[32a.5\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_
[\[32a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_
[\[32a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_mngon 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]par shes pa lnga dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[32b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_sangs rgyas dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs 
[\[32b.3\]]rgyas su sbyor bar mi byed de/_sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_byang chub tu sbyor bar mi byed de/_byang chub nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[32b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas yin/_byang chub nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub 
[\[32b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs 'jig go zhes 
[\[32b.6\]]bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa 'jig go zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[32b.7\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[33a.2\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[33a.3\]]shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[33a.4\]]gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa med ces bya 
[\[33a.5\]]bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[33a.6\]]rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba 'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[33a.7\]]par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs snying po can zhes bya ba'am nyam chung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa snying po can zhes bya ba'am nyam chung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs yod do zhes bya ba'am med do zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yod do zhes bya ba'am med do zhes_
[\[33b.2\]]bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gang de ltar spyod pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/_mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/_spyod kyang spyod la/_mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/_spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar khas mi len te/_
[\[33b.3\]]shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha 
[\[33b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/phyir mi 
[\[33b.5\]]ldog pa'i sa'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i ched dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ched dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ched dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[33b.6\]]rig pa bzhi'i ched dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa 
[\[33b.7\]]nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_skye ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_
[\[34a.2\]]yang dag pa'i mtha'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos gang la yang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod 
[\[34a.3\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/de lha'i mig gi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/lha'i rna ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul 
[\[34a.4\]]gyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te/_rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa thams cad 
[\[34a.5\]]lta ga la yod/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i 
[\[34a.6\]]mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o/_/de dag gi sems rnams kyang shes par bya'o/_/de dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnams kyang rjes su 
[\[34a.7\]]dran par byas la/_rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste/_chos bstan par bya'o/_/snyam du mi sems so/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba lha'i mig gis shes par bya'o/_/lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o/_/de dag gi sems rnams kyang shes par bya'o/_/de dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnams kyang rjes su dran par byas la/_rdzu 'phrul gyis 
[\[34b.2\]]song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[34b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa la ni bdud sdig can gyis kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[34b.4\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag dang lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_
[\[34b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung du 'ong ngo zhes srung ba mdzad do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa 
[\[34b.6\]]gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed 
[\[34b.7\]]du 'ong ngo zhes srung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ci yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[35a.2\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dag kyang tshegs chung ngus mngon du 'gyur ro/_/skye ba'i gnas thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[35a.3\]]par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[35a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du gang chos rnams dang 'du ba 'am/_'bral ba'am/_'phrad pa'am/_mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod dam snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos gang 'du ba'am/_
[\[35a.5\]]'bral ba 'am/_'phrad pa 'am/_mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[35a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gis myur du chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par 'gyur ram/_mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par mi 'gyur snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi 
[\[35a.7\]]dbyings mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]spyod pa ni/_chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings dang chos tha dad du mi byed do/_/de yang 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings 'di de ltar khong du chud par 'gyur ram/_khong du chud par mi 'gyur snyam du mi sems te/_
[\[35b.2\]]'di ltar chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor/_mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[35b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[35b.4\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi 
[\[35b.5\]]sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi sbyor/_gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su mi sbyor/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor 
[\[35b.6\]]ro/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus 
[\[35b.7\]]kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su mi sbyor/_chos kyi khams dang /_stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyor/_
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor dam 
[\[36a.2\]]pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing bla na med 
[\[36a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor du bya ba gang dag ci yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni mchog ces bya'o/_/thu bo zhes bya'o/_/phul zhes bya'o/_/rab ces 
[\[36a.4\]]bya'o/_/rab mchog ces bya'o/_/ltag na med pa zhes bya'o/_/gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/_bla na med pa'i rnal 
[\[36a.5\]]'byor yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa'am/_lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyur par gzung bar bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dpag 
[\[36a.6\]]tu med grangs med tshad med pa rnams kyi don kyang byed la/_de 'di snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston pa mdzad do/_/bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems 
[\[36a.7\]]can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/_/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing /_chos kyi 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]dbyings ma gtogs par gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am/_gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba'am/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag 
[\[36b.2\]]par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la sems can gyi 'du shes mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems can gtan skye ba med cing 'gag pa 
[\[36b.3\]]med de/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pa dang /_
[\[36b.4\]]'gag pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can stong pa nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can dmigs su med pa dang /_sems can dben pa dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa dang /_sems can ngo bo nyid med par shes rab kyi 
[\[36b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[36b.6\]]pa'i rnal 'byor te/_des de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas gnas so/_/shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo/_/mi 'jigs 
[\[36b.7\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon par sgrub bo/_/shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ser sna'i 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]sems mi bskyed do/_/'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang /_gnod sems kyi sems dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems mi bskyed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom 
[\[37a.2\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/_'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du 
[\[37a.3\]]skye bar 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de ni/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[37a.4\]]zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/_mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[37a.5\]]gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes pa de ni/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la myur bar rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug ste/_tshe 'di brjes nas kyang chos zab mo 'di mngon du 'gyur zhing /_phyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[37a.6\]]la snyoms par 'jug go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang /_gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dang de dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mnyes par byed 
[\[37a.7\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes pa de ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyams pa med pas na gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]cad kyang der 'dus shing nyams pa med pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/_mi nyid dang skal ba mnyam par skyes pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ma gtogs 
[\[37b.2\]]par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dbang po rnams rtul ba yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la yang myur du snyoms par mi 'jug cing /_de la gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang mngon du mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[37b.3\]]khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba lags zhes zer ba ni/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[37b.4\]]tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[37b.5\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mnyes par byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi 
[\[37b.6\]]mkhas pa gang la la dag bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug cing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod kyang /_de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe rings po'i nang du skyes nas/_gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob pa na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed na yang de 
[\[37b.7\]]dag dbang po rnams rtul zhing mi rno ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas/_bsam gtan rnams 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]spangs nas/_de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rnams rtul ba yin te/_rno ba ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[38a.2\]]dang /_tshad med pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams 
[\[38a.3\]]la yang snyoms par 'jug kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye/_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/_gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[38a.4\]]gzhes pa de dang der skye zhing /_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[38a.5\]]dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas de dag thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad las log ste/_'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye zhing /_rgyal rigs shing sA la 
[\[38a.6\]]chen po lta bu rnams su'am/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bdag kyang yod de/_de yang srid pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye'o/_/shA 
[\[38a.7\]]ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug la/_de dag thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/_de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba 
[\[38b.2\]]mnyam par skye zhing /_de dag tu gnas nas/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[38b.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_
[\[38b.4\]]tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ste/_de dag der tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por gyur nas/_de dag tshangs pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bla na med pa yang 
[\[38b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[38b.6\]]skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs la mkhas pas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par 
[\[38b.7\]]spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams kyang sgom/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug la de dag de rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing /_
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byas te/_der tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_yang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/_de dag der tshe'i yun ji srid par gnas nas/_dbang po ma nyams la dran pa dang shes bzhin 
[\[39a.2\]]dang ldan par lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing /_mdun du bdar nas/_'dir skye ba bstan nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i 
[\[39a.3\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye bar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[39a.4\]]la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis 
[\[39a.5\]]rnam par rtse zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[39a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang 
[\[39a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing /_de dag der 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]song nas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog_/chos kyi sgra sgrog_/dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog cing /_dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dag kyang yod do/_sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems rab tu dang 
[\[39b.2\]]bar gyur nas/_de dag nas shi 'phos te/_gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs pa de dag tu skye'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[39b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur cing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam sgom la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 
[\[39b.4\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye la/_de dag tu sems can rnams kyi don 
[\[39b.5\]]byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[39b.6\]]dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byas nas/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 
[\[39b.7\]]su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_de dag gi dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par gnas par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nyid 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 
[\[40a.2\]]khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_bsam gtan bzhi thob pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi thob pa dang /_
[\[40a.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa du mar rnam par rtse zhing /_'di lta ste/_de dag bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs 
[\[40a.4\]]nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_bsam 
[\[40a.5\]]gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 
[\[40a.6\]]snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug 
[\[40a.7\]]go/_/de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang 
[\[40b.2\]]ldan pa dag bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 
[\[40b.3\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam thob cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad thob pa 
[\[40b.4\]]dag_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par mi byed par/_de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs la mkhas pas sems 
[\[40b.5\]]can gyi sems kyi rgyun rnams lam la zhugs par byas te/_rnam par sbyangs nas/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par byed pa de dag kyang 
[\[40b.6\]]yod de/_shA ri'i bu nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[40b.7\]]pa 'di la gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu de dag ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan bzhi thob cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag thob pa de dag ni bden pa bzhi khong du chud par 
[\[41a.2\]]bya ba'i phyir spyod kyang /_de dag bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu de dag ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha 
[\[41a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/_de dag tu yang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par 'dzud cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[41a.4\]]dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi 
[\[41a.5\]]ched du rtag tu brtson pa dag lan 'ga' yang don med pa dang ldan pa'i tshig mi smra zhing don med pa dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_sems can 
[\[41a.6\]]rnams kyi ched du rtag tu brtson pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum gyi lam gcod par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_
[\[41a.7\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/_sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing /_'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug spos dang /_
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]mal stan dang /_rgyab rten dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_'tsho ba dang /_khyim dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_byi ru dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba de dag nye bar sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA 
[\[41b.2\]]ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid sdom pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[41b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/_sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang /_gnod sems med pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 
[\[41b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/_sems can rnams dge ba'i chos la mngon par brtson pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[41b.5\]]la gnas shing /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/_sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang /_'dod pa las dben pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 
[\[41b.6\]]gnas shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid kyi lus mngon par sprul nas/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can 
[\[41b.7\]]rnams la ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir/_chos ston par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid kyi lus mngon par sprul nas/_
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos kyang nyan pa dang /_
[\[42a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung nas de bas kyang rgya che ba dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su 
[\[42a.3\]]sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og 
[\[42a.4\]]dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan pa 
[\[42a.5\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar byed cing /_de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung nas/_de bas kyang rgya che ba dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs 
[\[42a.6\]]su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 
[\[42a.7\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/_dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa rnams dang ldan par gyur nas/_de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po dga' zhing dang bskyed par byed de/_de dag skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can de 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]dag kyang sems rab tu dang bar gyur pa de nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas lus yongs su 
[\[42b.2\]]dag pa la bslab par bya'o/_/ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_dbang po gsal ba dag thob par gyur nas de dag dbang po gsal ba de dag gis 
[\[42b.3\]]bdag la stod par mi byed cing /_gzhan la smod par mi byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
