[\[42b.4\]]thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul por mi 'gyur zhing /_ngan song ngan 'gro log par mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong 
[\[42b.5\]]bdag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/_sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god 
[\[42b.6\]]cing /_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra bas/_sems can rnams sdud pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma 
[\[42b.7\]]yongs su bzung nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma byed du 'jug cing /_de la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang /_mchod pa thams cad kyis 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mo byed cing mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas nas/_sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang 
[\[43a.2\]]bar byed cing /_bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba de dang mi 'bral bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[43a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o//_//
[\[43a.4\]]'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las 
[\[43a.5\]]kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub 
[\[43a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/_'di snyam du 'di ni lus yin te/_des lus kyi las rtsom pa byed/_'di ni ngag yin te/_des ngag gi las rtsom pa byed/_'di ni yid yin te/_des yid kyi las rtsom pa byed do snyam du sems na/_shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub 
[\[43a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lus mi dmigs/_ngag mi dmigs/_yid mi dmigs so/_
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la gal te lus dmigs pa dang /_ngag dmigs pa dang /_yid dmigs pa yod par gyur na/_de de'i tshe lus dang ngag dang yid des ser sna'i sems bskyed par 'gyur zhing /_'chal 
[\[43b.2\]]pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang /_gnod sems kyi sems dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems kyang bskyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/_shA ri'i bu de ltar na rig par mi bya ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[43b.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni lus kyi gnas ngan 
[\[43b.4\]]len sbyong ba dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir te/_shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[43b.5\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar lus mi dmigs pa dang /_ngag 
[\[43b.6\]]mi dmigs pa dang /_yid mi dmigs pa ste/_shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed 
[\[43b.7\]]phyin chad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas gnas te/_nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed par de rtag par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar 'jog par byed na/_de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dpa' chen po'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa yin no zhes nga smra'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba ni sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[44a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i 
[\[44a.3\]]bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub kyi lam gang la spyod na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[44a.4\]]rnams lus mi dmigs/_ngag mi dmigs/_yid mi dmigs/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/_bsam 
[\[44a.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/_nyan thos kyi theg pa mi dmigs/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mi dmigs/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 
[\[44a.6\]]dmigs shing /_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa 'di ni/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam yin te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam 'di nas 'gro zhing /_pha rol tu phyin 
[\[44a.7\]]pa drug la spyod pa ni/_sus kyang thul bar mi nus so/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar spyod pa dag sus kyang mi thul ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_sa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_chu'i khams 
[\[44b.2\]]dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_mig dang gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_
[\[44b.3\]]reg bya dang /_yid dang /_chos la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[44b.4\]]khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la 
[\[44b.5\]]rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_yid kyi khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_chos kyi khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 
[\[44b.6\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[44b.7\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la rlom sems su mi 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]byed pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_rang byang chub la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_byang 
[\[45a.2\]]chub sems dpa' la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba ni sus kyang mi thul ba yin no/_/shA 
[\[45a.3\]]ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_ye shes de dang ldan pas/_ngan song rnams kyi sgo thams cad gcod pa dang /_dbul zhing rgud pa'i mir mi 'gyur 
[\[45a.4\]]ba dang /_lus gang gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[45a.5\]]dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de dang ldan pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de 
[\[45a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam par dag pa yang mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[45a.7\]]bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam par dag pa yang mthong ngo /_/ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[45b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do/_/nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang /_bdag gi 'du shes dang /_gzhan gyi 'du shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed 
[\[45b.3\]]do/_/ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod de/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag kyang mi 
[\[45b.4\]]dmigs so/_/ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang sgom la/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so/_/yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[45b.5\]]yan lag dang /_lam yang sgom la/_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam yang mi dmigs so/_/stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[45b.6\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so/_/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin te/_ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[45b.7\]]chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_mig lnga 'thob pa dang /_yongs su spyod pa dag kyang yod 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]de/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sha'i mig dang /_lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mig go/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs 
[\[46a.2\]]su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[46a.3\]]sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten 
[\[46a.4\]]gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[46a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi 
[\[46a.6\]]lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas 
[\[46a.7\]]rab tu shes so/_/tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]ba dang /_sems can 'du shes med pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[46b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs 
[\[46b.3\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[46b.4\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[46b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni 'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_dge ba'am/_mi dge 
[\[46b.6\]]ba 'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/_zag pa med pa 'am/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/_'jig rten pa 'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_
[\[46b.7\]]rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni chos gang yang ma mthong ba'am ma thos pa'am/_mi dran pa 'am/_rnam par mi shes par gyur pa ci 'ang med de/_shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[47a.2\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/_'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/_'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/_rnam 
[\[47a.3\]]par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyis gang zag de'i dbang po lnga po dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/_/bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 
[\[47a.4\]]mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum spong bar 'gyur te/_gang zag de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod 
[\[47a.5\]]sems srab mor byed par 'gyur te/_gang zag de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/des lam de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems spong bar 'gyur te/_gang zag de ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/des lam de nyid shas cher bsgoms 
[\[47a.6\]]pas gzugs la 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa la 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa spong bar 'gyur te/_gang zag de ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis dbang po lnga 
[\[47a.7\]]po dag thob par 'gyur zhing /_bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/_/bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gang 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas dbang po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[47b.2\]]smon pa med pas dbang po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur te/_bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[47b.3\]]du shes te/_shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yod pa de thams cad 'gog pa'i chos yin no zhes bya bar rtogs nas/_dad pa la sogs pa 
[\[47b.4\]]dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems 
[\[47b.5\]]dang po bskyed pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod cing /_de de nas dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob la/_de thabs la mkhas pa dang yang ldan/_dge ba'i rtsa bas kyang brtan 
[\[47b.6\]]pas/_bsams bzhin du lus yongs su 'dzin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la 
[\[47b.7\]]chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/_'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su/_'di ni 'thab bral du/_'di ni dga' ldan du/_'di ni 'phrul dgar/_'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]ro/_/de der gnas nas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang 'gyur te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag la nye bar gnas par yang 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin 
[\[48a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyes par byed par 'gyur/_bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/_bla mar byed par 'gyur/_ri mor byed par 'gyur/_mchod par byed par 'gyur la/_nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung 
[\[48a.3\]]bar yang mi 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_shA ri'i bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[48a.4\]]chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[48a.5\]]'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/'di dag ni nges pa'o/_/'di dag ni ma nges pa'o/_/'di dag ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'o/_/'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa'o/_/'di'i mngon par 
[\[48a.6\]]shes pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs so/_/'di'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni yongs su ma rdzogs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song 
[\[48a.7\]]zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed/_bsnyen bkur byed/_bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed do/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed/_bsnyen bkur byed/_bsti stang du 
[\[48b.2\]]byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed do/_/'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o/_/'di ni bzod pa ma thob pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[48b.3\]]po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o/_/'dis ni sems can yongs 
[\[48b.4\]]su smin par byas so/_/'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa rjod pa mdzad do/_/'di la ni bsngags 
[\[48b.5\]]pa rjod par mi mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i tshe ni dpag tu med 
[\[48b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i 'od dang /_dbyangs dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 
[\[48b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni dka' ba spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o/_/'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no/_/'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di dag la ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_shA ri'i bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs 
[\[49a.2\]]su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems 
[\[49a.3\]]kyi mjug thogs su rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[49a.4\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ni de'i mig yin te/_mig de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am/_ma thos pa 
[\[49a.5\]]'am/_mi dran pa 'am/_rnam par mi shes pa ci'ang med de/_shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/_
[\[49a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig lnga yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang /_thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dge ba'i chos thams cad dang /_nyan thos kyi chos thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[49a.7\]]kyi chos thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra na/_yang dag 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_mig lnga po de dag skyed pa ste/_mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[49b.2\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing /_des rdzu 'phrul bya ba rnam pa du myong bar 'gyur te/_des 
[\[49b.3\]]yang g.yo bar byed do/_/gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /_mang por gyur nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /_snang bar 'gyur zhing /_mi snang bar 'gyur ba yang myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ri la yang 
[\[49b.4\]]lus mi thogs par thad kar 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung bcas nas 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /_byi'u zul byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la 
[\[49b.5\]]yang mi nub par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/du ba 'thul bar yang byed 'bar bar yang byed de/_dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar gzi brjid che ba 'di dag la yang lag pas nom zhing kun tu 
[\[49b.6\]]nyug par byed do/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/_des gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul de yang mi dmigs/_gang rlom sems 
[\[49b.7\]]su byed pa dang /_gang gis rlom sems su byed pa de yang mi dmigs te/_de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul du sems pa 'am/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems pa yang mi skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_rdzu 'phrul bya ba mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/_/des lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pa/_'di lta ste/_lha dang mi'i sgra rnams thos te/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[50a.2\]]ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/'di ltar des sgra de mi dmigs pas bdag gis sgra thos so snyam du lha'i rna ba des rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i rna bar sems pa yang mi skyed cing 
[\[50a.3\]]mi dmigs so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/_/des sems can gzhan rnams dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyang sems 
[\[50a.4\]]kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod chags bral ba'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[50a.5\]]du rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_sred pa dang bcas pa dang /_sred pa dang bral ba dang /_len pa dang bcas pa dang /_len pa med pa dang /_bsdus pa dang /_rnam 
[\[50a.6\]]par g.yengs pa dang /_chung ngu dang /_chen por gyur pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par ma grol ba dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_
[\[50a.7\]]bla na yod pa'i sems la yang bla na yod pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/bla na med pa'i sems la yang bla na med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'di ltar sems de yang sems ma yin pa ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir des rlom sems 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]su mi byed do/_/des gang gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i sems de nyid kyang mi dmigs te/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de rnam pa thams cad 
[\[50b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par sems la sems pa yang mi skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes 
[\[50b.3\]]pa mngon par sgrub bo/_/de sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/_des sems gcig gam/_sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/zhag gcig dang /_zhag brgya'i bar dang /_zla 
[\[50b.4\]]ba gcig dang /_zla ba brgya'i bar dang /_lo gcig dang /_lo brgya'i bar dang /_bskal pa gcig dang /_bskal pa brgya'i bar dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag du ma 'am/_bskal pa stong phrag du ma'am/_bskal pa 'bum phrag du ma'am/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[50b.5\]]phrag 'bum phrag du ma'i bar du rjes su dran zhing /_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du yang rjes su dran te/_bdag ni ga ge mo zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_'tsho ba ni 'di 'dra 
[\[50b.6\]]ba zhig_/yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur/_de nas shi 'phos nas ni ga ge mo zhig tu skyes/_de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes de ltar rnam pa dang bcas/_yul phyogs dang bcas/_gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par bdag 
[\[50b.7\]]dang gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/_/'di ltar shes pa de yang shes pa ma yin pa ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/_/des gang gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]shes pa de nyid kyang mi dmigs te/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/_bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs 
[\[51a.2\]]par rjes su dran pa'i shes par sems pa yang mi skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/_/de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 
[\[51a.3\]]'das pas sems can rnams mthong ste/_sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa dang /_bzang po dang /_ngan pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_las ci lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba dag rab tu shes so/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus 
[\[51a.4\]]kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang /_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba can yin te/_log par lta ba'i las kyi gzhi dang rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su skye 
[\[51a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang /_yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag pa'i lta ba can te/_de dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyi legs par 
[\[51a.6\]]spyod pa'i gzhi dang rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi 
[\[51a.7\]]mthas gtugs pa dag na/_'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'di ltar mig de ni mig ma yin pa ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/_/des gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i mig de 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]nyid mi dmigs te/_de ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/_bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par mig tu sems pa yang mi skyed 
[\[51b.2\]]do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni lha'i mig mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/_/de zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa yang mngon par sgrub la/_
[\[51b.3\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang la yang smon pa med do/_/de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas/_bag 
[\[51b.4\]]chags dang /_mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed do/_/'di ltar shes pa de ni shes pa ma yin pa ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba des rlom sems su mi 
[\[51b.5\]]byed do/_/de shes pa de nyid mi dmigs te/_ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/_bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par shes pa 
[\[51b.6\]]de la sems pa yang mi skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo/_/shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[51b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[52a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang /_lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong bdag kyang yod do/_/
[\[52a.3\]]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/
[\[52a.4\]]shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam 
[\[52a.5\]]sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam 
[\[52a.6\]]sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[52a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'dzin pa med pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong bar byed do/_/sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so/_/tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yod pa'i phyir gdags so/_/bzod pa ni 'khrug pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so/_/brtson 'grus 
[\[52b.2\]]ni le lo yod pa'i phyir gdags so/_/ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so/_/shes rab ni 'chal pa'i shes rab yod pa'i phyir gdags te/_de ni brgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/ma brgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/sbyin 
[\[52b.3\]]pa dang ser sna zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ma yin pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/bzod pa dang 'khrug pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/brtson 'grus dang le lo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_
[\[52b.4\]]mnyam par ma bzhag pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/shes rab dang /_shes rab 'chal pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/bdag la spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/bdag la phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/bdag la bsti stang byas so 
[\[52b.5\]]zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/bdag la bsti stang ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni bdag la spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/_phyag byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_bdag la bsti stang byas 
[\[52b.6\]]so zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_bdag la bsti stang ma byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[52b.7\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i yon tan gang yin pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/_de ni yon tan de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]byed de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems skyed par byed de/_des sems can 
[\[53a.2\]]thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/des chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob pas sems can thams cad chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'god par byed do/_/de tshe 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[53a.3\]]la sdug cing thugs su byon par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der nams kyang mig gis gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba rnams 
[\[53a.4\]]mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rna bas sgra yid du mi 'ong ba rnams thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/snas dri yid du mi 'ong ba rnams tshor bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lces ro yid du mi 'ong ba rnams myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus kyis reg bya yid du mi 'ong ba rnams reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis 
[\[53a.5\]]chos yid du mi 'ong ba rnams shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[53a.6\]]bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_dge slong sum brgyas gos ci gyon pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyang bskyed do/_/de nas de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[53a.7\]]dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/_rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[53b.2\]]to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig na bskal pa skar ma 
[\[53b.3\]]lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog chen po zhes bya ba dag tu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu drug khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de dag ni de 
[\[53b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa yang mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/_de nyid du rab tu byung nas/_tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[53b.5\]]lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po dag gis 'di nas shar phyogs na sangs rgyas khri bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/phyogs bcu khor yug gi bar du yang sangs rgyas khri khri mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[53b.6\]]de dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na mi snang ngo /_/de nas 'khor de las srog chags khris bdag cag kyang las 'di lta bu byas te/_las de byas pas/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[53b.7\]]zhing de dag tu skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/_rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo srog chags khri po 'di dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol 
[\[54a.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo srog chags khri po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_nams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[54a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/_phyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_nye bar brtag pa'i le'u ste gsum 
[\[54a.4\]]pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_de dag dang gzhan 
[\[54a.5\]]yang dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[54a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[54a.7\]]ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa khyad par du 'phags pa lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pa 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa gong nam mchis pa lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so/_/'di ni pha rol 
[\[54b.2\]]tu phyin pa zhi ba dang dul ba lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa dpe ma mchis pa lags so/_/'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu lags so/_/'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[54b.3\]]lags so/_/'di ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thub pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[54b.4\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa stsal lags so/_/de dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so/_/de 
[\[54b.5\]]dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob lags so/_/de dag gis ni 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur lags so/_/de bzhin du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_
[\[54b.6\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab bsgoms lags so/_/de dag gis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob lags so/_/de dag gis ni 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur lags 
[\[54b.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyod pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes par gyur lags so/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]shes pa brnyes par gyur lags so/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lags so/_/de bzhin du 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[55a.2\]]ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur lags so/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[55a.3\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags bas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'tshal ba rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[55a.4\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa gang lags pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[55a.5\]]chen po rab tu mang po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed ji skad zer ba bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma 
[\[55a.6\]]yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas yin no/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/_'jig rten du mi'i 'jig rten 'byung ngo /_/'jig rten du lha'i 'jig rten 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang 
[\[55a.7\]]bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che dang /_sems can 'du shes med 
[\[55b.2\]]pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma mi che ba dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_gya nom snang dang /_mi gdung dang /_'og min dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[55b.3\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_
[\[55b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas/_dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/'jig rten pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad zas dang /_skom dang /_mal cha dang /_
[\[55b.5\]]stan dang /_na ba'i gso sman dang /_'tshog chas dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_gser 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu lha rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa rnams dang /_
[\[55b.6\]]srid pa'i bde ba rnams dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba de dag thams cad kyang /_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten te 'jig rten du 'byung ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 
[\[55b.7\]]na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas te/_bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa la sbyor bar byed/_bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung la/_gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/_bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgom la/_gzhan dag kyang bzod pa la 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]sbyor bar byed/_bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la/_gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus la sbyor bar byed/_bdag nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams skyed la/_gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyor bar byed/_bdag nyid kyang shes rab sgom la/_gzhan 
[\[56a.2\]]dag kyang shes rab sgom pa la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mi mnyam pa dang 
[\[56a.3\]]mnyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bzhi pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po lnga pa/_de nas de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[56a.4\]]'di khyab par mdzad do/_/de nas ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs byung ngo /_/de byung nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_
[\[56a.5\]]byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub 
[\[56a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis 'od kyi bkod pa de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gda' ba 'di su'i mthu 
[\[56a.7\]]lags/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub phyogs logs na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/_phyogs bcu dag tu phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang 
[\[56b.2\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[56b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_
[\[56b.4\]]phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[56b.5\]]'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[56b.6\]]lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_phyogs bcu nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog rnam pa du ma dag khyer nas/_sil 
[\[56b.7\]]snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang chas te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_klu shing gi me tog dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma rnams khyer 
[\[57a.2\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_lha de dag gis me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[57a.3\]]phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/
[\[57a.4\]]de nas me tog la sogs pa de dag ni steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/_gru bzhi lham pa/_ka ba bzhi zug pa/_cha mnyam pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba/_nyams dga' ba yid du 
[\[57a.5\]]'ong ba zhig tu red de 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[57a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos ci lta bu dag brnyes pa'i chos de lta bu dag bdag cag gis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thob par gyur cig_/da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lung 'bogs shing /_'khor 'di 
[\[57a.7\]]lta bu dag la chos ston par yang gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/_chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bzod par gyur par mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'khor 'di las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[57b.2\]]phrag 'bum gyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi na/_bskal pa me tog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag gi 
[\[57b.3\]]me tog ces bya ba dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_ljags kyi dbang po'i le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ci 
[\[57b.4\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar khyod spobs par gyis shig_/de nas 
[\[57b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_ci tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang /_spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i go chas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 
[\[57b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed dam/_'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par byed snyam mo/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag gi 
[\[57b.7\]]sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams smra ba dang /_ston pa dang /_rjod pa gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no/_/de bzhin 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]gshegs pas chos bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo/_/rigs kyi bu de dag chos bstan pa de la slob na yang chos nyid de mngon sum du byed do/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[58a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston gyi/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par mi nus te/_
[\[58a.3\]]yul ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de chos gang 
[\[58a.4\]]gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming gi chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang 
[\[58a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi/_rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[58a.6\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming de ni ming tsam du zad de/_ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sems 
[\[58a.7\]]can sems can zhes bya bar ming du brjod kyang /_sems can gang yang mi dmigs te/_de ni ming du btags pa tsam du zad la/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med do/_/de bzhin du bdag dang /_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso ba po dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang /_shes pa 
[\[58b.2\]]po dang /_mthong ba po de dag thams cad kyang btags pa'i chos yin la/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni skye ba med 'gag pa med de/_'di ltar ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags par zad do/_/ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga 
[\[58b.3\]]med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i chos yin la/_btags pa'i chos de la ni ming dang 
[\[58b.4\]]brdas tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nang gi lus gang yin pa de la/_gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags 
[\[58b.5\]]pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_ming de yang nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad 
[\[58b.6\]]la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/_ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[58b.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i chos yin la/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]ste mig ces bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_/'di lta ste mig ces bya ba'i ming de yang nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi 
[\[59a.2\]]ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ces bya ba de ni/_'di lta ste/_chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par 
[\[59a.3\]]skye ba med 'gag pa med do/_/'di lta ste yid ces bya ba'i ming de yang nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du 
[\[59a.4\]]gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/_ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la 
[\[59a.5\]]chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_chos zhes bya ba'i ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor mig gi khams zhes bya ba de ni chos 
[\[59a.6\]]su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/_mig gi khams zhes bya ba'i ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[59a.7\]]gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med do/_/gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba'i ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[59b.2\]]khams zhes bya ba'i ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i 
[\[59b.3\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi 
[\[59b.4\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba'i ming de yang nang na yang med/_
[\[59b.5\]]phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de ni 'di ltar btags pa'i chos yin la/_
[\[59b.6\]]btags pa'i chos de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de yang nang na yang med/_phyi 
[\[59b.7\]]rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nang gi lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam gyis tha snyad gdags pa ste/_mgo bo dang /_mjing ba dang /_phrag pa dang /_lag pa dang /_rgal tshigs dang /_rtsib ma dang /_dpyi dang /_brla dang /_
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]rje ngar dang /_rkang pa'i rus pa zhes bya bar ming gis tha snyad du 'dogs pa de dag ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/_chos su btags pa de dag ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/_ming de yang 
[\[60a.2\]]nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i 
[\[60a.3\]]chos yin la/_btags pa'i chos de dag la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_phyi rol gyi 
[\[60a.4\]]rtswa dang /_shing dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni ming sna tshogs kyis tha snyad du gdags par zad la/_ming de dag kyang ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_ming de dag 
[\[60a.5\]]kyang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de dag thams cad ni btags 
[\[60a.6\]]pa'i chos yin la/_btags pa'i chos de dag la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'das 
[\[60a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_mtshan de dag kyang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]rmi lam dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni btags pa tsam du zad la/_btags pa de dag la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par 
[\[60b.2\]]skye ba med/_'gag pa med de/_ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming 
[\[60b.3\]]zhes bya ba'i chos 'di dag thams cad ni btags pa tsam du zad la/_btags pa'i chos de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med 'gag pa med de/_ming de yang nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/
[\[60b.4\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas ming gi brdar btags pa dang /_gdams ngag tu btags pa dang /_chos su btags pa la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[60b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag yod ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[60b.6\]]zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_'dus byas zhes bya ba dang /_'dus ma byas zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[60b.7\]]skye ba zhes bya ba dang /_'gag pa ces bya ba dang /_dben pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben pa zhes bya ba dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_gzugs 'khor ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs 
[\[61a.2\]]mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[61a.3\]]de bzhin du bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus 
[\[61a.4\]]ma byas dang /_skye ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_dben pa dang /_mi dben pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa 
[\[61a.5\]]med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du mig gi khams rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_
[\[61a.6\]]gzugs kyi khams rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'khor ba zhes bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[61a.7\]]de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'khor ba zhes bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das 
[\[61b.2\]]pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang rtag ces bya ba 
[\[61b.3\]]dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_
[\[61b.4\]]lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal 
[\[61b.5\]]ba yang ma yin pa de yang rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'khor ba zhes bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[61b.6\]]pa la spyod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming de 'dus byas kyi khams sam/_'dus ma byas kyi khams na yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems 
[\[61b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos la gnas te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/_shes rab kyi 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[62a.2\]]dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[62a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du sgom zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[62a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa'i ming dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs par 'gyur te/_chos rnams 
[\[62a.5\]]kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de yang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas chos su btags pa'i ming dang brda tsam yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/
[\[62a.6\]]des chos su btags pa'i ming dang brda tsam yin par khong du chud na gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/mig la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[62a.7\]]gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa de la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]ro/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba 'am/_
[\[62b.2\]]sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[62b.3\]]tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi ming dang /_mtshan nyid la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lus la yang mngon 
[\[62b.4\]]par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/sha'i mig dang /_lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mig la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong 
[\[62b.5\]]pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin nyid la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang mngon par zhen par mi 
[\[62b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang mngon par 
[\[62b.7\]]zhen par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dang /_gang la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni chos thams cad la mngon 
[\[63a\]]
