[\[63a.1\]]par zhen pa med pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug 
[\[63a.2\]]cing /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon te/_mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba'i phyir sems can rnams ni yongs 
[\[63a.3\]]su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas kyang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag 
[\[63a.4\]]gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang de la 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thad du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[63a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang thos par 'gyur ro/_/des chos thos pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nams kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[63a.6\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas chos su btags pa ming dang brda can yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba gzugs byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[63a.7\]]yin snyam 'am/_gzugs las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs yod snyam 'am/_gzugs can ma yin pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan zhig byang chub 
[\[63b.2\]]sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa yod snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[63b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_mig las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_mig la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la mig yod 
[\[63b.4\]]snyam 'am/_mig med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid byang chub sems 
[\[63b.5\]]dpa' yin snyam 'am/_yid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_yid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la yid yod snyam 'am/_yid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[63b.6\]]'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gzugs las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_
[\[63b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs yod snyam 'am/_gzugs med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]reg bya dang /_chos rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_chos rnams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la chos rnams yod snyam 'am/_chos 
[\[64a.2\]]rnams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[64a.3\]]yin snyam 'am/_de dag las gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_de dag la de yod snyam 'am/_de la de dag yod snyam 'am/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa rnams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 
[\[64a.4\]]ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_
[\[64a.5\]]lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_de dag las gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_de dag la de yod snyam 'am/_de la de dag yod snyam 'am/_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par 
[\[64a.6\]]shes pa rnams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_sa'i khams las gzhan 
[\[64a.7\]]zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_sa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams yod snyam 'am/_sa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[64b.2\]]las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams yod snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin 
[\[64b.3\]]snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_ma rig pa las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_ma 
[\[64b.4\]]rig pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la ma rig pa yod snyam 'am/_ma rig pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[64b.5\]]rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rga shi las 
[\[64b.6\]]gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rga shi la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi yod snyam 'am/_rga shi med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[64b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[65a.2\]]stsal pa/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[65a.3\]]la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom 
[\[65a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rga shi'i de bzhin 
[\[65a.5\]]nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/_rga shi'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[65a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod don gyi dbang gang nye bar bzung nas gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/_rab 
[\[65a.7\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_gzugs de byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_gzugs las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_gzugs la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]mchis par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs mchis par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_gzugs ma mchis pa zhig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[65b.2\]]byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_rnam par shes pa la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa 
[\[65b.3\]]mchis par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa zhig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gtan ma 
[\[65b.4\]]mchis shing mi dmigs na/_rga shi byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_rga shi las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_rga shi la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi mchis 
[\[65b.5\]]par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_rga shi ma mchis pa zhig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_'di la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_phung po dang /_
[\[65b.6\]]khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_de la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis te/_de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/
[\[65b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can mi dmigs pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor khyod gang yang 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags zhes zer ba la/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs kyi 
[\[66a.2\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[66a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs rtag pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam 'am/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de 
[\[66a.4\]]gzugs bde ba nyid dang /_gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid dang /_gzugs bdag yod pa nyid dang /_gzugs bdag med pa nyid dang /_gzugs zhi ba nyid dang /_gzugs ma zhi ba nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam 'am/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba dang /_
[\[66a.5\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa bde ba nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag yod pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid dang /_
[\[66a.6\]]rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa ma zhi ba nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs stong pa nyid dang /_gzugs mi stong pa nyid dang /_gzugs mtshan ma yod pa nyid dang /_gzugs 
[\[66a.7\]]mtshan ma med pa nyid dang /_gzugs smon pa yod pa nyid dang /_gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa mi stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa yod pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[66b.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod don gyi dbang gang nye bar bzung nas/_'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_
[\[66b.3\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de gzugs bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_bdag yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_bdag med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_ma zhi ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_stong pa 
[\[66b.4\]]nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mi stong pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_smon pa yod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_smon pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[66b.5\]]dpa' tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_
[\[66b.6\]]mi stong pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ma yin zhes zer/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' gzugs 
[\[66b.7\]]kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]ldan 'das rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su 'gyur ba dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba 
[\[67a.2\]]dang /_bdag mchis pa dang /_bdag ma mchis pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa dang /_mtshan ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs 
[\[67a.3\]]na/_byang chub sems dpa' gzugs smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i tshig 
[\[67a.4\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_de bzhin du bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag mchis pa dang /_bdag ma mchis pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa dang /_mtshan ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[67a.5\]]smon pa mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/byang chub 
[\[67a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas gzugs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]mi dmigs/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]mi dmigs/_gzugs rtag pa dang /_mi rtag 
[\[67a.7\]]pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mi stong pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]mi dmigs/_tshor 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]mi dmigs/_rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mi 
[\[67b.2\]]stong pa dang /_mtshan ma yod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa yod pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i bar gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]mi dmigs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag 
[\[67b.3\]]gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes de skad ces zer ba yang rab 'byor chos kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos 
[\[67b.4\]]kyi dbyings kyis kyang gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba'i khams dang /_'du shes kyi khams dang /_'du byed kyi khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis 
[\[67b.5\]]kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig gi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_yid kyi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang 
[\[67b.6\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi khams kyis 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyis kyang 'dus byas kyi khams yang dag par 
[\[67b.7\]]rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dus byas la ma gtogs par yang 'dus ma byas gdags par mi nus la/_'dus ma byas la ma gtogs par yang 'dus byas gdags par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]pa la de ltar spyod pas chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur te/_chos gang la yang de'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing /_de'i yid 'gyod par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[68a.2\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_
[\[68a.3\]]mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_ma rig pa 
[\[68a.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'dod chags yang 
[\[68a.5\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_bdag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_skye ba po dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_
[\[68a.6\]]byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'dod pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_nyan thos dang /_nyan thos 
[\[68a.7\]]kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sangs rgyas yang 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_byang chub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_mi skrag 
[\[68b.2\]]mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ci'i slad du chos thams cad la sems mi zhum mi 'gong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[68b.3\]]rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_chos 
[\[68b.4\]]thams cad la sems zhum par mi 'gyur zhing 'gong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid skrag par mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[68b.5\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang sems kyi chos rnams dang /_yid dang yid kyi chos rnams mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 
[\[68b.6\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs 
[\[68b.7\]]shing /_byang chub sems dpa' de dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming de dang /_byang chub kyi sems de yang mi dmigs na/_'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams pa yin te/_'di nyid rjes su bstan pa yin no/_/
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_rab 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste/_drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[69a.2\]]chen po gzugs yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[69a.3\]]pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid yongs su 
[\[69a.4\]]rtogs par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[69a.5\]]po sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[69a.6\]]bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su rtogs par 
[\[69a.7\]]'tshal ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su rtogs par 'tshal ba dang /_yid kyi 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma rig pa yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/
[\[69b.2\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi yongs su rtogs par 'tshal 
[\[69b.3\]]bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spang bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[69b.4\]]po 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang bar 'tshal ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems spang bar 'tshal ba dang /_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_
[\[69b.5\]]gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags yongs su rtogs par 'tshal ba dang /_kun tu sbyor ba dang /_bag la nyal dang /_kun nas ldang ba rnams spang bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor 
[\[69b.6\]]ba bzhi dang /_chu bo bzhi dang /_mdud pa bzhi dang /_len pa bzhi dang /_phyin ci log bzhi'i bar du spang bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu spang bar 'tshal bas/_
[\[69b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[70a.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad 
[\[70a.3\]]med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_so so yang 
[\[70a.4\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub 
[\[70a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal ba dang /_
[\[70a.6\]]seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad thob par 'tshal ba dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal ba dang /_rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla 
[\[70a.7\]]ba'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpung bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i 
[\[70b.2\]]tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad shes pa'i bzod pa la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyogs bcur rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi gzungs kyi sgo'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad brjed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[70b.3\]]dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i rnam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha'i gnas la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[70b.4\]]rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bdud bzhi'i dpung stobs med par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_stobs bcu'i stobs kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[70b.5\]]nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de dag dang /_gzhan dag kyang thob 
[\[70b.6\]]par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po drug pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bsam 
[\[70b.7\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yongs su rdzogs pas ngan song rnams su mi ltung ba dang /_rigs dma' ba 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]rnams su mi skye ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon gyi spyi gtsug tu mi ltung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/_/de 
[\[71a.2\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i skyon gyi spyi gtsug tu ltung ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[71a.3\]]thabs la mi mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_thabs la mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten te nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par yang 
[\[71a.4\]]mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/_'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon du 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[71a.5\]]chen po'i skyon zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_chos la sred pa'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos la sred pa gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[71a.6\]]la spyod pa na gzugs la stong zhes bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te/_kun tu shes pa dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te/_kun tu shes pa de ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang 
[\[71a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste/_skyon zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes pa dang /_gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]med pa dang mi sdug pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes pa de ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[71b.2\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen cing 
[\[71b.3\]]gnas te kun tu shes pa de ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon no/_/gal te 'di ltar gzugs spang bar bya'o/_/'dis gzugs spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[71b.4\]]rnam par shes pa spang bar bya'o/_/'dis spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o/_/'dis sdug bsngal ba yongs su shes par bya'o/_/'di ltar kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o/_/'dis kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar 'gog pa mngon sum du 
[\[71b.5\]]bya'o/_/'dis 'gog pa mngon sum du bya'o/_/'di ltar lam bsgom par bya'o/_/'dis lam bsgom par bya'o/_/'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par byang ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni bsten par bya ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni bsten par mi bya ba'o/_/'di la ni byang chub 
[\[71b.6\]]sems dpas spyad par bya'o/_/'di la ni spyad par mi bya'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo/_/'di ni lam ma yin no/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o/_/'di ni bslab pa ma yin no/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni tshul 
[\[71b.7\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/_/'di ni thabs la mkhas pa ma yin no/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa'o/_/'di ni skyon no zhes bya bar chos de dag la mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[72a.2\]]chen po'i 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[72a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[72a.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chen po stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_don dam pa stong pa nyid 
[\[72a.5\]]la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes 
[\[72a.6\]]su mi mthong /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[72a.7\]]mthong /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rang gi 
[\[72b.2\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_
[\[72b.3\]]dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[72b.4\]]pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[72b.5\]]de ltar spyod na/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pas gzugs shes par bya ste/_des rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/_/
[\[72b.6\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste/_des rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/_/mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid shes par bya ste/_des rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/_/gzugs 
[\[72b.7\]]dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams shes par bya ste/_des rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste/_des rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste/_de dag gis rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/_/bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes par bya ste/_de dag gis rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[73a.2\]]du mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_mig lnga dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs 
[\[73a.3\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po dag shes par bya ste/_de dag gis rlom sems su yang mi bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas byang chub kyi sems kyis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o/_/mi mnyam pa 
[\[73a.4\]]dang mnyam pa'i sems dang /_rlabs po che'i sems kyis kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems de sems ma yin te/_sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang 
[\[73a.5\]]yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems gang 'dod chags dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin/_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin/_kun nas ldang ba rnams dang /_sgrib pa rnams dang /_bag la nyal ba 
[\[73a.6\]]rnams dang /_kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang lta bar gyur pa rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems rnams dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o/_/
[\[73a.7\]]shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems gang la sems ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sems de yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci gang sems ma yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa dmigs pa yod par 'gyur ram/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]pa rab 'byor de ni med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te sems ma yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa med cing mi dmigs na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di skad smras te/_sems gang la sems ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i sems de yod dam zhes brgal 
[\[73b.2\]]zhing brtag pa 'di ji ga rigs sam/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems ma yin pa de gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems ma yin pa ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par mi rtog pa ste/_de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de/_
[\[73b.3\]]'di ni sems ma yin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar sems 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[73b.4\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/_ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur 
[\[73b.5\]]ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med dam/_de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med dam/_de bzhin du skye mched 
[\[73b.6\]]rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[73b.7\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_stobs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]ji ltar sems 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[74a.2\]]mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/'di lta ste khyod ni bcom ldan 
[\[74a.3\]]'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa/_zhal nas skyes pa/_chos las skyes pa/_chos kyis sprul pa/_chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_zang zing gi bgo skal la spyod pa ma yin pa/_chos rnams la mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan pa lus mngon sum du gyur pa ste nyan thos 
[\[74a.4\]]nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/_bstan pa 'di'ang de'i tshul dang 'dra'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[74a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yang 'di las yongs su shes par bya'o/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[74a.6\]]po nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang bsgrims te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[74a.7\]]sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang bsgrims te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas kyis gang dag la bslab par bya ba'i theg pa gsum po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[74b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[74b.3\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang 
[\[74b.4\]]dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du chos gang gis chos gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi ste/_'di nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[74b.5\]]'di ltar bdag gis chos thams cad ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming tsam gyis ji ltar 'phel ba dang 'grib par bgyi ste/_'di nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 
[\[74b.6\]]'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ming de ma mchis pas/_de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/_thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi 'phel 
[\[74b.7\]]ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]gdags par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ming de ma mchis pas/_de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[75a.2\]]bdag gis mig gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched 
[\[75a.3\]]dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes ji ltar ming du gdags par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi ming dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[75a.4\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi ming de dag ni gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ming de dag ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/_thug pa ma mchis pa lags 
[\[75a.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs 
[\[75a.6\]]yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes ming du 
[\[75a.7\]]gdags par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ming gang lags pa de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ming de ma mchis pas/_de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/_thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rna ba dang /_
[\[75b.2\]]sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang /_'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa'i khams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_
[\[75b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma rig pa'i 'phel ba dang /_
[\[75b.4\]]'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi'i 
[\[75b.5\]]'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kun nas ldang ba rnams dang /_sgrib 
[\[75b.6\]]pa rnams dang /_bag la nyal ba rnams dang /_kun tu sbyor ba rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 
[\[75b.7\]]'das bdag gis bdag gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_skye ba po dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po rnams kyi 'phel ba dang /_'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 
[\[76a.2\]]'das bdag gis tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong pa nyid thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma 
[\[76a.3\]]dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po 
[\[76a.4\]]dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i 'phel ba dang /_'grib pa ma 
[\[76a.5\]]dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 
[\[76a.6\]]sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs rngub pa dang /_
[\[76a.7\]]'byung ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig lnga dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[76b.2\]]ming de ma mchis pas/_de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/_thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgyu 
[\[76b.3\]]ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag gi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 
[\[76b.4\]]dben pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag 
[\[76b.5\]]par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam 
[\[76b.6\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis dge ba dang /_mi dge ba rnams dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[76b.7\]]zag pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas rnams dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]rnams dang /_'khor ba pa rnams dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa 
[\[77a.2\]]ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin 
[\[77a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho dang /_nub 
[\[77a.4\]]dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang 
[\[77a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das ming de yang gnas pa ma 
[\[77a.6\]]mchis/_thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ming de ma mchis pas/_de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par 
[\[77a.7\]]rjes su ma mthong /_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming yang ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ming de ma mchis pas/_de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/_thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_gang yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos nyid kyi brdar gdags pa de yang phung po rnams 
[\[77b.2\]]sam/_khams rnams sam/_skye mched rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du gang du yang brjod du ma mchis te/_chos su gdags pa tsam du bas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis 
[\[77b.3\]]pa lags so/_/sgyu ma dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/nam mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/de bzhin du sa dang /_chu 
[\[77b.4\]]dang /_me dang /_rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos 
[\[77b.5\]]kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[77b.6\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi ba dang /_shes rab ces bgyi ba dang /_rnam par grol ba zhes bgyi ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[77b.7\]]ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i ming dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba dang /_
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i ming dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[78a.2\]]ming ni dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung bstan du mchis pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'am/_rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bdag gam/_bdag 
[\[78a.3\]]ma mchis pa'am/_zhi ba'am/_ma zhi ba'am/_dben pa'am/_mi dben pa'am/_dngos po'am/_dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas 'di skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 
[\[78a.4\]]'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gis 'gyod par 'gyur ba lags so zhes gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[78a.5\]]ldan 'das ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ming de ma mchis pas/_de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/_thug pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[78a.6\]]pa brjod pa'i tshe/_sems zhum par mi 'gyur/_kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur la 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing /_mi skrag_/mi dngang la/_dngang bar mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas nas rnam pa 
[\[78a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos la gnas par

[\[78b.3\]]la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i 
[\[78b.4\]]khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_

[\[79a\]]

[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/_rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rga shi ma lags la/_rga shi las gud na yang stong pa nyid

[\[79b.7\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de sangs

[\[80a.3\]]ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[80a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags 
[\[80a.5\]]pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags la/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/_stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[80a.7\]]rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/_stong 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[80b.2\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/gcig brjod pa dang /_gnyis brjod pa dang /_tha dad pa brjod pa 
[\[80b.3\]]la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yi ge rnams ni yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/_bcom ldan 'das yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yi ge rnams ma lags la/_yi ge rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_yi ge rnams 
[\[80b.4\]]nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/_stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan 
[\[80b.5\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/
[\[80b.6\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs mi rtag pa ni gzugs mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/_mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/_
[\[80b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa ni rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma 
[\[81a.2\]]lags la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/_mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/_stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[81a.3\]]pas rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[81a.4\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[81a.5\]]dben pa ni rnam par shes pa'i dben pas stong ste/_rnam par shes pa'i dben pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang dben pa nyid ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang dben pa nyid lags dben pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags 
[\[81a.6\]]pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_rnam par shes pa dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[81a.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de de bzhin nyid ma lags la/_stong 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/_de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/_stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin 
[\[81b.2\]]nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[81b.3\]]spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong ste/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzungs kyi sgo ma lags la/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzungs kyi 
[\[81b.4\]]sgo ma mchis te/_gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/_stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_gzungs kyi sgo thams 
[\[81b.5\]]cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/_de gzugs mngon 
[\[81b.6\]]par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas na/_de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[81b.7\]]phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[82a.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/_gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas na/_de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/
[\[82a.3\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[82a.4\]]ma lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas 
[\[82a.5\]]gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' la 
[\[82a.6\]]gnas na/_de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/_shes 
[\[82a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rang 
[\[82b.2\]]bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/_gzugs ma lags shing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas rnam par shes pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[82b.3\]]yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[82b.4\]]de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par brtag par bgyi ste/_ci nas chos gang la yang 
[\[82b.5\]]yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ste/_rgya che ba phul du bgyi ba/_tshad ma mchis pa/_des pa 
[\[82b.6\]]mi 'phrogs pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[82b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[83a.2\]]nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni mtshan mar brjod pa ma lags te/_'di ltar mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/mtshan ma gang lags zhe na/_gzugs ni mtshan 
[\[83a.3\]]ma lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/mig ni mtshan ma lags so/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni mtshan ma lags so/_/gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so/_/sgra 
[\[83a.4\]]dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par 
[\[83a.5\]]shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/mig gi 
[\[83a.6\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_yid 
[\[83a.7\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so/_/sa'i khams ni mtshan ma lags so/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma lags so/_/ma rig pa ni mtshan ma 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]lags so/_/'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi ni mtshan ma lags so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong 
[\[83b.2\]]ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_stong pa 
[\[83b.3\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so/_/yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma 
[\[83b.4\]]lags so/_/gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/gnyis brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/tha dad pa brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/mngon par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so/_/gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad ni mtshan ma lags te/_de ni nyon mongs 
[\[83b.5\]]pa zhes bgyi'o/_/gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba zhig lags na ni kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs de bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur lags so/_/dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid 
[\[83b.6\]]ches pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten pa dang /_sems pa dang /_'jal ba dang /_dpyod pa ste/_de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lags so/_/de ltar de ni mtshan ma dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_gzung ba ma 
[\[83b.7\]]mchis par bzung bar bgyi ba lags te/_kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas/_dad pas rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i shes pas zhugs te/_de zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa po ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o/_/de yang ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des shes pa de thob pa dang /_mngon 
[\[84a.2\]]par rtogs pa lags par nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa lags par phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa lags par gzhan du yang 
[\[84a.3\]]yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des gang gis rtogs par bgyid pa dang /_gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang /_gang rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos de ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par 
[\[84a.4\]]rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[84a.5\]]rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i nang dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_phyi nang 
[\[84a.6\]]stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin du shes pa de yang 
[\[84a.7\]]dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/_/rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/_de 'dir mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyi ste/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye
