[\[84b.2\]]shes la zhugs par gyur te/_de de ltar mos nas/_des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis lags so/_/chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa dang /_gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du/_des gang yongs su 
[\[84b.3\]]gzung bar bgyi ba'am gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/_chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i 
[\[84b.4\]]slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan 
[\[84b.5\]]gyi pha rol tu mchi bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/_/de ni smon lam dag yongs su ma rdzogs shing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[84b.6\]]mi 'da' lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_smon lam de dag smon lam ma lags/_stobs de dag stobs ma lags/_mi 'jigs pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/_so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags shing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[84b.7\]]rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/_de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/_chos ma lags pa yang ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchi bas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bdun pa/_bcom 
[\[85a.2\]]ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_'di ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 
[\[85a.3\]]ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig na zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/_/de de ltar yongs su rtog cing /_de ltar nges par sems pa'i tshe/_gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su 
[\[85a.4\]]mthong na/_de legs par mthong ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med cing 
[\[85a.5\]]mi dmigs pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong 
[\[85a.6\]]pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa 
[\[85a.7\]]stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang 
[\[85b.2\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[85b.3\]]chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/_/mngon par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos nyid 
[\[85b.4\]]dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang 
[\[85b.5\]]chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/_thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[85b.6\]]pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems 
[\[85b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[86a.2\]]bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral 
[\[86a.3\]]ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral 
[\[86a.4\]]ba'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[86a.5\]]gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs 
[\[86a.6\]]kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_'di 
[\[86a.7\]]ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o/_/tshe 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral 
[\[86b.2\]]ba'o/_/mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/_/mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[86b.3\]]pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[86b.4\]]zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par byung ba med pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni 
[\[86b.5\]]gzugs kyis stong ste/_de la skye ba dang nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang 
[\[86b.6\]]dag pa'i mthas stong ste/_de la skye ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/_/de ji lta ji ltar bla na 
[\[86b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa dang /_nga rgyal dang ldan pa 
[\[87a.2\]]dang /_sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang ldan pa dang /_chags pa dang ldan pa dang /_lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed cing /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_sgyu dang /_g.yo 
[\[87a.3\]]dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_chags pa dang /_lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing /_rtag par rgyun du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su 
[\[87a.4\]]mi skye'o/_/de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang 
[\[87a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi gtang bar spyad par bya 
[\[87a.6\]]ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes 
[\[87a.7\]]bya ste/_brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyod na/_mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags 
[\[87b.2\]]so/_/gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod 
[\[87b.3\]]na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/_gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[87b.4\]]shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/_gal te gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba'am bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/_gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[87b.5\]]rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba'am/_bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/_gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/_ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/_gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[87b.6\]]rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/_mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/_gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/_gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[87b.7\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba'am mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]thabs la mi mkhas pas/_gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/_de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_mig lnga dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams 
[\[88a.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du 
[\[88a.3\]]bdag ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na/_dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang 
[\[88a.4\]]de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems na/_de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so/_/
[\[88a.5\]]shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[88a.6\]]la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/_de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[88a.7\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/_de ni de'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa byed pa yin no/_/zhes kho bo smra'o/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/_gal te mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_gzugs 
[\[88b.2\]]la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[88b.3\]]dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_gal te rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing 
[\[88b.4\]]kun tu shes te mos/_gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_gal te rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid 
[\[88b.5\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_mig lnga 
[\[88b.6\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas shing kun tu shes te 
[\[88b.7\]]mos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/_mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]yin te/_mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi thar zhing /_sdug bsngal la sogs pa 
[\[89a.2\]]las yongs su mi 'grol lo/_/zhes kho bo smra'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[89a.3\]]bar lta ga la 'gyur te/_de ni gnas med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[89a.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/_thabs mkhas par rig par bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/_gzugs la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_
[\[89a.5\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/_gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces 
[\[89a.6\]]bya ba dang /_bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces 
[\[89a.7\]]bya ba dang /_bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]ces bya ba dang /_smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[89b.2\]]smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/_tshe dang 
[\[89b.3\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/_stong pa nyid las gud 
[\[89b.4\]]na yang gzugs med/_gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/_
[\[89b.5\]]stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams 
[\[89b.6\]]dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[89b.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/_stong pa nyid kyang sangs 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos rnams yin la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang 
[\[90a.2\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te 
[\[90a.3\]]chos 'ga' zhig khas len na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khas mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khas len kyang len la/_khas mi len kyang mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/khas 
[\[90a.4\]]len pa yang ma yin/_khas mi len pa yang ma yin na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len/_rab 'byor 
[\[90a.5\]]gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/_rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[90a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/_mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/_spyod kyang spyod la/_mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/_spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len 
[\[90a.7\]]to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/_rgya che ba phul du bya ba/_tshad med pa/_nges pa/_mi 
[\[90b.2\]]'phrogs pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_
[\[90b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[90b.4\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis 
[\[90b.5\]]gnas pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 
[\[90b.6\]]'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/_ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam 
[\[90b.7\]]par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyi 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya 
[\[91a.2\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[91a.3\]]rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[91a.4\]]'dzin dang /_phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' khyab par byed 
[\[91a.5\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang po tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 
[\[91a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[91a.7\]]sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]'dzin dang /_'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[91b.2\]]nge 'dzin dang /_zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab sgron ma zhes bya 
[\[91b.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems gnas pa zhes bya 
[\[91b.4\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[91b.5\]]dang /_dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyis 'phags zhing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[91b.6\]]nge 'dzin dang /_yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas med par 
[\[91b.7\]]spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[92a.2\]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[92a.3\]]bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[92a.4\]]'dzin dang /_brda dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes 
[\[92a.5\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i 
[\[92a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[92a.7\]]nge 'dzin dang /_snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[92b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas la brten pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur 
[\[92b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de/_ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[92b.4\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/_ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[92b.5\]]ste/_gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 
[\[92b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na 
[\[92b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing /_da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/_ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ni 
[\[93a.2\]]snyoms par zhugs so/_/bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/_/bdag ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[93a.3\]]shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[93a.4\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/_ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la ting nge 
[\[93a.5\]]'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan 
[\[93a.6\]]ma yin la/_ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/_ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/_ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_
[\[93a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun tu shes sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu shes pa med do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar kun tu shes pa med/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_chos thams cad med pa'i phyir de ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_rigs kyi 
[\[93b.2\]]bu des ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par mi shes shing /_kun tu mi shes so/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_des rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[93b.3\]]dpa' chen po de med pa nyid kyi phyir/_rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa khyod kyis bshad pa ni de 
[\[93b.4\]]yin te/_tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so/_/legs so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[93b.5\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la yang de ltar 
[\[93b.6\]]bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i 
[\[93b.7\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la slob ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/_/
[\[94a.2\]]de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 
[\[94a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bus 
[\[94a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/_/shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar dag mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_phung po 
[\[94a.5\]]dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[94a.6\]]phyir/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[94a.7\]]brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa 
[\[94b.2\]]med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[94b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la slob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang mi slob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[94b.4\]]rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/_de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/_de'i 
[\[94b.5\]]phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs 
[\[94b.6\]]yod pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/_
[\[94b.7\]]khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin na/_de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang /_sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/_yod pa ma 
[\[95a.2\]]yin pa la mngon par zhen nas/_'di lta ste rtag pa dang /_chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas na/_de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/_de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags pas/_ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing /_dran pa 
[\[95a.3\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la yang mngon par zhen to/_/de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na/_yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir te/_de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin no/_/
[\[95a.4\]]ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/_gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi 
[\[95a.5\]]shes mi mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/_/de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/_gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/_'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba 
[\[95a.6\]]ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/de dag ni ma dad pa yin te ci zhig la ma dad ce 
[\[95a.7\]]na/_gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar ma dad pa nas/_byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dag la ma dad pa yin no/_/de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/_ci zhig la mi gnas zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa 
[\[95b.2\]]yin te/_de'i phyir byis pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/_ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/_gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa 
[\[95b.3\]]yin no/_/mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/
[\[95b.4\]]phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no/_/byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/_
[\[95b.5\]]de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 
[\[95b.6\]]mi 'byung ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus 
[\[95b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas/_mngon par zhen par byed/_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[96a.2\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtags 
[\[96a.3\]]nas mngon par zhen par byed de/_shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar 
[\[96a.4\]]slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags mod/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[96a.5\]]dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags 
[\[96a.6\]]shing /_ji ltar bskabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs 
[\[96a.7\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_
[\[96b.2\]]thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[96b.3\]]phyin pa la slob pa yin te/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[96b.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las mtshan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad 
[\[96b.5\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/_bcom 
[\[96b.6\]]ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/_de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[96b.7\]]bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang /_rnam 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/_
[\[97a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[97a.3\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_mig 
[\[97a.4\]]kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_
[\[97a.5\]]chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyama'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 
[\[97a.6\]]rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 
[\[97a.7\]]'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus 
[\[97b.2\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[97b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[97b.4\]]pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_smon pa med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[97b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar 
[\[97b.6\]]dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma yang gzhan la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rab 'byor 
[\[97b.7\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang 
[\[98a.2\]]gzhan ma lags/_mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/_
[\[98a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so/_/
[\[98a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma 
[\[98a.5\]]lags/_mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i 
[\[98a.6\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[98a.7\]]ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_rna ba'i 'dus te 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lags so/_/
[\[98b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang ma lags/_bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor 
[\[98b.3\]]ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang ma lags/_bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang ma lags/_bde ba yang ma lags pa 
[\[98b.4\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[98b.5\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang ma lags/_bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang ma lags/_bde ba yang 
[\[98b.6\]]ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang ma lags/_bde ba yang ma lags pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[98b.7\]]sum cu rtsa bdun yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]lags te/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma 
[\[99a.2\]]lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_smon pa ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/
[\[99a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[99a.4\]]'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so/_/bcom 
[\[99a.5\]]ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[99a.6\]]rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma la skye 
[\[99a.7\]]ba'am 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[99b.2\]]ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po brgyad pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[99b.3\]]sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming dang brdas tha snyad du gdags su yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_ming dang brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye 
[\[99b.4\]]bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[99b.5\]]ji snyam du sems/_gang la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_brda med pa dang gdags pa med pa dang tha snyad med pa dang /_ming med pa dang /_ming du gdags pa med pa dang /_lus med pa dang /_lus kyi las med pa dang /_ngag med pa dang /_ngag gi las med pa dang /_yid med 
[\[99b.6\]]pa dang /_yid kyi las med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[99b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]pa la de ltar bslabs na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[100a.2\]]pa la de ltar slob cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag 
[\[100a.3\]]lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 
[\[100a.4\]]'gyur snyam 'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/_
[\[100a.5\]]dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung 
[\[100a.6\]]bar 'gyur snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'byung lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[100a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_brag ca lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_chu zla lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag ca ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/_mig 
[\[100b.2\]]yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/_chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/_sgyu ma yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/_smig rgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/_sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/_gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma 
[\[100b.3\]]mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma 
[\[100b.4\]]lta bu lags te/_rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing /_de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/_de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/de 
[\[100b.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[100b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yang yin la/_thabs la yang mi mkhas par rig ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma song na/_skrag cing dngang la/_dngang bar yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[100b.7\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[101a.2\]]pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[101a.3\]]pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bdag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag 
[\[101a.4\]]med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[101a.5\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[101a.6\]]med pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[101a.7\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/
[\[101b.2\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[101b.3\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces 
[\[101b.4\]]bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad 
[\[101b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang 
[\[101b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[101b.7\]]rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs 
[\[102a.2\]]so/_/gzugs la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/gzugs 
[\[102a.3\]]la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[102a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[102a.5\]]gyis bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba 
[\[102a.6\]]dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug 
[\[102a.7\]]bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]du sems so/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[102b.2\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[102b.3\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_de yang mi 
[\[102b.4\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs mtshan ma med ces 
[\[102b.5\]]bya ba dang /_gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag med ces 
[\[102b.6\]]bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed 
[\[102b.7\]]de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[103a.2\]]med pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 
[\[103a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/
[\[103a.4\]]gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[103a.5\]]gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya 
[\[103a.6\]]ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/_de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing /_
[\[103a.7\]]brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang /_de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod par byed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam 
[\[103b.2\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[103b.3\]]la spyod pa ni/_'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam 
[\[103b.4\]]par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/_mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang mig go/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus 
[\[103b.5\]]dang /_yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/_yid stong pa ma yin gyi/_yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang yid do/_/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro 
[\[103b.6\]]dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong 
[\[103b.7\]]pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_yid kyi 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/
[\[104a.2\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus 
[\[104a.3\]]te reg pa'o/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/
[\[104a.4\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[104a.5\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_dran pa nye bar
