[\[104a.6\]]gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam gyi stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa ma yin 
[\[104a.7\]]gyi lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang lam mo/_/stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid kyang sangs 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos rnams te/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/_thabs de dang ldan na byang chub 
[\[104b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang 
[\[104b.3\]]zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi 
[\[104b.4\]]rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[104b.5\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni byang 
[\[104b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[104b.7\]]stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba 
[\[105a.2\]]dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_/dben zhes bya bar ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[105a.3\]]yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/_sdug bsngal 
[\[105a.4\]]zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[105a.5\]]ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa'i nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi rtag ces bya bar ston/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[105a.6\]]zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_/mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs 
[\[105a.7\]]par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar ston te/_de yang 
[\[105b.2\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /_de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug 
[\[105b.3\]]bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_
[\[105b.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang 
[\[105b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi 
[\[105b.6\]]zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[105b.7\]]nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /_de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_de bzhin du sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa 
[\[106a.2\]]med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi 
[\[106a.3\]]bsngo ba ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos 
[\[106a.4\]]ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /_de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang 
[\[106a.5\]]po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs 
[\[106a.6\]]su mi bsngo ba dang /_de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/_de yang mi 
[\[106a.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_byang chub sgom du gzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/_rab 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/_de dag gis yongs su zin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[106b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/_sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/_dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba 
[\[106b.3\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/_shes 
[\[106b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs 
[\[106b.5\]]te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya 
[\[106b.6\]]bar yid la byed/_gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa nang stong 
[\[106b.7\]]pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /_nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/_phyi stong pa 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]nyid de yang dmigs/_phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang /_mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_
[\[107a.2\]]mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /_stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar 
[\[107a.3\]]yid la byed/_yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /_stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[107a.4\]]du gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams la yang bya'o/_/de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_
[\[107a.5\]]lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_phyi nang 
[\[107a.6\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /_stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_ma rig pa dang /_rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la 
[\[107a.7\]]byed/_phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing /_stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i 
[\[107b.2\]]tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[107b.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing /_de dag kyang dmigs te/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/_rab 'byor byang 
[\[107b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/_dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[107b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis te/_sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste/_dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub 
[\[107b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o/_/'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/_/
[\[107b.7\]]gzung bar mi bya'o/_/kun chub par mi bya'o/_/bcang bar mi bya'o/_/klag par mi bya'o/_/bsgom par mi bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/_/gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par 
[\[108a.2\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms 
[\[108a.3\]]pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas 
[\[108a.4\]]khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi rjod pa gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[108a.5\]]dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i 
[\[108a.6\]]sde dang /_skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/_rab tu ston par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_gsal bar byed/_yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing /_bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro zhes de la bdud kyi las 
[\[108a.7\]]rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/_bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med do/_/khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no/_/khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so 
[\[108b.2\]]zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[108b.3\]]dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/gzugs ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya 
[\[108b.4\]]dang /_chos rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag 
[\[108b.5\]]dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/mig gi 
[\[108b.6\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus 
[\[108b.7\]]te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[109a.2\]]dang lam dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang 
[\[109a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[109a.4\]]ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/_'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/_byang chub sems dpa' yang med/_nyan thos kyang med do/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[109a.5\]]dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/_'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/_byang chub sems dpa' yang med/_nyan thos kyang med do zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por 
[\[109a.6\]]rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i 
[\[109a.7\]]yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te/_rjes su ston par byed do zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang /_slob 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]dpon gyi cha byad du bsgyur cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed la/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang 'bral bar byed cing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed/_
[\[109b.2\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la yang sbyor bar byed/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang sbyor bar byed cing /_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shig_/
[\[109b.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can pha 
[\[109b.4\]]dang ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu gang gi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa gcad pa dang /_rkang pa gcad pa dang /_mgo gcad pa dpag tu med pa dag 
[\[109b.5\]]nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod 
[\[109b.6\]]pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing /_byang chub sems 
[\[109b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/_mig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/_de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes 
[\[110a.2\]]bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces 
[\[110a.3\]]bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs 
[\[110a.4\]]rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar 
[\[110a.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /_
[\[110a.6\]]dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/_rig nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_
[\[110a.7\]]sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub kyang skye ba med sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/_rab 'byor byang chub dang /_sems dpa' la skye ba dang 
[\[110b.2\]]yod pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor byang chub la yang gzhi med/_sems dpa' la yang gzhi med de/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[110b.3\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma la 
[\[110b.4\]]gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[110b.5\]]'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid 
[\[110b.6\]]dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs 
[\[110b.7\]]dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[111a.2\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba'i rnam 
[\[111a.3\]]par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[111a.4\]]dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[111a.5\]]dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[111a.6\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[111a.7\]]brgyad pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[111b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[111b.3\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[111b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gzhi med do/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/_/
[\[111b.5\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[111b.6\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med 
[\[111b.7\]]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/_/'dus byas kyi khams 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]la yang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skye ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/rab 
[\[112a.2\]]'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'gag pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dmigs su med 
[\[112a.3\]]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[112a.4\]]ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/_/skye ba 
[\[112a.5\]]med pa la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi gzhi med do/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la 
[\[112a.6\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do/_/de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la khams dang skye mched rnams kyi gzhi 
[\[112a.7\]]med do/_/skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gzugs la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med 
[\[112b.2\]]pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[112b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do/_/
[\[112b.4\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[112b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/_/rab 
[\[112b.6\]]'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don med do/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/_/rab 
[\[112b.7\]]'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[113a.2\]]yan lag dang /_lam dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[113a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_bdag med pa'i phyir/_bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/_/shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du shin tu 
[\[113a.4\]]rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba la mun pa'i gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[113a.5\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sreg pa'i bskal pa la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[113a.6\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 
[\[113a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gzhi med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab la 'chal 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]pa'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[113b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[113b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gza' dang /_skar ma dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_glog gi 'od la gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[113b.4\]]dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang /_'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_
[\[113b.5\]]tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi 'od la gzhi med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do/_/
[\[113b.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa 
[\[113b.7\]]med pa/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/_/rab 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du 
[\[114a.2\]]chud par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung bstan du yod pa dang /_lung du ma bstan pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag 
[\[114a.3\]]pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_thun mong dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dag go/_/rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi 
[\[114a.4\]]med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po dgu pa/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[114a.5\]]'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phar 'dzin pa dang /_mar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed 
[\[114a.6\]]pa dang /_sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_'jig rten pa'i 
[\[114a.7\]]rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus gong 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]gi 'du shes dang /_rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa 
[\[114b.2\]]dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten 
[\[114b.3\]]pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod 
[\[114b.4\]]pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba dang /_khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_'tshig pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_phrag dog 
[\[114b.5\]]dang /_ser sna dang /_nga rgyal te/_rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/
[\[114b.6\]]ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/phung po 
[\[114b.7\]]dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[115a.2\]]pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/_
[\[115a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[115a.4\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /_
[\[115a.5\]]rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /_rnam par thar pa 
[\[115a.6\]]brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/
[\[115a.7\]]de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes 
[\[115b.2\]]mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci yang med do snyam nas/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye 
[\[115b.3\]]mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/_de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[115b.4\]]pa'o/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa 
[\[115b.5\]]dang /_de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas 
[\[115b.6\]]btang snyoms la gnas shing /_dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de bde ba yang 
[\[115b.7\]]spangs/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' 
[\[116a.2\]]mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci yang med do snyam nas/_ci yang med 
[\[116a.3\]]pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /_de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_
[\[116a.4\]]'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/_de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/_/nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang 
[\[116a.5\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rnams te/_de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams 
[\[116a.6\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/_de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang 
[\[116a.7\]]dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag 
[\[116b.2\]]'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/_de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/_chos gang dag la skye ba 
[\[116b.3\]]dang /_'jig pa dang /_gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/_'dod chags zad pa dang /_zhe sdang zad pa dang /_gti mug zad pa dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings nyid 
[\[116b.4\]]dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 
[\[116b.5\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga ste/_de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_rnam par 
[\[116b.6\]]thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang /_dpyod pa med 
[\[116b.7\]]pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang /_yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o/_/chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul 
[\[117a.2\]]byed par 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/_sems can 
[\[117a.3\]]gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_rigs kyis dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_
[\[117a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag go/_/rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste/_byang 
[\[117a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol 
[\[117a.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go 
[\[117a.7\]]cha bgo bar bya'o/_/bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /_sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/_chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/_/bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[117b.2\]]drug la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o/_/chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i 
[\[117b.3\]]phyir bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/_de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 
[\[117b.4\]]'gyur te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug 
[\[117b.5\]]bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_bdag gis sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i 
[\[117b.6\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung 
[\[117b.7\]]po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myang bar bya'o/_/phyis gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/_bskal 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed 
[\[118a.2\]]pa rdo rje lta bu ste/_de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis sems can 
[\[118a.3\]]thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/_gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/_zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/_
[\[118a.4\]]gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/_rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/_des sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing des 
[\[118a.5\]]rlom sems su'ang mi byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems su bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni 'di yin te/_gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas 
[\[118a.6\]]rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[118a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/_gang sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/_des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde bar 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]bya ba'i sems so/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[118b.2\]]sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o/_/chos la dga' bar bya'o/_/chos la kun tu dga' bar bya'o/_/chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/_/de la chos gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/_de ni chos zhes 
[\[118b.3\]]bya'o/_/de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/_gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste/_de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/_gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/_de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la kun tu dga' ba gang zhe na/_
[\[118b.4\]]gang chos la yon tan dang /_phan yon du lta ba ste/_de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/_chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/_de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[118b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[118b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/
[\[118b.7\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[119a.2\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas/_nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/_de yang 
[\[119a.3\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/_
[\[119a.4\]]de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[119a.5\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis 
[\[119a.6\]]shig_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu 
[\[119a.7\]]dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_slong ba po dang /_kun nas slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba por lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_yod par lta ba dang /_med par lta ba 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dang /_phung por lta ba dang /_khams su lta ba dang /_skye mched du lta ba dang /_dben par lta ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs par lta ba dang /_sangs 
[\[119b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang /_byang chub tu lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas su lta ba dang /_chos su lta ba dang /_dge 'dun du lta ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 
[\[119b.3\]]lta ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad du/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/_don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad 
[\[119b.4\]]ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir zhe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta 
[\[119b.5\]]bar 'gyur ba yin/_shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/_gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_
[\[119b.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[119b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/_mi dmigs 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[120a.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems zag pa med pa'i sems/_mnyam pa med pa'i sems/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[120a.3\]]dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/_don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs 
[\[120a.4\]]pa ma lags pa lags te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[120a.5\]]bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_
[\[120a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin cad chos gang la yang skye ba'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'grib pa dang /_'phel ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam 
[\[120a.7\]]par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_'grib pa med pa dang /_'phel ba med pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_
[\[120b.2\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/_khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la yang chags pa 
[\[120b.3\]]med ces smras na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_gzugs 
[\[120b.4\]]kyang chags pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[120b.5\]]'dres pa rnams kyi bar du yang chags pa med do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang zag pa med cing /_khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes smras na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i 
[\[120b.6\]]skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa med 
[\[120b.7\]]cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/_tshor 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe 
[\[121a.2\]]dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa med cing khongs 
[\[121a.3\]]su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[121a.4\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/
[\[121a.5\]]rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[121a.6\]]'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir/_sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/_tshe dang 
[\[121a.7\]]ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med dam/_tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/_'du shes med pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/_'du byed rnams med pa yang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/_rnam par shes pa med 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/_sangs rgyas 
[\[121b.2\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_
[\[121b.3\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/_/khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[121b.4\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_byang chub 
[\[121b.5\]]kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/_mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[121b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_lta ba spong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[121b.7\]]'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig_/gang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/_sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[122a.2\]]ri'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/_gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[122a.3\]]dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched du/_byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/nyi tshe'i sems can 
[\[122a.4\]]rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo /_/nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_bzod 
[\[122a.5\]]pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par byed do/_/nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 
[\[122a.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams 
[\[122a.7\]]bskyed do/_/nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/_sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o/_/sems can 'di 
[\[122b.2\]]snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[122b.3\]]par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[122b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[122b.5\]]rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de 
[\[122b.6\]]ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam pa thams 
[\[122b.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang /_mos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin 
[\[123a.2\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang 
[\[123a.3\]]yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[123a.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sbyin pa sbyin pa'i 
[\[123a.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_de gcig pu la dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /_de sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs 
[\[123a.6\]]sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/_len pa po yang mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe 
[\[123a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na 
[\[123b.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[123b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[123b.4\]]ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul 
[\[123b.5\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams 
[\[123b.6\]]mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_rnam 
[\[123b.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing /_sems bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs 
[\[124a\]]
