[\[124a.1\]]su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[124a.2\]]pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom sems su yang mi byed la mi dmigs pa de ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[124a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_de'i 
[\[124a.4\]]phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[124a.5\]]yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[124a.6\]]phyin pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha 
[\[124a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/_shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[124b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/_
[\[124b.3\]]sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 
[\[124b.4\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[124b.5\]]gnas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na 
[\[124b.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[124b.7\]]phyin pa la gnas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[125a.2\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing /_chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du 
[\[125a.3\]]shes nye bar 'jog ste/_de yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa 
[\[125a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[125a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang 
[\[125a.6\]]thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[125a.7\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]phyin pa sgom zhing /_de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/_de nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 
[\[125b.2\]]dag gis ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[125b.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshe dang 
[\[125b.4\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug la/_bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myong bar yang mi byed cing /_de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[125b.5\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang snyoms par 'jug la ro myong bar yang mi byed cing /_de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab 
[\[125b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[125b.7\]]smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed de/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig ces 
[\[126a.2\]]bya ba zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing bsngags pa yang gsung la ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing /_
[\[126a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra rjod pa yang mdzad la/_dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa yang mdzad do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[126a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/_gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos 
[\[126a.5\]]rnams las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te 
[\[126a.6\]]gnas pa dang /_de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_mi gnyis pa/_khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs 
[\[126a.7\]]pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_mi gnyis pa/_khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_shin tu 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du 
[\[126b.2\]]shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/_gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i 
[\[126b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/_nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang /_tshad med pa de dag dang /_gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun 
[\[126b.4\]]mong du byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la yang gong ma 
[\[126b.5\]]bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/_
[\[126b.6\]]gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang /_tshad med pa de dag dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing /_de bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la ldang ba na/_
[\[126b.7\]]nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /_gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 
[\[127a.2\]]zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_mi gnyis pa/_kho na med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_shin tu bsgoms 
[\[127a.3\]]pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing /_phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa yang de bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[127a.4\]]bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_mi gnyis pa/_khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_
[\[127a.5\]]nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re khyab par byas nas gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje 
[\[127a.6\]]chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la yang rjod cing ston te rab tu 'chad la/_rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed cing /_de dag gi ro myong ba dang /_
[\[127a.7\]]nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gnon cing sgom ste/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la yang gnas la 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[127b.2\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam 
[\[127b.3\]]nas yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa dang /_khong du chud par byed pa dang /_nye bar nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[127b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing /_brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[127b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad 
[\[127b.6\]]la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[127b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[128a.2\]]tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[128a.3\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dang /_
[\[128a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag sgom pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[128a.5\]]dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing /_bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang /_snying 
[\[128a.6\]]rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing /_sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang /_dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /_bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o/_/zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol pa 
[\[128a.7\]]dang /_btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /_/sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/_bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[128b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas 
[\[128b.3\]]shing /_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/_sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi/_de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing 'dod pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[128b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa 
[\[128b.5\]]rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/_bsam gtan de dag dang /_tshad med pa de dag dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad 
[\[128b.6\]]med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/_de dag gi ro myong bar yang mi byed cing /_de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[128b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la/_de yang mi rtag 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[129a.2\]]kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[129a.3\]]po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[129a.4\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan 
[\[129a.5\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang 
[\[129a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug_/mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug 
[\[129a.7\]]bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe 
[\[129b.2\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug_/da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa yang mi 'jug la/_de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa yang ma yin pa 
[\[129b.3\]]ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[129b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug_/gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/_de 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa 
[\[129b.5\]]yang ma yin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[129b.6\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_zag pa med pa rnams dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi 
[\[129b.7\]]chos rnams la yang shes pa mi 'jug la/_de 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_
[\[130a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya/_gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[130a.3\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang yang dag par gnas la/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/_len pa po yang mi dmigs te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[130a.4\]]dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 
[\[130a.5\]]gnas pa yang de bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[130a.6\]]yang mi dmigs/_yid la byed pa yang mi dmigs te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[130a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dris pa dag gis bsgom pa 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[130b.2\]]pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/
[\[130b.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[130b.4\]]ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag sgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/tshe dang 
[\[130b.5\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[130b.6\]]sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni tha snyad tsam du zad par shes so/_/gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba de yang ming tsam du zad do/_/rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[130b.7\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_yid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/khams rnams dang 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang de bzhin no/_/
[\[131a.2\]]nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos dmigs 
[\[131a.3\]]su med pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de 
[\[131a.4\]]ni ming tsam du zad do/_/sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa 
[\[131a.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/sangs 
[\[131a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang la gang 'os pa'i mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du byed do/_/bla mar byed do/_/ri mor byed do/_/mchod pa byed 
[\[131a.7\]]do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/_theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/_/de theg pa chen po de la zhon te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/_sems can rnams kyang 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]yongs su smin par byed la/_de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /_sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te/_lus ci lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed nus pa de lta bu'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to/_/
[\[131b.2\]]de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha 
[\[131b.3\]]ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/_shar 
[\[131b.4\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa rjod de/_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig theg pa 
[\[131b.5\]]chen po la zhon nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs rjod pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho 
[\[131b.6\]]nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa rjod de/_'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[131b.7\]]dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs rjod pa mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam 
[\[132a.2\]]po bcu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos/_go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen 
[\[132a.3\]]po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[132a.4\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/_yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[132a.5\]]rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam gyi go cha bgos/_nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/_stobs kyi go cha bgos/_mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/_so so yang 
[\[132a.6\]]dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi go cha bgos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar yang 
[\[132a.7\]]byed de/_sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/_sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/_/de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thob ste/_bde ba dang /_yid 
[\[132b.2\]]bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/_gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong zhing mnyes par byar yod pa dang /_lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/_/de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[132b.3\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas sems can rnams byung nas/_gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye'o/_/de bzhin du shar dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_
[\[132b.4\]]'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed cing /_rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar yang byed de/_sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can 
[\[132b.5\]]rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/_sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bya ba'i 
[\[132b.6\]]sgra rjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/_/de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thob ste/_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/_gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[132b.7\]]rnams bzhugs te/_mthong zhing /_bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang /_lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/_/mir skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mnyes par byed do/_/de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang /_gshin 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas sems can de dag shi 'phos te/_gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes 
[\[133a.2\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sems can dmyal ba dag dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten mngon par sprul la/_des 
[\[133a.3\]]mngon par sprul nas/_sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra bsgrags te/_de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba de dag dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[133a.4\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas byung bar gyur na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag nas phyung ba yod 
[\[133a.5\]]snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can rnams ngan 
[\[133a.6\]]'gro gsum po dag las yongs su bkrol yang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su bkrol bar gyur pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[133a.7\]]dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_go cha chen po bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul te/_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/_'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul pa byed do/_/des 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[133b.2\]]du btung ba dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_yo byad dang /_gnas dang /_mal cha dang /_bgo ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad dang /_rtsi sman dang /_gser dang /_
[\[133b.3\]]dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che dang /_byi ru dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_mu tig dang /_rgyan dag dang /_yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed do/_/des zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin zhing yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas sems can de 
[\[133b.4\]]dag la 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 
[\[133b.5\]]'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul te/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing /_mi'i yo 
[\[133b.6\]]byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[133b.7\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing /_mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang /_sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do/_/de 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[134a.2\]]dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/_sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed/_bsam 
[\[134a.3\]]gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god par byed/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag la 'god par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed cing /_
[\[134a.4\]]sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chos bstan pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis 
[\[134a.5\]]lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma 
[\[134a.6\]]mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[134a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang /_sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]las kyi lam la bkod pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[134b.2\]]dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[134b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/_gal te 
[\[134b.4\]]sems can thams cad kyis bdag la dbyig pa dang /_bong ba dang /_khu tshur dang /_lag cha dang /_mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' yang bskyed par mi bya'o snyam zhing /_sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la 'god do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[134b.5\]]'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar cing bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_
[\[134b.6\]]sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[134b.7\]]sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /_sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]'di yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[135a.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/_rab 
[\[135a.3\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 
[\[135a.4\]]'dzud de 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/_lus dang /_sems kyi brtson 
[\[135a.5\]]'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang lus dang /_sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_
[\[135a.6\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad lus dang /_sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[135a.7\]]bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang /_sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[135b.2\]]pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud 
[\[135b.3\]]de 'god ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing /_chos gang la yang rnam par g.yeng ba 'am/_rnam par g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub 
[\[135b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/_des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/_/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag kyang bla na 
[\[135b.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi 
[\[135b.6\]]mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang 
[\[135b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang /_sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid 
[\[136a.2\]]nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[136a.3\]]te/_sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad shes rab kyi 
[\[136a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_
[\[136a.5\]]rnam par byang ba 'am/_tshu rol lam/_pha rol mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/_des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag 
[\[136a.6\]]par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[136a.7\]]pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /_sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[136b.2\]]la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[136b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 
[\[136b.4\]]'khod pa'i sems can dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/_/de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[136b.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed la/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 
[\[136b.6\]]'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/_/sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_
[\[136b.7\]]byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du 'jig 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do/_/de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[137a.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god la 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[137a.3\]]drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/_/sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na 
[\[137a.4\]]sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[137a.5\]]sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[137a.6\]]pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[137a.7\]]drug la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas shing /_sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed de/_bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/_/'di 
[\[137b.2\]]snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[137b.3\]]'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed 
[\[137b.4\]]cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la 
[\[137b.5\]]dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/_/'di snyed cig ni dgod 
[\[137b.6\]]par mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_
[\[137b.7\]]mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la dgod par bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu 
[\[138a.2\]]ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/_'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[138a.3\]]pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[138a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa 
[\[138a.5\]]yod snyam 'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_
[\[138a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar dag la dgod par sems bskyed kyang sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang sems bskyed pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/_
[\[138a.7\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]kyi slad du sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi ba lags pa snyam bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_tshor ba dang /_
[\[138b.2\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /_mig ni mig gis stong /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni yid kyis stong /_gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_
[\[138b.3\]]chos ni chos kyis stong /_mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong /_rna ba dang /_
[\[138b.4\]]sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis 
[\[138b.5\]]tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyis stong /_nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_dngos po med pa'i 
[\[138b.6\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyis stong 
[\[138b.7\]]la/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong /_go cha chen po yang go cha chen pos stong pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams 
[\[139a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas/_ma bshig_/mngon par 'dus ma byas la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/_ma bshig_/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[139a.3\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/_ma bshig_/mngon par 'dus ma bgyis shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po 'tshal ba'i sems can de dag kyang ma bgyis/_ma 
[\[139a.4\]]bshig_/mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/_ma bshig_/mngon par 'dus ma byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[139a.5\]]pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/_ma bshig_/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[139a.6\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_mig ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_gzugs ni mi 
[\[139a.7\]]byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi 
[\[139b.2\]]byed/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor bdag 
[\[139b.3\]]ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_shes pa po dang /_/mthong ba po'i bar ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[139b.4\]]rmi lam ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/sgyu ma dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sprul pa ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi 
[\[139b.5\]]dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon 
[\[139b.6\]]par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs 
[\[139b.7\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ni mi byed mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[140a.2\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang 
[\[140a.3\]]chub ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/_mi 'jig_/mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs 
[\[140a.4\]]pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/_ma bshig_/mngon par 'dus ma byas la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/_
[\[140a.5\]]ma bshig_/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i 
[\[140a.6\]]don 'tshal ba ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so/_/byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[140a.7\]]pa rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba zhes smra'am/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba zhes smra'am/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin no/_/tshe dang 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma 
[\[140b.2\]]grol ba gang yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rmi lam lta bu'i 
[\[140b.3\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du brag ca lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_sprul 
[\[140b.4\]]pa lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/
[\[140b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /_
[\[140b.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_da 
[\[140b.7\]]ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir/_gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir/_
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du 
[\[141a.2\]]bya ba med pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas 
[\[141a.3\]]pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang 
[\[141a.4\]]po de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dge ba'am mi dge ba nas rnam par byang ba'i bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe 
[\[141a.5\]]dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings 
[\[141a.6\]]ma grol ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_med pa'i phyir 
[\[141a.7\]]ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yang ma bcings ma grol 
[\[141b.2\]]ba ste/_med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba/_byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma 
[\[141b.3\]]grol ba ste/_med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 
[\[141b.4\]]dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_med pa dang /_dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/
[\[141b.5\]]skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/de ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar dag kyang 
[\[141b.6\]]ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag dag par bya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[141b.7\]]ldan 'das rnams kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/thos par 'gyur ba'i chos kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]dang /_mig lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed par 'gyur ba yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par 
[\[142a.2\]]'gyur ba yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/theg pa gsum po dag gis sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ba yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa dang /_
[\[142a.3\]]dben pa dang /_skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis chos thams cad mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las ma bcings ma grol ba'i le'u 
[\[142a.4\]]zhes bya ste/_bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam 
[\[142a.5\]]gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi/_theg pa de ni gang la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/_theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags/_theg pa des ni su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/_
[\[142a.6\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor khyod gang 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor pha 
[\[142a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis 'di lta ste/_phyi dang 
[\[142b.2\]]nang gi dngos po rnams sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[142b.3\]]po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[142b.4\]]dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la sems can gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 
[\[142b.5\]]'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[142b.6\]]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis/_bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la/_gzhan dag kyang bzod pa 
[\[142b.7\]]yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed bdag gis bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la 
[\[143a.2\]]brtson pa mi 'dor zhing /_gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[143a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed 
[\[143a.4\]]pa dag gis thabs la mkhas pas bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye la/_gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems 
[\[143a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[143a.6\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[143a.7\]]chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid 
[\[143b.2\]]dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha 
[\[143b.3\]]ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos 
[\[143b.4\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin no/_/de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_nang gi chos rnams te/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid de/_de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_mig ni mig gis 
[\[143b.5\]]stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_rna ba ni rna bas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig 
[\[143b.6\]]pa med pa'i phyir/_sna ni snas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_lce ni lces stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ther zug tu 
[\[143b.7\]]gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_lus ni lus kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_yid ni yid kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_phyi rol gyi chos rnams te/_'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams so/_/de la ther zug tu gnas 
[\[144a.2\]]pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa'i phyir/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_
[\[144a.3\]]chos ni chos kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_nang gi skye mched drug dang /_phyi'i skye mched drug po de dag ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/de
