[\[164a.4\]]stobs bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las rnams 
[\[164a.5\]]dang /_las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi gnas dang /_rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa/_khams dum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang 
[\[164a.6\]]zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang /_mos pa dum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_thams 
[\[164a.7\]]cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]dang /_sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang /_lha'i mig gis 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi 
[\[164b.2\]]mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/phyin chad 'di lta bu med do snyam du rab tu shes shing de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes pa ste/_rab 'byor de 
[\[164b.3\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes 
[\[164b.4\]]dam bcas na/_kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/_chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag 
[\[164b.5\]]la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_bde ba thob cing /_bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng 
[\[164b.6\]]ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_nga zag pa zad 
[\[164b.7\]]do zhes dam bcas na/_kye ma de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_bde ba thob cing /_bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du 
[\[165a.2\]]seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang ngas gang dag bar du 
[\[165a.3\]]gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag bsten na/_bar du gcod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas 
[\[165a.4\]]pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_bde ba thob cing /_bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog 
[\[165a.5\]]rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis 
[\[165a.6\]]bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_ngas 'phags pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam gang dag bstan te/_de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par nges par 'byung ba de dag bsgrubs na/_sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la de dag bsgrubs kyang zag 
[\[165a.7\]]pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'dir 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing /_bag tsha ba med pa thob la/_mi 'jigs pa thob ste/_gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram 
[\[165b.2\]]ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba'o/_/de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[165b.3\]]theg pa chen po yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i 
[\[165b.4\]]tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rig pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[165b.5\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/_'jig rten lha dang bcas 
[\[165b.6\]]pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan nas/_gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i 
[\[165b.7\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang /_ca co med pa dang /_bsnyel ba med pa dang /_tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /_so sor ma 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /_'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /_brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /_shes rab nyams pa med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba nyams pa 
[\[166a.2\]]med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang /_lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_yid kyi las 
[\[166a.3\]]thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_da ltar gyi dus la ma chags 
[\[166a.4\]]ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o/_/de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa 
[\[166a.5\]]chen po ni 'di lta ste/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid dang /_yi ge'i sgo dang /_yi ges 'jug pa'o/_/de la yi ge'i sgo dang /_yi ges 'jug pa gang zhe na/_a zhes bya ba ni gzod ma nas ma skyes 
[\[166a.6\]]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/pa zhes bya ba ni don dam par khyad par med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams 
[\[166a.7\]]cad kyi sgo yin no/_/na zhes bya ba ni ming mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing sred pa'i 'khri shing gi rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/da 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang /_dul bar gnas pa yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/Da zhes bya ba ni khrag khrug dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/
[\[166b.2\]]sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/bA zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam gyi sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ya 
[\[166b.3\]]zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid las 
[\[166b.4\]]mi 'da' zhing mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ma zhes bya ba ni nga yir 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/tha zhes bya ba 
[\[166b.5\]]ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ng+ha zhes bya ba ni chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos 
[\[166b.6\]]thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams 
[\[166b.7\]]cad kyi sgo yin no/_/dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/tsha zhes bya ba ni 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/hU zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/tas zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad 
[\[167a.2\]]la spro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/Tha zhes bya ba ni rnam par bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med 
[\[167a.3\]]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ska zhes bya ba ni phung po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/dza zhes bya ba ni rga ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo 
[\[167a.4\]]yin no/_/tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/Ta zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/ha zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no/_/de yan chad ni yi ger 
[\[167a.5\]]brjod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_gang gis brjod pa dang /_gang gis bstan pa dang /_gang gis rtogs par byed pa dang /_gang gis mthong ba'i ming ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste chos 
[\[167a.6\]]thams cad ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar khong du chud par bya'o/_/rab 'byor a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge la 
[\[167a.7\]]mkhas par bya ba 'di shes pa de ni sgra gang la yang thogs par mi 'gyur zhing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub par gyur te/_sgra shes pa la mkhas pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la a zhes 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos la thos nas kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyis 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_
[\[167b.2\]]gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa de la ni phan yon nyi shu yod pa shes par bya'o/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_brtan pa dang ldan par 
[\[167b.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang tshegs chung ngus 'thob cing /_som nyi med la/_yid gnyis za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan dag 
[\[167b.4\]]las tshig 'jam po thos na yang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur la/_tshig rtsub po thos na yang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur te/_mtho bar mi 'gyur/_dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing /_tha mal par gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_phung po la 
[\[167b.5\]]mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rgyu la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos nyid la mkhas 
[\[167b.6\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_lha'i rna ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la 
[\[167b.7\]]mkhas pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_'gro ba la mkhas pa dang /_ldog pa la mkhas pa dang /_spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/_
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]phan yon nyi shu po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gzungs 
[\[168a.2\]]kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bcu drug pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 
[\[168a.3\]]zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po la spyod pa ni/_sa nas sar 'phar te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pas sa nas sar ji ltar 'phar zhe na/_
[\[168a.4\]]'di lta ste/_chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos gang yang 'ong ba'am/_'gro ba'am 'pho ba'am/_nye bar 'pho ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/'on kyang chos thams cad kyis gang yin pa de la yang rlom sems su mi byed cing /_mi sems la/_
[\[168a.5\]]sa yongs su sbyong bar yang byed de/_sa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la gnas pas/_
[\[168a.6\]]sa yongs su sbyang ba bcu bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar byas te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ba dang mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_phan pa bya ba'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_
[\[168a.7\]]sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sbyin par bya ba dang /_sbyin pa po dang /_len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]sbyang ba dang /_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs 
[\[168b.2\]]su sbyang ba dang /_chos kyi dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par 'grel ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos kyi yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_bden pa'i tshig yongs 
[\[168b.3\]]su sbyang ba ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas rtag tu chos brgyad yid la bya zhing de dag 
[\[168b.4\]]la nan tan bya'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba dang /_bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa dang /_mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myang bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[168b.5\]]mi gtang ba dang /_snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang /_bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing ston pa'i 'du shes kyis sri zhu che ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas yongs su tshol ba ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas 
[\[168b.6\]]chos brgyad po de dag rtag tu yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mang du thos pas chog mi shes shing /_de 
[\[168b.7\]]la yang yi ge la mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang /_zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed la/_des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing /_yongs su bsngo la des kyang rlom sems 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]su mi byed pa dang /_'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo zhing des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa la gnas shing /_des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[169a.2\]]po sa gsum pa la gnas pas/_chos lnga po de dag la gnas par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzhi pa la gnas pas/_chos bcu yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya zhing de yongs su spang bar mi bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[169a.3\]]'di lta ste/_dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba dang /_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa mi gtang ba dang /_bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[169a.4\]]dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /_sems mi 'dre ba dang /_dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas chos bcu po de dag yongs su gtang bar mi bya 
[\[169a.5\]]zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing /_dge 
[\[169a.6\]]slong dang /_dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_bdag la stod pa yongs su spang bar 
[\[169a.7\]]bya zhing /_gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_the tshom yongs su spang bar bya ba 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu po de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[169b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas/_chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ste/_drug gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[169b.3\]]sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_yongs su yi 'chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_slong ba mthong na sems zhum par mi bya ba dang /_dngos po thams cad yongs su btang nas yid mi bde bar mi bya ba 
[\[169b.4\]]dang /_slong ba bskrad par mi bya ba ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas/_chos drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi 
[\[169b.5\]]shu mi bya'o/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ba dang /_sems can du 'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_chad par 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa dang /_mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang /_rgyur lta ba dang /_
[\[169b.6\]]ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa dang /_phung po la mngon par zhen pa dang /_khams la mngon par zhen pa dang /_skye mched la mngon par zhen pa dang /_khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang /_khams gsum la lhag par zhen pa dang /_khams gsum la 
[\[169b.7\]]chags pa dang /_sangs rgyas su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang /_chos su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang /_dge 'dun du lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang /_tshul khrims su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang /_chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]bas sgyid lug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu po de dag mi bya'o/_/sa bdun pa la gnas pa des chos nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_nyi shu gang 
[\[170a.2\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du bya ba dang /_smon pa med pa shes pa dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba dang /_sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba 
[\[170a.3\]]dang /_chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta zhing de la yang mngon par zhen par mi bya ba dang /_yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs shing des rlom sems su yang mi bya ba dang /_mi skye bar bzod pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang /_chos thams 
[\[170a.4\]]cad la rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa dang /_lta ba bzlog pa dang /_nyon mongs pa bzlog pa dang /_zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang /_lhag mthong la mkhas pa'i sa dang /_sems dul ba dang /_sems zhi ba dang /_shes pa thogs pa med pa dang /_rjes su 
[\[170a.5\]]'chags pa'i sam yin pa dang /_zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[170a.6\]]chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/_chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji 
[\[170a.7\]]ltar mthong ba de dag kyang yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyun mi chad par snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[170b.2\]]dang /_ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub cing /_bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len pa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi 
[\[170b.3\]]po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung ba ste/_
[\[170b.4\]]de smon lam ji lta ji lta bu 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa dang /_spobs pa'i klung khong 
[\[170b.5\]]du chud pa dang /_mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba phun 
[\[170b.6\]]sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis po de dag yongs su rdzogs 
[\[170b.7\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 
[\[171a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/_/de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_rnam pa 
[\[171a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[171a.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/_de ni gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i 
[\[171a.5\]]bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par 'dzud cing 'jog la rab tu 'god par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de 
[\[171a.6\]]dag la bsten pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_sri zhu byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang 
[\[171a.7\]]ba gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos tshol bar byed la/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi lhung ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/_/
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_tshe rabs thams cad du 'dre ba med par mngon par 'byung zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yang rab tu 'byung la/_su yang de'i bar 
[\[171b.2\]]chad byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe 
[\[171b.3\]]na/_sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du nams kyang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs su sbyang ba 
[\[171b.4\]]yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs kyang rung mya ngan las 'das kyang rung sems can rnams la 
[\[171b.5\]]chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba 'di lta ste/_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad 
[\[171b.6\]]pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_de ltar byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i 
[\[171b.7\]]sde dang /_gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'grel ba yongs su sbyang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyis khengs pa 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]nges par gzhom pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_nga rgyal gyis khengs pa gzhom pa gang gis nams kyang rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyis khengs pa nges par gzhom pa 
[\[172a.2\]]yongs su sbyang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba 
[\[172a.3\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongs su sbyang bar bya ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan 
[\[172a.4\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /_gzhan yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims su byed pa/_byang chub la bar chad byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag yid la mi byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin no/_/
[\[172a.5\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_phan chung ngu zhig byas na yang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du chud mi gzon na/_chen po lta 
[\[172a.6\]]ci smos te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rnam 
[\[172a.7\]]par 'tshe ba'i sems med pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]theg pa gsum po dag la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myang bar bya ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs 
[\[172b.2\]]su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen 
[\[172b.3\]]po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_'di snyam du sems te/_sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang bdag bskal pa chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba dag 
[\[172b.4\]]tu 'dug la/_sems can de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bzhag gi bar du der gcad pa dang /_gshag pa dang /_brdung ba dang /_btso ba dang /_bsreg pa dag kyang nyams su myang bar bya'o snyam ste/_de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi phyir mngon par spro zhing 
[\[172b.5\]]yongs su mi skyo ba'i bar du ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla ma rnams 
[\[172b.6\]]la ston pa'i 'du shes 'jog pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la dad pas gus shing sri zhu che ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[172b.7\]]sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan mi byed par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/_phyogs bcu khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag tu gang ci gsungs pa de thams 
[\[173a.2\]]cad gzung bar bya'o snyam du chog mi shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa 
[\[173a.3\]]gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston kyang chos kyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tha na byang chub la yang re ba med pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel bar byed pa yin no/_/de 
[\[173a.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa bdag dang gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[173a.5\]]su dag par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 
[\[173a.6\]]ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis nye bar brtan na/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/_sangs 
[\[173a.7\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur gyi bar du nams kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo ba yin no/_/de la byang chub 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa la gnas pa yin 
[\[173b.2\]]no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la 
[\[173b.3\]]gnas pa yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyang mi 'dod pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[173b.4\]]chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes 
[\[173b.5\]]pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa mi gtang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos zab mo dag la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[173b.6\]]dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa mi gtong ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_gang la bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[173b.7\]]dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/_'dod pa la sems mi bskyed pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]yon tan la smad pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[174a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na/_nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams 'dzin par mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub 
[\[174a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba gang zhe na/_gang rnam par shes pa gnas pa rnams la de'i sems mi sbyor ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[174a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba gang zhe na/_dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po 
[\[174a.5\]]thams cad la mi blta ba ma yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing brdzus te skye ba dang /_mgo bregs shing ngur smrig 
[\[174a.6\]]gyon pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_dge slong 
[\[174a.7\]]dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang se go la gtogs pa srid du yang lhan cig mi gnas shing de dag med na yang yongs su yi 'chad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]yongs su spang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_bdag gis sems can 
[\[174b.2\]]thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad sbyar bar bya na/_sems can 'di dag ni rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur pa yin gyis/_'di la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khyim la ser sna 
[\[174b.3\]]byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[174b.4\]]yod pa'am/_de dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi gleng ldang bar 'gyur ba'am/_de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa bskyed par 'gyur ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par mi bya ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i 
[\[174b.5\]]gnas yongs su spang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/_gang gnod sems dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang /_'thab pa'i sems dang /_rtsod pa'i 
[\[174b.6\]]sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la stod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_gang nang gi chos rnams yang dag 
[\[174b.7\]]par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la stod pa yongs su spang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa yongs su spang ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe 
[\[175a.2\]]na/_'di ltar 'di dag ni bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod par byed na/_'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos shing /_byang chub lta la ci smos pa ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de 
[\[175a.3\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_'di ltar des chos ci yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_gang gis lhag par rlom sems su byed pa'i lhag pa lta ga la yod ces de ltar lhag pa'i nga rgyal 
[\[175a.4\]]spang bar bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya zhe na/_'di ltar gang la de'i khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[175a.5\]]chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_dngos po rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log 
[\[175a.6\]]yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_'di ltar 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyi dngos po yang 
[\[175a.7\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi bag chags yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[175b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas/_shes bya'i rgya mtsho 
[\[175b.3\]]rnam pa lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/_/phyin to/_/phyin par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_brjod du med pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[175b.4\]]chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rang sangs 
[\[175b.5\]]rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yongs su yi 'chad pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/slong ba mthong na sems 
[\[175b.6\]]zhum par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dngos po thams cad yongs su btang nas/_yid mi bde bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sems dang po bskyed phyin 
[\[175b.7\]]chad rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin par bya zhing /_sems gsog tu mi bya ste/_chos drug po de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ste/_'di ltar yang bdag gtan med pa'i phyir ro/_/sems 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]can du 'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag gtan med pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/
[\[176a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad gtan ma skyes pas/_chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rtag par 'dzin par mi bya ste/_'di ltar chos gang mi skye ba de rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 
[\[176a.3\]]ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang mtshan ma'i 'du shes mi bya ste/_'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa gtan med pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rgyur blta bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[176a.4\]]na/_'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po de mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar 
[\[176a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos de dag rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir te/_
[\[176a.6\]]de ltar phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar 
[\[176a.7\]]khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[176b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas sangs rgyas mthong 
[\[176b.3\]]bar mi 'gyur te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos su lta ba la 
[\[176b.4\]]brten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos su lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[176b.5\]]ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par 
[\[176b.6\]]zhen par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas tshul khrims yongs su dag par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[176b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya ste/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi/_stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]rnams stong ngo zhes bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste/_'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir 
[\[177a.2\]]te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/_'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong gi_/stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs 
[\[177a.3\]]par mi byed pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o/_/de 
[\[177a.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa gang zhe na/_gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[177a.5\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po thob pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[177a.6\]]dpa' chen pos ji ltar sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos 
[\[177a.7\]]thams cad la bsnan pa med pa dang /_dbri ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na/_gang chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na/_gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste/_de ni mi skye ba'i bzod pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_gang 
[\[177b.2\]]ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/_gang chos gnyis su kun tu spyod pa med pa nyid de/_de ni tshul 
[\[177b.3\]]gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa gang zhe na/_gang chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na/_gang nyan thos dang rang 
[\[177b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi lta ba thams cad zlog pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na/_gang bag chags dang /_mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dor ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[177b.5\]]dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na/_gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o/_/
[\[177b.6\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na/_gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa thogs pa med pa gang zhe na/_gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o/_/de la 
[\[177b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su 'chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/_skye mched drug la btang snyoms su 'jog pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na/_'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]'khor de dang der lus ston pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o/_/
[\[178a.2\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir/_mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 
[\[178a.3\]]bskyed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na/_gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na yang snang zhing de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o/_/
[\[178a.4\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig 
[\[178a.5\]]rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /_des rlom sems su yang mi byed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir gang chos la bsnyen 
[\[178a.6\]]bkur byed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/_chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po mchog 
[\[178a.7\]]dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe na/_stobs bcu la gnas nas/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba gang zhe na/_mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par byed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas/_bya ba thams cad 
[\[178b.2\]]byed la de'i sems chos gang la yang mi 'jug pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyun mi 'chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ji ltar 
[\[178b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su sgrub ce na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji lta bur sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur 
[\[178b.4\]]ba de lta de lta bu'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len ce na/_'di lta ste/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[178b.5\]]sems dpa' chen pos smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pas smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta 
[\[178b.6\]]de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[178b.7\]]ste/_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spobs pa'i klung khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/
[\[179a.2\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen po dag tu skye ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub 
[\[179a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[179a.4\]]dpa' chen po'i cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_rigs gang las sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byung bar gyur pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[179a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams byang chub tu bkod nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor nyid dang ldan pa ste/_de ni 
[\[179a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur zhing /_de dag kyang 
[\[179a.7\]]rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]po sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang /_khyim nas rab tu 'byung zhing mngon par 'byung la/_sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la nges par 'gyur ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum 
[\[179b.2\]]tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba ni/_gser las grub pa/_sdong po ni bai dUr+ya las grub pa/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang 'dab ma rnams ni 
[\[179b.3\]]rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin la/_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bar dag tu snang bas khyab par byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa 
[\[179b.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par byas pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[179b.5\]]yongs su dag pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya zhe na/_byang 
[\[179b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_bag chags dang /_
[\[179b.7\]]mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu po dag gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la spyod pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 
[\[180a.2\]]po dag la bslabs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da' zhing /_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang 
[\[180a.3\]]bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sa dgu po 'di dag las 'das nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor de 
[\[180a.4\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu yin no/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_sa yongs su sbyang ba'i 
[\[180a.5\]]le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der gnas par 
[\[180a.6\]]'gyur te/_de yang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_gzugs 
[\[180a.7\]]med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la ni nges par 'byung ba'am/_nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/_nges par 'byung bar gyur pa med pa'i 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag 
[\[180b.2\]]pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_spong ba'i dbyings dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang /_'gog pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams 
[\[180b.3\]]gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/'gog pa'i dbyings kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 
[\[180b.4\]]'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la 
[\[180b.5\]]nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes kyi stong 
[\[180b.6\]]pa nyid dang /_'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs 
[\[180b.7\]]kyis stong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]zad do/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i 
[\[181a.2\]]chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi stong pa nyid dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 
[\[181a.3\]]rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_
[\[181a.4\]]lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 
[\[181a.5\]]'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[181a.6\]]'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar dag kyang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 
[\[181a.7\]]'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang /_rab 'byor de bzhin du sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang /_
[\[181b.2\]]smig rgyu dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar rmi 
[\[181b.3\]]lam gyi rang bzhin ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_brag ca'i rang bzhin ni brag ca'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_mig yor gyi rang 
[\[181b.4\]]bzhin ni mig yor gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i 
[\[181b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[181b.6\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 
[\[181b.7\]]mi 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[182a.2\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[182a.3\]]rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[182a.4\]]dag la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[182a.5\]]la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis 
[\[182a.6\]]stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni 
[\[182a.7\]]khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_
[\[182b.2\]]lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar lam gyi bar gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[182b.3\]]rab 'byor lam ni lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[182b.4\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 
[\[182b.5\]]ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/
[\[182b.6\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/
[\[182b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni dgra bcom pa'i rang 
[\[183a.2\]]bzhin gyis stong /_rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stong /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i 
[\[183a.3\]]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[183a.4\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[183a.5\]]ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[183a.6\]]dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i 
[\[183a.7\]]phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong pa dang /_de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni ming las nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/
[\[183b.2\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma dang brda dang /_tha snyad dang /_gdags pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni khams 
[\[183b.3\]]gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa ni gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 
[\[183b.4\]]la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang 
[\[183b.5\]]ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[183b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni/_mngon par 'du byed pa med pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_
[\[183b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur te/_theg pa de ni bskyod du med pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]zhes zer ba ni theg pa de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper 
[\[184a.2\]]na/_de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[184a.3\]]dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin zhing /_
[\[184a.4\]]yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_de bzhin du yang dag 
[\[184a.5\]]pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i khams ni gnas 
[\[184a.6\]]pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_spong ba'i dbyings dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang /_'gog 
[\[184a.7\]]pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]ma yin pa dang /_spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang /_'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni nam 
[\[184b.2\]]mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /_'gog pa'i 
[\[184b.3\]]dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin 
[\[184b.4\]]mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang /_'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 
[\[184b.5\]]'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin 
[\[184b.6\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_mig gi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/yid 
[\[184b.7\]]kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mig gi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /_
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]yid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa dang /_yid kyi bar du yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid
