[\[205b.7\]]na yang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med la/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med cing /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_
[\[206a.2\]]stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[206a.3\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po dag gi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med la/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi ngo bo 
[\[206a.4\]]nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang 
[\[206a.5\]]gnas pa med la/_byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_
[\[206a.6\]]gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med la/_sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[206a.7\]]'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med la/_'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_'dus byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gang na yang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med la/_'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni 
[\[206b.2\]]gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gang na yang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs/_'gro ba mi dmigs/_gnas pa yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/_
[\[206b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/_dbus kyang mi dmigs lags pas/_de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/_de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o zhes smras pa ni rab 
[\[206b.4\]]'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/_dbus kyang mi dmigs pas/_de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[206b.5\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong /_da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong /_
[\[206b.6\]]theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos stong /_byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong la/_rab 'byor stong pa nyid la ni gcig ces bya ba med cing /_gnyis sam/_gsuma'am/_bzhi'am/_lnga'am/_drug gam/_bdun nam/_brgyad dam/_dgu 
[\[206b.7\]]'am/_bcu zhes bya ba'am/_tha dad du dbye ba med pa'i phyir te/_de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te/_theg pa chen po de la ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/de la ni 'dod chags 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]dang 'dod chags dang bral ba yang mi dmigs so/_/zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/gti mug dang gti mug med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/ming dang ming med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba yang mi dmigs 
[\[207a.2\]]so/_/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das 
[\[207a.3\]]pa yang mi dmigs so/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang mi dmigs so/_/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so/_/de la ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa yang mi dmigs so/_/bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yang mi dmigs so/_/bdag dang 
[\[207a.4\]]bdag med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/zhi ba dang ma zhi ba yang mi dmigs so/_/'dod pa'i khams dang /_'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs 
[\[207a.5\]]so/_/gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/
[\[207a.6\]]de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[207a.7\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]rnams dang /_da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/_da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong 
[\[207b.2\]]pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la 'das 
[\[207b.3\]]pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la ma 
[\[207b.4\]]'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[207b.5\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs 
[\[207b.6\]]dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_
[\[207b.7\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so/_/mnyam pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs so/_/mnyam 
[\[208a.2\]]pa nyid la ni da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[208a.3\]]dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_
[\[208a.4\]]phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa 
[\[208a.5\]]nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_rab 'byor gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams 
[\[208a.6\]]ni mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_mnyam 
[\[208a.7\]]pa nyid la 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_rab 'byor de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po dag ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar ni dus gsum 
[\[208b.2\]]mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/_da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[208b.3\]]da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/_rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/_/so 
[\[208b.4\]]so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi 
[\[208b.5\]]dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i 
[\[208b.6\]]phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas te/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de ltar bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 
[\[208b.7\]]rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te/_de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[209a.2\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa chen po 'di legs par bka' stsal pa ni/_legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs nas/_
[\[209a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la slob cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag 
[\[209a.4\]]da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa dag na mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis/_tshad ma mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing /_rnam pa 
[\[209a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyid lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te/_'di ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[209a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang theg pa 
[\[209a.7\]]chen po 'di la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so/_/brnyes par 'gyur ro/_/brnyes par mdzad do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las zil gyis gnon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bcu drug pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[209b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bskul ba mdzad pas 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par sems lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes 
[\[209b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan pa'am gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa med de/_rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no/_/
[\[209b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/_dge ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[209b.5\]]nang du 'dus shing /_yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 
[\[209b.6\]]'dus shing yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang 
[\[209b.7\]]po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[210a.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang rtag tu btang snyoms 
[\[210a.3\]]su gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing /_yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i 
[\[210a.4\]]chos rnams yin no/_/rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang 
[\[210a.5\]]yin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_mig gang yin pa dang /_
[\[210a.6\]]gzugs gang yin pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid gang yin pa dang /_chos 
[\[210a.7\]]rnams gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa 
[\[210b.2\]]dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam dang /_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa 
[\[210b.3\]]dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang 
[\[210b.4\]]yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang yin pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[210b.5\]]gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin pas/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/_khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[210b.6\]]tu phyin pa dang /_'thun par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor theg pa chen po yang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[210b.7\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/_theg pa chen po yang gzhan/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhing /_theg pa chen po yang gzhan pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_dran pa nye bar 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]gzhag pa de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni gnyis su med cing 
[\[211a.2\]]gnyis su dbyer med do/_/rab 'byor de'i phyir theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad 
[\[211a.3\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar khas mi len lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su khas mi len lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[211a.4\]]gzugs mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom 
[\[211a.5\]]ldan 'das gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags so/_/
[\[211a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ma dmigs lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[211a.7\]]gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/_bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang /_byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags na/_gang mngon par 
[\[211b.2\]]grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/_gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/_/gang mngon par ma 
[\[211b.3\]]grub pa de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su ma mchis na/_ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub 
[\[211b.4\]]pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing /_yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar 
[\[211b.5\]]mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/_byang 
[\[211b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su khas mi len pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/_gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par 
[\[211b.7\]]rig par bya/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi 
[\[212a.2\]]thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_ma dmigs lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su 
[\[212a.3\]]bstan par bgyi zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/_bdag bdag ces bgyi 
[\[212a.4\]]yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di 
[\[212a.5\]]skad du/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/_gang mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/_gang mngon par ma grub pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_gang mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam 
[\[212a.6\]]par shes pa de gang lags/_gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/_/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/_
[\[212a.7\]]ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub kyi slad du 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum/_mi 'gong zhing 
[\[212b.2\]]yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing /_dngang bar mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can 
[\[212b.3\]]med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can stong pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas 
[\[212b.4\]]mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/gzugs stong pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[212b.5\]]dben pa dang /_gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/rnam par 
[\[212b.6\]]shes pa stong pa dang /_rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /_rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas 
[\[212b.7\]]mi len to/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa 
[\[213a.2\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar stong pa nyid la sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i 
[\[213a.3\]]mtha' dang /_dbus rnams kyang mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhing /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_
[\[213a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_
[\[213a.5\]]phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/_med pa yang gzhan/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/_dben pa yang gzhan/_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 
[\[213a.6\]]gzhan/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhing /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi 
[\[213a.7\]]ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang /_stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dben pa gang yin pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su 
[\[213b.2\]]khas mi len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[213b.3\]]dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid stong pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus 
[\[213b.4\]]rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi 
[\[213b.5\]]mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan la/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_
[\[213b.6\]]ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan zhing byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 
[\[213b.7\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[214a.2\]]sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[214a.3\]]sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[214a.4\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[214a.5\]]kyi chos rnams dben pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_
[\[214a.6\]]dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa yang gzhan ma yin/_dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin zhing /_dran pa nye 
[\[214a.7\]]bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yang gzhan ma yin zhing /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[214b.2\]]shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad med pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings med pa dang /_
[\[214b.3\]]de bzhin nyid med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/
[\[214b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa yang gzhan/_stong 
[\[214b.5\]]pa yang gzhan/_dben pa yang gzhan/_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang gzhan zhing /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[214b.6\]]bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar gang yin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag ni thams 
[\[214b.7\]]cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/nyan thos stong pa dang /_nyan thos dben pa dang /_nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon 
[\[215a.2\]]gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/rang sangs rgyas med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' med pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[215a.3\]]nyid dben pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_
[\[215a.4\]]ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyang gzhan la sngon 
[\[215a.5\]]gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[215a.6\]]de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus rnams su khas mi len to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang 'di skad du/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[215a.7\]]'byor ci'i phyir/_gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni mtha' dang /_dbus dang 
[\[215b.2\]]mtha' mi dmigs kyang /_nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am/_
[\[215b.3\]]dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi 
[\[215b.4\]]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am/_dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[215b.5\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par 
[\[215b.6\]]spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/_/
[\[215b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la mtha' 'am/_dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stong pa nyid 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]yin pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mtha' 'am/_dbus mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/_dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mu med pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[216a.2\]]sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[216a.3\]]rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin nam zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes 
[\[216a.4\]]pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/_/stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la/_de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[216a.5\]]shes pa med cing mi dmigs/_stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[216a.6\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[216a.7\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]phyin pa med cing /_stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag

[\[216b.3\]]rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo /_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni

[\[216b.7\]]gshegs pas stong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi

[\[217a.3\]]par rjes su ma mthong /_ma dmigs lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs su med do/_/gzugs ni

[\[218a\]]

[\[218b.1\]]nang stong pa nyid ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med

[\[218b.5\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[218b.6\]]phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gdams pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gdams pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa ni/_
[\[218b.7\]]gdams pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni gdams pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas/_byang chub sems dpa' yang med 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]cing mi dmigs te bstan du med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta 
[\[219a.2\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 
[\[219a.3\]]'gro'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/'di ltar 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes 
[\[219a.4\]]bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin no/_/ming gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/_tshor ba ma yin/_'du shes ma yin/_'du byed rnams ma yin/_rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ming ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong la/_stong pa 
[\[219a.5\]]gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin pa'i phyir te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste/_ming la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[219a.6\]]med la/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[219a.7\]]zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]tsam ste/_ming la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[219b.2\]]phyir te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin pas/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang /_dngos po med 
[\[219b.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam ste/_nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/_ming la yang nang stong pa nyid med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yang ming med la/_ming la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[219b.4\]]dag med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 
[\[219b.5\]]'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang ming med la/_ming la yang dran pa nye 
[\[219b.6\]]bar gzhag pa rnams med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[219b.7\]]rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang ming med la/_ming la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[220a.2\]]chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/_
[\[220a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/_ming la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi 
[\[220a.4\]]dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/_'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na/_bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe 
[\[220a.5\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_
[\[220a.6\]]byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshor 
[\[220a.7\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_de bzhin 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_de bzhin du 
[\[220b.2\]]sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_
[\[220b.3\]]rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga 
[\[220b.4\]]la yod/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs 
[\[220b.5\]]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ltag la yod/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[220b.6\]]tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[220b.7\]]pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[221a.2\]]gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[221a.3\]]'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_
[\[221a.4\]]nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rang sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_byang chub sems dpa' gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 
[\[221a.5\]]'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_bdag bdag ces bya ba yang bdag 
[\[221a.6\]]mngon par grub pa ni gtan med pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe 
[\[221a.7\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]nyid med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_
[\[221b.2\]]yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 
[\[221b.3\]]dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus 
[\[221b.4\]]pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[221b.5\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas 
[\[221b.6\]]ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[221b.7\]]pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]ni sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos 
[\[222a.2\]]po med pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'dus ma byas pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma 
[\[222a.3\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang 
[\[222a.4\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/_'jig pa ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/_'jig pa ma yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[222a.5\]]bu gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/_'jig pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/_'jig pa ma 
[\[222a.6\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[222a.7\]]pa med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang /_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/_'jig pa 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs 
[\[222b.2\]]de gang lags/_gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_
[\[222b.3\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[222b.4\]]'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[222b.5\]]bu gzhan yang gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad kyi bar du yang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/
[\[222b.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang 
[\[222b.7\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma grub pa de/_gzugs ma lags/_gang mngon par ma grub pa de/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/_/gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 
[\[223a.2\]]'gyur ba med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing /_'jig pa med do/_/gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur 
[\[223a.3\]]ba med do/_/chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/_/gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/_rnam grangs des na/_gang mngon par ma grub pa 
[\[223a.4\]]de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[223a.5\]]phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/_
[\[223a.6\]]de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_kho bos 'di skad du/_ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams 
[\[223a.7\]]par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_mngon par ma grub pa yang gzhan la/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de ltar 
[\[223b.2\]]na mngon par ma grub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[223b.3\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang /_gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa de 
[\[223b.4\]]ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[223b.5\]]pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang 
[\[223b.6\]]yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'god zhing /_yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing /_dngang bar mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 
[\[223b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[224a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[224a.3\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/_gnas par mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /_'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de'i tshe tshor ba 
[\[224a.4\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing /_mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /_'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de bzhin du de'i tshe/_mig khas 
[\[224a.5\]]mi len cing /_mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /_'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_/yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid 
[\[224a.6\]]de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /_'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs 
[\[224a.7\]]par mi bgyid lags so/_/de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /_'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes 
[\[224b.2\]]'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de bzhin du de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing /_/mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/_/mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /_'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi 
[\[224b.3\]]bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing /_mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni 
[\[224b.4\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[224b.5\]]dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad khas mi len cing /_mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen 
[\[224b.6\]]par mi bgyid cing /_'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang /_gzungs 
[\[224b.7\]]kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing /_mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/_mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing /_/'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum 
[\[225a.2\]]cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[225a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/_gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de ltar na gzugs dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i 
[\[225a.4\]]slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma 
[\[225a.5\]]lags so/_/mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin 
[\[225a.6\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni 
[\[225a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]lags so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/_de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma 
[\[225b.2\]]mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/_de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis 
[\[225b.3\]]lags so/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[225b.4\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/
[\[225b.5\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste/_de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin 
[\[225b.6\]]nyid ma lags te/_de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du 
[\[225b.7\]]de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing 
[\[226a.2\]]gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/_de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_skye ba ma 
[\[226a.3\]]mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_skye ba ma 
[\[226a.4\]]mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/_gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[226a.5\]]rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/_de ltar na phung po rnams dang /_'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma 
[\[226a.6\]]lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang /_skye mched rnams ma lags te/_de ltar na khams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su 
[\[226a.7\]]dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/_de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/_
[\[226b.2\]]de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha 
[\[226b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/_de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su 
[\[226b.4\]]dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/_/de bzhin du dngos po 
[\[226b.5\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/_de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[226b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[226b.7\]]rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/_de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[227a.2\]]rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags te/_de ltar na lam dang /_'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer 
[\[227a.3\]]ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags so/_/de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_mi 
[\[227a.4\]]'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib 
[\[227a.5\]]pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/_mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags 
[\[227a.6\]]pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/_/de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[227a.7\]]pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/_/gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_gnyis 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di 
[\[227b.2\]]dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/_nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes 
[\[227b.3\]]zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/_chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/_/chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she 
[\[227b.4\]]na/_gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/_de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_
[\[227b.5\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/_de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[227b.6\]]brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang 
[\[227b.7\]]dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/_'di lta ste rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang /_gzugs rnams sam/_sgra rnams sam/_dri rnams sam/_ro rnams sam/_reg 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]bya rnams sam/_chos rnams sam/_nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste/_de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[228a.2\]]shA ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/gang las ring du song zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel
