[\[228a.3\]]par 'byung ba las ring du song /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song /_'gro ba drug las ring du song ba ste/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha 
[\[228a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song ba ste/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ba ste/_de'i phyir ring du song ba 
[\[228a.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ba 
[\[228a.6\]]ste/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po dag las ring du song ba ste/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha 
[\[228a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ba ste/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_gzugs rtag ces bya 
[\[228b.2\]]ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi 
[\[228b.3\]]rtog go/_/gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/
[\[228b.4\]]gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[228b.5\]]sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi 
[\[228b.6\]]rtog go/_/rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi 
[\[228b.7\]]rtog go/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[229a.2\]]mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag 
[\[229a.3\]]ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog 
[\[229a.4\]]go/_/dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[229a.5\]]dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_
[\[229a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/_/bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes 
[\[229a.7\]]bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste/_
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs 
[\[229b.2\]]kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[229b.3\]]ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[229b.4\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so zhes smra/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[229b.5\]]pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/_skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[229b.6\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/_skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang 
[\[229b.7\]]yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/_skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo /_/
[\[230a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/_skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/
[\[230a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/_skye ba med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dngos 
[\[230a.4\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/_skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[230a.5\]]stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te/_skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin 
[\[230a.6\]]du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[230a.7\]]chos dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te/_skye ba med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_rnam 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/_'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/_/tshor ba 
[\[230b.2\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams 
[\[230b.3\]]dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[230b.4\]]ma lags zhes zer/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /_gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang /_'grib pa gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[230b.5\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing /_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid 
[\[230b.6\]]gcig pa'o/_/khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[230b.7\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/_/de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing /_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin 
[\[231a.2\]]pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams 
[\[231a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/_khyod 'di skad du gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[231a.4\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/_/gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so zhes smra/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 
[\[231a.5\]]'di ltar skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin la gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/_skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o/_/skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang 
[\[231a.6\]]gzhan ma yin te/_skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gang yang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/_/gang yang tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[231a.7\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/_/khams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stong pa 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]nyid thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/_skye ba med pa yang 
[\[231b.2\]]gzhan ma yin te/_skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/_/
[\[231b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag 
[\[231b.4\]]pa'i slad du/_gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_bdag 
[\[231b.5\]]gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba 
[\[231b.6\]]po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_khams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[231b.7\]]skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/
[\[232a.2\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_
[\[232a.3\]]lam dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam 
[\[232a.4\]]par dag pa'i slad du/_so so'i skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[232a.5\]]chos rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang 
[\[232a.6\]]chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar 
[\[232a.7\]]na/_gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang skye ba med pa yin/_khams rnams skye ba med pa yin/_skye mched rnams skye ba med pa yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]rnams skye ba med pa yin/_stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so 
[\[232b.2\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad skye ba med pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin/_so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med pa yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_
[\[232b.3\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[232b.4\]]chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[232b.5\]]rnams kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa yin na ni/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyis kyang /_nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/_de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams 
[\[232b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/_'gro ba rnam pa lnga yang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub rnam pa lnga yang thob zin par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin 
[\[232b.7\]]na/_ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/_lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/_phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]phyir lam bsgom par bya/_dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/_ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[233a.2\]]dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed/_ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[233a.3\]]sangs rgyas/_ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do/_/kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par 
[\[233a.4\]]mi 'dod do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang /_skye ba 
[\[233a.5\]]med pa la rang byang chub dang /_rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni/_byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do/_/de ci'i 
[\[233a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni/_sems can dpag tu med/_grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_mar 'du shes bskyed 
[\[233a.7\]]pa dang /_bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas sems can dpag tu med/_grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/_ji 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la yang de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur na/_dka' ba'i 'du shes 
[\[233b.2\]]bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad kyi thams cad/_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skye ba med 
[\[233b.3\]]pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do/_/chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe 
[\[233b.4\]]dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob bam/_'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la/_
[\[233b.5\]]ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci 'thob pa yang med la/_mngon par rtogs pa yang med dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa yang yod/_
[\[233b.6\]]mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong 
[\[233b.7\]]ba'am/_dgra bcom pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_byang chub sems dpa'a'am/_sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa yin te/_don dam par ni 'thob pa yang med/_mngon par rtogs pa yang med/_rgyun du zhugs pa yang 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]med/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang med/_phyir mi 'ong ba yang med/_dgra bcom pa yang med/_rang sangs rgyas kyang med/_byang chub sems dpa' yang med/_sangs rgyas kyang med do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[234a.2\]]'byor 'thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du/_skye ba med pa'ang de lta yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis 
[\[234a.3\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_skye ba'ang mi skye la skye ba med pa'ang mi skye'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs 
[\[234a.4\]]sam/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa yang brjod par spobs sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos 
[\[234a.5\]]ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do/_/chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang /_skye ba med pa 
[\[234a.6\]]gang yin pa dang /_spobs pa gang yin pa dang /_brjod pa gang yin pa dang /_mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing /_gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di 
[\[234a.7\]]ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa yang skye ba med/_spobs pa yang skye ba med/_chos kyang skye ba med de/_gang dag las brtsams te/_brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]skye ba med pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o/_/spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o/_/chos ni skye ba med pa'o/_/gang dag las brtsams te/_brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med 
[\[234b.2\]]pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs skye ba med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang /_de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 
[\[234b.3\]]dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang 
[\[234b.4\]]dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_brjod pa skye ba med do/_/
[\[234b.5\]]spobs pa skye ba med do/_/chos skye ba med do/_/gang dag las brtsams te/_brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_
[\[234b.6\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[234b.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du skye ba med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do/_/de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar 'thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du/_'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha dad 
[\[235a.2\]]kyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don dam par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med/_skye ba yang med/_'gag pa yang med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/_rnam par byang ba yang med pa'i 
[\[235a.3\]]phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci chos ma skyes pa skye 'am/_'on te chos skyes pa skye/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod la/_chos skyes pa skye bar yang mi 
[\[235a.4\]]'dod do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/kho bo ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[235a.5\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_stong 
[\[235a.6\]]pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_byang chub ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod/_mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do/_/
[\[235a.7\]]shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni tshor ba dang /_
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/_kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_
[\[235b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos skye'am/_skyes pa'i chos skye/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma skyes pa yang mi skye la/_skyes pa yang mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skyes pa gang yin pa dang ma 
[\[235b.3\]]skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba 
[\[235b.4\]]med pa dang /_de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_
[\[235b.5\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang /_ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[235b.6\]]yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_brjod pa skye ba med/_spobs pa skye ba med/_chos skye ba med/_gang dag las brtsams te/_brjod par 
[\[235b.7\]]spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bzhag pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'di ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/_chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[236a.2\]]pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rang 
[\[236a.3\]]bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med 
[\[236a.4\]]par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang 
[\[236a.5\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong 
[\[236a.6\]]ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med 
[\[236a.7\]]par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis 
[\[236b.2\]]ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[236b.3\]]ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang 
[\[236b.4\]]po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/stobs rnams dang /_mi 
[\[236b.5\]]'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe 
[\[236b.6\]]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na/_chos thams cad ni rang 
[\[236b.7\]]bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_ting 
[\[237a.2\]]nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 
[\[237a.3\]]yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/_ji ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[237a.4\]]bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[237a.5\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang yin/_rab 
[\[237a.6\]]'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag tu gyur cing /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_'dron pa dang /_slongs mo pa zas 
[\[237a.7\]]'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/_me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog_/me tog phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog phreng /_spos 'dod pa rnams la ni 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]spos/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/_gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/_mal cha dang stan 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha dang stan/_'tshog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tshog chas/_sman 'dod pa rnams la ni sman/_mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i 
[\[237b.2\]]bar dag sbyin par byed cing /_bu 'dod pa rnams la ni bu sbyin par byed/_bu mo 'dod pa rnams la ni bu mo sbyin par byed/_chung ma 'dod pa rnams la ni chung ma sbyin par byed/_rgyal srid 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyal srid sbyin par byed/_mgo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo 
[\[237b.3\]]sbyin par byed/_mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig sbyin par byed/_yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la ni yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par byed/_sha dang /_khrag dang /_rkang 'dod pa rnams la ni sha dang khrag dang rkang sbyin par byed la de yang gnas shing 
[\[237b.4\]]yongs su gtong bar byed de/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o/_/'di ni len pa'o/_/'di ni sbyin pa'o/_/bdag ni ser sna med pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyin bdag go/_/bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas 
[\[237b.5\]]kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o snyam du sems shing sbyin pa de yang byin nas/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di la yang 
[\[237b.6\]]bde bar 'gyur zhing /_len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de ni chags pa gsum la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[237b.7\]]bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /_sbyin par 'du shes pa ste/_chags pa gsum po de dag la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_de ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]pa zhes bya zhe na/_'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags shing mi 'da' ste/_de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor 
[\[238a.2\]]gsum yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_bdag tu mi dmigs/_len par mi dmigs/_sbyin par mi dmigs shing /_de 
[\[238a.3\]]de'i rnam par smin pa la yang mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin 
[\[238a.4\]]pa na/_sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la snyoms par byed kyang sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs/_bdag kyang mi dmigs/_sbyin pa yang mi dmigs la/_sbyin pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed cing /_byang 
[\[238a.5\]]chub kyang mi dmigs pa de ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags 
[\[238a.6\]]la 'da' ste/_de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no//_//
[\[238a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'jig rten pa'i yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang yod de/_de la 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gis ser sna'i sems tshar bcad do/_/zhes dmigs pa la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_de yang bdag dang /_sems can dang /_sbyin pa'i 'du shes la gnas shing /_
[\[238b.2\]]de bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ste/_dmigs pa la gnas nas/_phyi dang nang gi dngos po'am/_zin pa'am/_ma zin pa'am/_ci bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shing /_lus dang /_ngag dang sems 
[\[238b.3\]]kyi dmigs pa la gnas te/_bdag tu lta ba la gnas/_sems can du lta ba dang /_dge bar lta ba la gnas shing /_tshul khrims dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag la bsten pa tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing byang chub 
[\[238b.4\]]dmigs nas/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /_de bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang /_bdag dang sems can dang /_bzod par lta ba la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa bzod par byed la/_
[\[238b.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /_de lus dmigs shing /_bsod nams kyi tshogs dmigs la/_ye shes kyi tshogs 
[\[238b.6\]]dmigs shing /_bdag dmigs la sems can rnams dmigs te/_byang chub dmigs shing brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_de brtson 'grus rtsom pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /_de byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms sgom 
[\[238b.7\]]par byed cing /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug la/_ldang bar yang byed cing /_de dag gi ro myong bar yang byed la/_de dag gis 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]rlom sems su yang byed cing /_dmigs pa'i lta ba can du gyur nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i'o/_/de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs/_
[\[239a.2\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs shing /_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmigs nas/_stong pa nyid sgom ste/_de dmigs pa la spyod cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems 
[\[239a.3\]]can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/_de yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi bsod nams thams cad la 
[\[239a.4\]]rjes su yi rang ba dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir dmigs nas/_thabs ma yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang /_phung po gsum pa'i bsod nams thabs ma yin pas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams 
[\[239a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_sbyin par bya ba mi dmigs pa'i shes rab 'khor 
[\[239a.6\]]gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_tshul khrims dang /_byang chub mi dmigs te/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir tshul khrims 
[\[239a.7\]]yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /_bdag dang /_bzod pa dang /_byang chub mi dmigs te/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/_byang chub kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /_bdag dang /_lus dang /_sems dang /_
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsod nams dang /_ye shes mi dmigs te/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting 
[\[239b.2\]]nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs te/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad mi dmigs pas byang chub kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[239b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_yongs 
[\[239b.4\]]su bsngo ba mtshungs pa med pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba dpag tu med pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa ste/_de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir na/_'jig 
[\[239b.5\]]rten pa zhes bya/_ci'i phyir na/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/_de la 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba ni/_gang dag gis 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag 'jig rten 'grub par byed pa dang /_gang dag gis 'jig rten dang mnyam pa dang /_
[\[239b.6\]]gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi phyir sbyin pa dang /_gang dag gis 'jig rten las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/_de dag ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 
[\[239b.7\]]'jig rten las 'das pa gang zhe na/_gang dag gis 'jig rten sgrol ba dang /_gang dag 'jig rten sel bar byed pa dang /_'jig rten gang dag gis sgrol bar byed pa dang /_gang dag 'jig rten ma yin par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag gis 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]'jig rten las 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag 'jig rten las sgrol ba dang /_gang dag 'jig rten du sgrol bar byed pa ste/_de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[240a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/_de ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis 
[\[240a.3\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga 
[\[240a.4\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[240a.5\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams 
[\[240a.6\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi skyes bu'i 
[\[240a.7\]]rtsal yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /_
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[240b.2\]]chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin zhing /_yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa yin no/_/tshe dang 
[\[240b.3\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[240b.4\]]par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[240b.5\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de

[\[240b.7\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing rmongs pa med par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang sems can thams cad yongs su mi 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]gtang ba'i phyir/_'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas pa yin par rig par bya ste/_de yang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/_/
[\[241a.2\]]shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar gnas pa des gnas pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par 'dod na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang 
[\[241a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can thams cad ni yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 
[\[241a.4\]]yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pas don de nyid yongs su bzung ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dmigs su phebs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/_sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong 
[\[241a.5\]]pa nyid du rig par bya/_sems can dben pa'i phyir yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya/_sems can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya zhing sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[241a.6\]]'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/_gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/_gzugs dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa 
[\[241a.7\]]nyid du rig par bya/_gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya/_gzugs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa 
[\[241b.2\]]ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten 
[\[241b.3\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_bden pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/_yid la 
[\[241b.4\]]byed pa med par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir 
[\[241b.5\]]yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa 'di dang /_yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral lo zhes kho bo smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[241b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/_ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya 
[\[241b.7\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/

[\[242a.3\]]mtho/_/dbus dma' na mtha' mtho/_mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_
[\[242a.4\]]rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[242a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu kho ra yug kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[242a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las 
[\[242a.7\]]srog chags 'bum nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad na yang sems can 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]dpag tu med/_grangs med pa rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi 
[\[242b.2\]]le'u zhes bya ste/_nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal po chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/_/
[\[242b.3\]]de bzhin du lha'i dbang po brgya byin rnams dang /_rab 'thab bral rnams dang /_yongs su dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyang /_tshangs pa'i bar dag dang lhan cig tu 
[\[242b.4\]]'dus par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag ji snyed 'khod pa rnams kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to/_/rgyal chen 
[\[242b.5\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi 
[\[242b.6\]]bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_
[\[242b.7\]]bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gan na/_lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de dag thams cad ni lham me ma yin/_lhan ne ma yin/_lhang nge ma yin no/_/de 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog tu snang ngo /_/phul du snang ngo /_/khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo /_/rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na med pa dang /_gong na med par snang ngo /_/'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu chu bo'i 
[\[243a.2\]]gser gyi gnan lcags nag po ni ka ba tshig pa bzhin du lham me ma yin/_lhan ne ma yin/_lhang nge ma yin no/_/de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gnan lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de dag thams cad kyang lham me ma 
[\[243a.3\]]yin/_lhan ne ma yin/_lhang nge ma yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog tu snang ngo /_/phul du snang ngo /_/khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo /_/rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na med pa dang /_gong na med par snang ngo /_/
[\[243a.4\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan 
[\[243a.5\]]rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad btsun pa rab 'byor la chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/_
[\[243a.6\]]btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha 
[\[243a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar bslab par bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la/_yid la zung shig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[243b.2\]]pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ba dag bstan par byas/_lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyis shig_/gang 
[\[243b.3\]]dag yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pa'i phyir ro/_/'on kyang gal te de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[243b.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_kho bo ni dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad mi byed pas de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ste/_khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o/_/kau shi ka de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[243b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas gzugs mi rtag par yid la bya'o/_/sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_
[\[243b.6\]]stong pa dang /_nad dang /_'bras dang /_zug rngu dang /_sdig pa dang /_gzhan la rag las pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos can dang /_mi brtan pa dang /_rab tu 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_'jigs pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_'go ba'i nad lta bur yid la bya ste/_de yang 
[\[243b.7\]]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_de bzhin du mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_de bzhin du sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag par yid la bya'o/_/sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_nad dang /_'bras dang /_zug rngu dang /_sdig pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[244a.2\]]la rag las pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos can dang /_mi brtan pa dang /_rab tu 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_'jigs pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_'go ba'i nad lta bur yid la bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[244a.3\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya bar yid la bya ste/_de yang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_
[\[244a.4\]]rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen 
[\[244a.5\]]gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de yang mi rtag pa dang /_
[\[244a.6\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong par yid la bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ste/_de yang 
[\[244a.7\]]mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas 
[\[244b.2\]]len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal 
[\[244b.3\]]gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_de yang bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med par yid la bya ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/
[\[244b.4\]]kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[244b.5\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[244b.6\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bsgom ste/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_de yang mi 
[\[244b.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod do/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di ltar chos dang /_
[\[245a.2\]]chos rnams sbyor bar byed cing /_rtog sbyor du byed la/_yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_yongs su khyab par byed de/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni bdag med cing /_bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o zhes so sor rtog par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang 
[\[245a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin la/_yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[245a.4\]]sems gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs/_byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs/_byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs/_yongs su bsngo 
[\[245a.5\]]ba'i sems gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la med/_byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi sems la med/_yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang 
[\[245a.6\]]yin pa de yang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med de/_kau shi ka gang de ltar chos thams cad la so sor rtog kyang /_chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med cing mi dmigs pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[245a.7\]]yin no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba'i sems byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'grogs pa yin/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]yongs su bsngo ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs pa yin/_ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba'i sems byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs pa yin/_ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi 
[\[245b.2\]]ka yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni sems ma yin la/_byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de yang sems ma yin te/_de ltar na sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de yang sems ma yin 
[\[245b.3\]]pas sems ma yin pas ni/_sems ma yin par yongs su sngo bar mi byed la/_bsam gyis mi khyab pas ni/_bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su sngo bar mi byed de/_de ltar na sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la/_bsam gyis 
[\[245b.4\]]mi khyab pa gang yin pa de yang sems ma yin te/_kau shi ka de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor legs so 
[\[245b.5\]]legs so/_/rab 'byor gang khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing /_spro ba skyed pa ni yang khyod legs so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ste/_byas 
[\[245b.6\]]pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi lags so/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa mdzad pa na/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thad na de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[245b.7\]]drug la gdams shing rjes su bstan te/_yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dgyes par bgyis shing gzhug pa bgyis te bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pas pha 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa drug po de la bslabs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[246a.2\]]drug la gdams par bgyi/_rjes su bstan par bgyi/_yang dag par bstan par bgyi/_yang dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi/_yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyi/_gzud par bgyi zhing gzhug par bgyi lags so/_/bdag 
[\[246a.3\]]cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gdams shing rjes su bstan te/_yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du stsal/_yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyis shing btsud de bzhag pa rnams 
[\[246a.4\]]ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang 
[\[246a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba dang /_ji ltar gnas par mi bya ba dag bshad par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[246a.6\]]pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_kau shi ka de ltar na gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang 
[\[246a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang mig ni mig gis stong /_rna ba dang /_sna 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni yid kyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[246b.2\]]dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong /_chu'i khams dang /_
[\[246b.3\]]me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_chu'i khams dang /_
[\[246b.4\]]me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[246b.5\]]dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong /_de bzhin du 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_
[\[246b.6\]]len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi ni rga shis stong /_ma rig pa 'gag pa ni ma rig pa 'gag pas stong /_de bzhin du 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_
[\[246b.7\]]len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi 'gag pa ni rga shi 'gag pas stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_ma rig pa 'gag pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rga shi'i bar gyi 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rga shi 'gag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes 
[\[247a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[247a.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[247a.4\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/
[\[247a.5\]]kau shi ka gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa 
[\[247a.6\]]nyid gang yin pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye 
[\[247a.7\]]bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na dran pa nye 
[\[247b.2\]]bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[247b.3\]]ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_
[\[247b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /_theg pa chen po ni theg pa chen pos stong /_
[\[247b.5\]]nyan thos ni nyan thos nyid kyis stong /_rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis stong /_sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_nyan thos kyi 
[\[247b.6\]]stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad 
[\[247b.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/_de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[248a.2\]]so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[248a.3\]]gnas par mi bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/mig la gnas par mi bya'o/_/gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o/_/
[\[248a.4\]]mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bya'o/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la gnas par mi bya'o/_/chos rnams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 
[\[248a.5\]]'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/sa'i khams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[248a.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs 
[\[248a.7\]]rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]gnas par mi bya'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi 
[\[248b.2\]]bya'o/_/sangs rgyas nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/kau shi ka de ltar na gzugs zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/de ltar 
[\[248b.3\]]na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba'i bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/gzugs rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du mi rtag 
[\[248b.4\]]ces bya ba dang /_bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[248b.5\]]mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 
[\[248b.6\]]dang /_mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[248b.7\]]mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel 
[\[249a\]]
