[\[269a.3\]]dpag tu med pa'i phyir gzugs dpag tu med do/_/gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med do/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems 
[\[269a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni dpag tu med do/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams 
[\[269a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do/_/nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa 
[\[269a.6\]]yin te/_kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu med pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' 
[\[269a.7\]]yas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[269b.2\]]po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/_gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 
[\[269b.3\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/lha'i 
[\[269b.4\]]dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir 
[\[269b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/lha'i dbang 
[\[269b.6\]]pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/_chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[269b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/lha'i dbang pos smras pa/_
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]btsun pa rab 'byor ci ltar na/_de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_dmigs 
[\[270a.2\]]pa mtha' yas pa yin no/_/dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa yin te/_kau shi ka de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin 
[\[270a.3\]]no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no/_/lha'i dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci ltar na/_sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems 
[\[270a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin snyam/_lha'i dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[270a.5\]]de ni chos kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyang ma yin chos ma yin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyang ma yin te/_'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa'o/_/de ni dngos po med par ming du btags pa'o/_/de ni dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras 
[\[270a.6\]]pa/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'ga' yang sems can du yongs su brjod pa yod snyam 'am/_lha'i dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gang la 'ga' yang sems can du yongs su 
[\[270a.7\]]brjod pa med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa ci zhig yod/_kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/_sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]sems/_de la sems can 'ga' yang skyes pa'am/_'gags pa yod snyama'am/_lha'i dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka rnam grangs des 
[\[270b.2\]]na/_sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_mtha' yas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_
[\[270b.3\]]tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med rnams dang /_drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/_gnas brtan rab 'byor 
[\[270b.4\]]gyis gang bshad pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i chos 'di ni a la la legs par bshad pa'o/_/a la la chos 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o/_/a la la chos kyi chos nyid 'di ni legs par bshad pa'o zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum 
[\[270b.5\]]ched du brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral ba de dag ni bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/_/gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams 
[\[270b.6\]]sam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyang /_theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po dag rnam par dgod pa yang mdzad do zhes kyang gsol to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[270b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]gang yang dmigs su med kyang theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po dag rnam par dgod pa yang mdzad do/_/lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[271a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po 
[\[271a.3\]]dag rgya cher bstan cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[271a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang de bzhin 
[\[271a.5\]]gshegs pa dmigs su med/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[271a.6\]]rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med la/_lha'i bu dag 
[\[271a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chos de dag la slob cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la yang slob par byed pa'i phyir te/_lha'i bu dag de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod par bya ba yin no/_/lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi thad na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor pad 
[\[271b.2\]]ma can zhes bya ba'i tshong dus kyi dbus na 'dug cing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[271b.3\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/_nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang bral bar ma gyur/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[271b.4\]]dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_
[\[271b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang yang 
[\[271b.6\]]bral bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/_lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 
[\[271b.7\]]nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[272a.2\]]pa 'di ni gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin/_mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin/_mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin/_
[\[272a.3\]]mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_
[\[272a.4\]]dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams 'dus te/_'dug par thugs su chud nas de dag thams cad dpang 
[\[272a.5\]]por bzhag ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_lha'i 
[\[272a.6\]]bu'am/_lha'i bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_sgom pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[272a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyis glags mi rnyed cing /_mtshan ma med pa la yang mtshan ma med pas glags mi 
[\[272b.2\]]rnyed la/_smon pa med pa la yang smon pa med pas glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar stong pa 
[\[272b.3\]]nyid la stong pa nyid kyis glags mi rnyed cing /_mtshan ma med pa la yang mtshan ma med pas glags mi rnyed la/_smon pa med pa la yang smon pa med pas glags mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur 
[\[272b.4\]]ba dang /_gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems 
[\[272b.5\]]can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms shing /_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/_gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[272b.6\]]'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can thams cad la yang dag par yongs su spyad pa dag gis bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i rgyal chen 
[\[272b.7\]]bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]rgyas rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams dang /_lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang /_ma bzung ba dang /_ma bcangs pa dang /_kun 
[\[273a.2\]]chub par ma byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_tshul 
[\[273a.3\]]bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems 
[\[273a.4\]]dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur na/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung /_bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung /_lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/_'jigs pa'am/_bag tsha bar 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 
[\[273a.5\]]'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shin tu bsgoms shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin tu bsgoms la/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang shin tu 
[\[273a.6\]]bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 
[\[273a.7\]]dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la mos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[273b.2\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams dang /_lha dbul po rnams dang /_mi dbul po rnams 
[\[273b.3\]]dang /_yams kyi bro nad rnams dang /_bro nad 'go ba rnams dang /_gnod pa dang /_'tshe ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang /_bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[273b.4\]]dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[273b.5\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[273b.6\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs 
[\[273b.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs dag 
[\[274a.2\]]'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu dag 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas rgyun du 
[\[274a.3\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_dgra bcom pa 'jig 
[\[274a.4\]]rten na mchis lags so/_/rang byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'jig rten na 
[\[274a.5\]]mchis lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs lags so/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'jig rten na bzhugs lags so/_/chos dkon 
[\[274a.6\]]mchog 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/dge 'dun dkon mchog 'jig rten na mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba 
[\[274a.7\]]bar bgyi ba lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bar du 'jig rten na yod pa yin no/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 
[\[274b.2\]]'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rgyun mi 'chad par bkur stir bya/_bla mar bya/_rjed par bya/_mchod par bya zhing /_bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya'o/_/kau shi ka gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsti stang du bya ba 
[\[274b.3\]]dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar sems pa de dag ni nga la bsti stang du bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar sems pa yin te/_kau shi ka de lta bas na/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[274b.4\]]rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_rjed par bya/_mchod par bya zhing /_bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya'o/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos dang /_
[\[274b.5\]]rang sangs rgyas sha stag gis/_'di lta ste dper na/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/_'bras kyi zhing ngam/_til gyi zhing ltar yongs su gang bar gyur nas de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la 
[\[274b.6\]]zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_rjed par byas/_mchod par byas pa bas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba gcig cig la bsti 
[\[274b.7\]]stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_rjed par byas/_mchod par byas na/_de nyid snga ma bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa ma yin gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[275a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_
[\[275a.3\]]rjed par bya/_mchod par bya zhing /_bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_brgya byin gyi le'u gnyis pa ste/_nyi shu rtsa lnga pa//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po nyi shu 
[\[275a.4\]]rtsa gcig pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ngam/_bcangs sam/_klags sam/_kun chub par 
[\[275a.5\]]bgyis sam/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/_tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur 
[\[275a.6\]]bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsti stang du bgyi ba dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_rjed par bgyi ba dang /_mchod par bgyid par 'tshal na yang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 
[\[275a.7\]]gis de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar mchis shing chos nyan par bgyid pa dang /_de dag gi chos de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bskyud par mi 'gyur 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]ba dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_ming phun sum tshogs pa dang /_tshe rabs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'od phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mig phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dbyangs 
[\[275b.2\]]phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul nas gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 
[\[275b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams su mchi zhing der mchis nas kyang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[275b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/_nang stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/_bsam gtan rnams kyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs 
[\[275b.5\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[275b.6\]]lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rjod par bgyid/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar gyi bsngags pa rjod par bgyid cing /_
[\[275b.7\]]thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen pos 'dul la/_chos ston par bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung bas/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[276a.2\]]thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /_rgyun du 
[\[276a.3\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bcom 
[\[276a.4\]]ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[276a.5\]]kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung bas/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur 
[\[276a.6\]]ba yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngam/_bcangs sam/_blags sam/_kun chub par byas sam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byas na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gang dag thob 
[\[276a.7\]]par 'gyur ba de dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]stsal to/_/kau shi ka gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu'am/_bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha'am/_gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gang la la dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'thab par 'dod/_rtsod par 
[\[276b.2\]]'dod/_dbral bar 'dod/_'gal bar bya bar 'dod kyang de dag gi 'thab par 'dod pa dang /_rtsod par 'dod pa dang /_dbral bar 'dod pa dang /_'gal bar bya bar 'dod pa de dag myur ba nyid du med par 'gyur zhing /_'thab par 'dod pa dang /_rtsod par 'dod pa dang /_dbral 
[\[276b.3\]]bar 'dod pa dang /_'gal bar bya bar 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yun ring por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[276b.4\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'bral ba dang /_'gal 
[\[276b.5\]]bar byed par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/_sems can rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /_gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can 
[\[276b.6\]]du gyur pa'i phyi dang /_nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/_sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /_gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'thab mo dang /_'thab pa 
[\[276b.7\]]dang /_rtsod par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/_sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /_gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas le lo can du gyur pa'i phyi 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/_sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /_gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas rgyun du sems rnam par g.yengs 
[\[277a.2\]]par gyur pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/_sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa dang /_gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams yun ring po nas 'chal ba'i shes rab can du gyur 
[\[277a.3\]]pa'i phyi dang nang gi chos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par yongs su btang ste/_sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod cing /_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang /_kau shi ka gang dag gi ched du sems can rnams 'di lta ste/_
[\[277a.4\]]rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang /_kun nas dkris pas yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang kun nas dkris pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thabs la mkhas pas rnam par bsal 
[\[277a.5\]]nas bsam gtan bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams 
[\[277a.6\]]dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bkod cing yang dag 
[\[277a.7\]]par 'dzin du bcug_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la bkod cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la bkod cing yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_tshe 'di'i yon tan de 
[\[277b.2\]]lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur la/_tshe phyi ma la yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can rnams smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du bkod cing /_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[277b.3\]]dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phyi ma la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yon tan dang /_phan yon yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang sa phyogs gang du rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[277b.4\]]gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i sa phyogs der ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/_gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams sam/_gang zag lhag pa'i nga 
[\[277b.5\]]rgyal can rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brgal ba dang /_brtsad pa dang /_'gal ba bya ba dang /_gzhig par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par dkrugs par mi nus la/_de'i steng du de dag la yon tan dang /_phan yon 'di lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gang 
[\[277b.6\]]dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis nges par 'byung zhing sdug bsngal mthar byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhig yod de/_der srog chags skye ba po 
[\[277b.7\]]sbrul gdug pa bkres pas zin cing /_kha zas tshol ba zhig gis srog chags kyi rigs 'ga' zhig mthong bar gyur nas/_des srog chags kyi rigs de bza' bar 'dod nas srog chags kyi rigs de'i phyi bzhin bsnyags pa dang /_de nas srog chags kyi rigs de 'chi bas 'jigs 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]shing skrag nas/_rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba ga la ba der bros pa dang /_sbrul gdug pa des/_rtsi de'i dri tshor nas phyir ldog par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rtsi de'i sman gyi yon tan gyis sbrul gdug pa de'i dug gang yin pa de zil gyis non pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba 
[\[278a.2\]]de ni de ltar mthu dang ldan pa yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/_kau shi ka der 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gal bar 
[\[278a.3\]]byed pa dag 'byung bar gyur kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthus de dag myur du nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhing med par 'gyur te/_gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du med par 'gyur te/_rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi 
[\[278a.4\]]ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing /_rnam par 'phel bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gang dag nye bar zhi bar byed cing /_rnam par 'phel bar mi byed ce na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[278a.5\]]dang /_gti mug dang /_ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[278a.6\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di nye bar zhi bar byed cing rnam par 'phel bar mi byed pa yin no/_/sgrib pa dang /_bar du gcod pa dang /_rjes su chags pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_kun nas dkris pa dang /_
[\[278a.7\]]bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i bar du lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_yod par lta ba dang /_med par lta ba dang /_lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi bar dag 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]dang /_ser sna dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_gnod sems dang /_le lo dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab dang /_rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_sdug par 'du shes pa dang /_sred 
[\[278b.2\]]pa la spyod pa rnams dang /_gzugs su 'dzin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par 'dzin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'dzin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[278b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dzin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag par 'dzin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 
[\[278b.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par 'dzin pa dang /_thams cad 
[\[278b.5\]]shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du 'dzin pa dag nye bar zhi bar byed cing rnam par 'phel bar mi byed pa yin no/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes 
[\[278b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal po chen po rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_
[\[278b.7\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin rnams dang /_tshangs pa rnams dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing 
[\[279a.2\]]gzhes pa de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar de dag gi mi dge ba'i chos rnams ni yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i chos rnams ni rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[279a.3\]]phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_yongs su nyams 
[\[279a.4\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[279a.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 
[\[279a.6\]]'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs 
[\[279a.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshig btsun par 'gyur/_tshig ran par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]tshig 'chal par mi 'gyur ro/_/khro bas zil gyis non par mi 'gyur/_nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur/_ser snas zil gyis non par mi 'gyur zhing /_phrag dog can du mi 'gyur ro/_/de bdag kyang srog gcod pa spong bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag 
[\[279b.2\]]par 'dzin du 'jug cing srog gcod pa spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang ma byin par len pa spong bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang ma byin par len pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[279b.3\]]'jug cing /_ma byin par len pa spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag ma byin par len pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong 
[\[279b.4\]]ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong bar byed la/_gzhan dag 
[\[279b.5\]]kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bdag kyang phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa smra 
[\[279b.6\]]ba spong bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang tshig kyal pa smra ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_tshig kyal pa smra ba spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag tshig kyal pa smra ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang brnab 
[\[279b.7\]]sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spong bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang log par lta ba spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_log par lta ba spong ba'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag log par lta ba spong bar byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag sbyin 
[\[280a.2\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[280a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang 
[\[280a.4\]]rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang nang stong pa nyid sgom par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang nang stong pa nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_nang stong pa nyid kyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag nang stong pa nyid sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' 
[\[280a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bdag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag sgom par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_
[\[280a.6\]]gzhan gang dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 
[\[280a.7\]]'dzin du 'jug cing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang gzungs thob par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]gzungs thob pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_gzungs thob pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag gzungs thob pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la/_gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan 
[\[280b.2\]]dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang 
[\[280b.3\]]bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang 
[\[280b.4\]]dag bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_byams pa'i ting nge 
[\[280b.5\]]'dzin gyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang snying rje dang /_dga' 
[\[280b.6\]]ba dang /_btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang nam mkha' 
[\[280b.7\]]mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug par byed/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]par 'jug pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom par 
[\[281a.2\]]byed la/_gzhan dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[281a.3\]]ro/_/de bzhin du bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 
[\[281a.4\]]pa sgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[281a.5\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i bsngags pa 
[\[281a.6\]]yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la 
[\[281a.7\]]snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug par byed la/_bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la snyoms par 'jug par byed/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid la 
[\[281b.2\]]snyoms par 'jug par byed/_bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_gzhan gang dag rnam pa thams 
[\[281b.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa yang rjod cing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/_sbyin pa gang sbyin pa de thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing mi dmigs 
[\[281b.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims gang bsrung ba dang /_bzod pa gang sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_shes rab gang sgom pa de dag thams cad 
[\[281b.5\]]sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni dran pa 'di lta bu skye bar 'gyur te/_gal te bdag gis sbyin pa 
[\[281b.6\]]ma btang na/_dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_bdag sems can yongs su smin par byed par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang mi 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems so/_/de 'di 
[\[281b.7\]]snyam du gal te bdag gis tshul khrims ma bsrungs na bdag ngan song gsum gyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mir skye bar mi 'gyur te/_bdag sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang mi 'gyur na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]pa nyid thob par lta ga la 'gyur snyam du sems so/_/de 'di snyam du gal te bdag gis bzod pa ma bsgoms na/_bdag gi dbang po rnams nyams par 'gyur zhing /_bdag gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor mog mog por 'gyur te/_bdag gzugs phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[282a.2\]]gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par mi 'gyur/_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa ma thob par sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[282a.3\]]smin par byed par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang mi 'gyur na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par lta ga la 'gyur snyam du sems so/_/de 'di snyam du gal te/_bdag le lo can du gyur te/_brtson 'grus ma brtsams na/_byang chub 
[\[282a.4\]]sems dpa'i lam 'di la yang sgom par mi 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed par lta ji ltar 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par lta ga la 'gyur snyam du sems so/_/de 'di snyam du bdag sems rnam par g.yengs par gyur na/_
[\[282a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/_slob par yang mi 'gyur la/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang mi 'gyur na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par lta ga la 'gyur snyam du sems 
[\[282a.6\]]so/_/de 'di snyam du gal te bdag 'chal pa'i shes rab can du gyur na/_shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa 'di la yang slob par mi 'gyur zhing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las shin tu 'das nas/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang mi 'gyur/_sangs 
[\[282a.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang mi 'gyur na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur snyam du sems shing /_de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_gang bdag gis ser sna'i dbang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]bya ba dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_gnod sems kyi dbang gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_le lo'i dbang gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam par g.yengs pa'i dbang gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[282b.2\]]'chal pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba de ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[282b.3\]]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems so/_/kau shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[282b.4\]]'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba de dag gis ni tshe 'di dang /_tshe phyi ma'i yon tan dang /_phan yon de lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[282b.5\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su 'dul ba dang /_khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa ni 
[\[282b.6\]]ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su 'dul ba dang /_khengs pa med par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[282b.7\]]'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar bgyid pa'i tshe/_thabs la mi mkhas pas de 'di snyam du/_bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_bkren 
[\[283a.2\]]pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_'dron po dang /_slongs mo pa rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar bgyid pa'o snyam du sems na/_de sbyin pa des khengs par 'gyur lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims bsrung ba ni thabs la mi mkhas pas/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni 
[\[283a.3\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam du sems na de tshul khrims des khengs par 'gyur lags so/_/de bzhin du thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[283a.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o snyam du sems na/_de 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des khengs par 'gyur lags so/_/de 'jig rten pa'i 
[\[283a.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa na/_thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa'o/_/bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[283a.6\]]dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa'o/_/bdag ni stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'o/_/bdag ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom pa'o/_/bdag ni stobs bcu dang /_mi 
[\[283a.7\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad sgom pa'o/_/bdag ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro snyam du sems na/_de ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa des khengs par 'gyur lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 
[\[283b.2\]]'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa lags pas/_de dag la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su 'dul ba dang /_khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[283b.3\]]chos rnams la spyod pa ni sbyin pa gtong ba na sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/_sbyin par bgyi ba yang mi dmigs/_len pa po yang mi dmigs lags te/_de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /_khengs pa ma mchis 
[\[283b.4\]]par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba dang /_bzod pa sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan sgom pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa na/_shes rab kyang mi dmigs/_shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_
[\[283b.5\]]chos rnams kyang mi dmigs lags so/_/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[283b.6\]]yang mi dmigs/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad sgom pa yang mi dmigs/_de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po sgom pa yang mi dmigs/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[283b.7\]]nyid kyi bar du sgom pa yang mi dmigs lags pas/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /_khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las yongs su bzung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 
[\[284a.2\]]'di 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kha ton du byed dam/_ston par byed dam/_'don tam/_'thun par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa gang la la zhig g.yul ngo'i gdong la song ste/_g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs sam/_'jug gam/_'gro'am/_'dug gam/_
[\[284a.3\]]'greng bar gyur kyang rung /_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa'am/_'chang ba'am/_klog pa'am/_kha ton du byed pa'am/_ston par byed pa'am/_'don pa'am/_'thun par byed pa'am/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la 
[\[284a.4\]]mda' 'am/_dbyig pa'am/_shing ngam/_bong ba'am/_mtshon cha gang gis 'phangs par gyur kyang /_de'i lus la mtshon cha de dag gis phog par 'gyur ba ni gnas med cing skabs med la/_pha rol gyi gnod pas srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba de'i gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 
[\[284a.5\]]'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des yun ring po nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing /_rang gi 'dod chags kyi mda' rnams dang /_'dod chags kyi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/_gzhan dag gi 'dod chags kyi mda' rnams dang /_'dod chags kyi mtshon rnams kyang 
[\[284a.6\]]nges par bcom/_rang gi zhe sdang gi mda' rnams dang /_gti mug gi mda' rnams dang /_zhe sdang gi mtshon rnams dang /_gti mug gi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/_gzhan dag gi zhe sdang gi mda' rnams dang /_gti mug gi mda' rnams dang /_zhe sdang gi mtshon rnams dang /_gti 
[\[284a.7\]]mug gi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/_rang gi lta bar gyur pa'i mda' rnams dang /_lta bar gyur pa'i mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/_gzhan dag gi lta bar gyur pa'i mda' rnams dang /_lta bar gyur pa'i mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/_rang gi kun nas ldang ba'i 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]mda' rnams dang /_kun nas ldang ba'i mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/_gzhan dag gi kun nas ldang ba'i mda' rnams dang /_kun nas ldang ba'i mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/_rang gi bag la nyal gyi mda' rnams dang /_bag la nyal gyi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom/_
[\[284b.2\]]gzhan dag gi bag la nyal gyi mda' rnams dang /_bag la nyal gyi mtshon rnams kyang nges par bcom pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i lus la mda' 'am/_mtshon gyis 'phangs kyang phog par mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 
[\[284b.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba de la/_gal te la la zhig gis sman ma 
[\[284b.4\]]yin pas gtor tam/_byad byas sam/_me'i 'obs nye bar bsgrubs sam/_mtshon gyis btab bam/_dug blud dam/_chus gtor bar gyur na yang de dag thams cad kyis de la mi tshugs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs 
[\[284b.5\]]sngags chen mo yin la/_kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na med pa yin zhing /_kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/_kau shi ka de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni 
[\[284b.6\]]bdag la yang gnod par bya bar mi sems/_gzhan la yang gnod par bya bar mi sems/_gnyi ga la yang gnod par bya bar mi sems pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des bdag kyang mi dmigs/_gzhan yang mi dmigs/_gnyi ga yang mi dmigs/_gzugs kyang mi 
[\[284b.7\]]dmigs/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang mi dmigs/_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/mi dmigs pas na bdag la gnod pa bya 
[\[285a.2\]]bar yang mi sems/_gzhan la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems/_gnyi ga la yang gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob cing /_sems can thams cad la lta bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[285a.3\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[285a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[285a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te 'chang na/_ma 
[\[285a.6\]]bzung /_ma blags/_kha don du ma byas/_kun chub par ma byas/_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas kyang rung ste/_der mi dang mi ma yin pa glags lta ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 
[\[285a.7\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'og min gyi ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed cing gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'chang ba der lha'i bu 
[\[285b.2\]]de dag 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_rjed par byed/_mchod par byed de/_mchod pa byas nas kyang phyir 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris shing 'chang na yang /_de la tshe 'di'i 
[\[285b.3\]]yon tan dang /_phan yon de lta bu de dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris nas/_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kha don du byed pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag lta la smos kyang ci dgos/_kau 
[\[285b.4\]]shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_mir gyur pa'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags gang la la zhig_/byang chub kyi snying po'am/_byang chub kyi snying po'i nyen 'khor tam/_byang chub kyi snying po'i nang du song na/_de la mi 'am/_mi ma yin pas rnam par gtse ba'am/_tho btsam par mi nus 
[\[285b.5\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang der bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_da ltar byung ba dang /_ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[285b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang der bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa dang /_
[\[285b.7\]]khon med pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_gcugs med pa la bkod de 'jigs pa med pa dang /_khon med pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_gcugs med pa la bkod nas kyang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag lha dang /_mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag la bkod cing /_rgyun du 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi 
[\[286a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs de sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur par byas pas na me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod par 'os 
[\[286a.3\]]pa dang /_ri mo bya bar 'os pa dang /_bsti stang du bya bar 'os shing /_phyag bya bar 'os pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 
[\[286a.4\]]zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te/_bcangs la de la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang 
[\[286a.5\]]du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod par bgyid pa dang /_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod rten du stsal te/_stsal nas kyang yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang la/_
[\[286a.6\]]de la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod par bgyid na/_de las gang bsod nams ches 
[\[286a.7\]]mang du skyed par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de'i phyir/_de khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lam gang la bslabs nas/_
[\[286b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing /_sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa yin snyama'am/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[286b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing sku 'di lta bu 
[\[286b.4\]]mngon par grub lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[286b.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing /_sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa yin no/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na sku 'di lta bu brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[286b.6\]]brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin te/_kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin la/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lus 'di lta bu brnyes pa yang shes 
[\[286b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin pas/_des ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa yin no/_/gzhi de la brten nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par grags pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]grags pa de las sangs rgyas yod par grags pa yin/_chos yod par grags pa yin/_dge 'dun yod par grags pa yin no/_/de ltar na sku brnyes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gzhir gyur pa yin te/_gzhir gyur pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi mchod 
[\[287a.2\]]rten du gyur cing phyag bya bar 'os pa dang /_ri mo bya bar 'os pa dang /_mchod par bya bar 'os pa dang /_bsti stang bya bar 'os pa dang /_bla mar bya bar 'os pa dang /_gsol bar 'os pa yin zhing /_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sku gdung de dag la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de lta 
[\[287a.3\]]bas na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te/_glegs bam du byas shing /_gus par bcangs la/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[287a.4\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan dag dang /_mchod pa sna tshogs kyis bsti stang du byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa dang /_rjed par byed pa dang /_gsol bar byed pa nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar 
[\[287a.5\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la mchod pa byas par gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris shing /_glegs bam du byas te/_bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_
[\[287a.6\]]ri mor byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_gsol bar byed na/_de nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang 'di las nges par byung ba 
[\[287a.7\]]dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang 'di las nges 
[\[287b.2\]]par byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_byams 
[\[287b.3\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po yang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i 
[\[287b.4\]]bu rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[287b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las nges par byung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[287b.6\]]tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug 
[\[287b.7\]]pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du mi bgyid/_bla mar mi bgyid/_ri mor mi bgyid/_mchod par mi bgyid/_rjed par mi bgyid/_gsol bar mi bgyid pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyis 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]na/_de ltar mthu che ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyis na/_de ltar phan yon che bar ma 'tshal lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[288a.2\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang dag chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas la nem nur med pa dang /_gang dag chos dang /_dge 'dun la nem nur med pa dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas la 
[\[288a.3\]]shin tu rton pa dang /_gang dag chos dang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa gang ji snyed cig yod snyama'am/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas 
[\[288a.4\]]la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang dag chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /_gang dag chos dang dge 'dun la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang /_gang dag chos 
[\[288a.5\]]dang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa ni nyung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las/_gang dag sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang 
[\[288a.6\]]gang dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bsten pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims bsgom pa la shin tu brtson pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag rnam par 
[\[288a.7\]]thar pa'i sgo gsum bsgom pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bzhin du gang dag so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_mngon par 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]shes pa drug bsgom pa yang ches nyung ngo /_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams las gang dag gis kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba 
[\[288b.2\]]lnga spangs pas/_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_gong ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa thob pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams las gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 
[\[288b.3\]]rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams las gang dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang dag bla na med pa yang 
[\[288b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i bar dag ni shin tu nyung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_de bas kyang gang dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag 'khor 
[\[288b.5\]]ba na 'khor bas/_sangs rgyas ma mthong /_chos ma thos/_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas/_sbyin pa ma byin/_tshul khrims ma bsten/_shes rab ma bsgoms shing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[288b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos/_nang stong pa nyid ma thos/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag ma thos/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma thos/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so 
[\[288b.7\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma thos ma bsgoms/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos ma bsgoms pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rgyu des na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams las gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[289a\]]
