[\[289a.1\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i bar dag ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag 
[\[289a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni ches 
[\[289a.3\]]nyung ngo /_/kau shi ka 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa mi mnga' bas/_shar phyogs na sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_de dag las byang chub sems dpa' gcig 
[\[289a.4\]]gam/_gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par zad kyi/_phal cher ni thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis la gnas pa dag mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus 
[\[289a.5\]]zhan pa/_snying stobs chung ba/_dman pa la mos pa/_shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa mi mnga' bas/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs mtshams dag na yang sems can dpag 
[\[289a.6\]]tu med grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_de dag las byang chub sems dpa' gcig gam/_gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par zad kyi/_phal cher ni thabs la mkhas 
[\[289a.7\]]pa dang bral bas/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa dag mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus zhan pa/_snying stobs chung ba/_dman pa la mos pa/_shes rab 'chal pa 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]rnams kyis bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas yang dang yang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/_
[\[289b.2\]]gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_'jug par bya/_yongs su dri bar bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[289b.3\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis kyang bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya'o/_/dge ba'i chos gzhan gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[289b.4\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_
[\[289b.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[289b.6\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po de dag kyang gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya zhing /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa gzhan 
[\[289b.7\]]gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya zhing /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di ltar/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob pa na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[290a.2\]]phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[290a.3\]]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa gzhan dag la yang bslab pa mdzad kyis/_bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa yin no snyam du shes pa'i phyir 
[\[290a.4\]]ro/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[290a.5\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bgyid pa de/_bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[290a.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byed du bcug ste/_byas nas kyang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[290a.7\]]gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed par gyur na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya byin 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa 
[\[290b.2\]]dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_yi ger bris nas me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs 
[\[290b.3\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[290b.4\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa sha stag gis yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos 
[\[290b.5\]]dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_gsol bar byed na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya 
[\[290b.6\]]byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[290b.7\]]'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_yi ger bris nas/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mchod pa sna tshogs dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_gsol bar byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[291a.2\]]mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta yang zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du 
[\[291a.3\]]dpag tshad tsam yod pa sha stag gis yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod 
[\[291a.4\]]par byed/_rjed par byed/_gsol bar byed na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam 'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/
[\[291a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang 
[\[291a.6\]]yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_tha na glegs bam du chud par byas te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti 
[\[291a.7\]]stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_gsol bar byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta yang zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir/_stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa sha stag gis yongs su bkang ste/_bkang nas kyang 
[\[291b.2\]]de dag la lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed/_rjed par byed/_gsol bar byed na/_kau shi ka 
[\[291b.3\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam 'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 
[\[291b.4\]]'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tha na yi ger bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa 
[\[291b.5\]]dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed pa de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyis yongs 
[\[291b.6\]]su bkang ba lta yang zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te mi la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir/_stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa sha stag gis yongs su 
[\[291b.7\]]gang bar byed du bcug ste/_byas nas kyang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing mchod na/_
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyam 'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau 
[\[292a.2\]]shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tha na glegs bam du chud par byas te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag 
[\[292a.3\]]gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing mchod na de nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta'ang zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 
[\[292a.4\]]'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam yod pa sha stag gis yongs su bkang ste/_bkang 
[\[292a.5\]]nas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod rten de dag la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed 
[\[292a.6\]]na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed snyama'am/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 
[\[292a.7\]]de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tha na yi ger bris te glegs bam du byas nas 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed cing /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis de la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing /_mchod na de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[292b.2\]]kyi mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ste mchod pa lta'ang zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag las sems can re res kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[292b.3\]]pa la mchod pa'i phyir/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten dag byed du bcug ste/_de dag la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar 
[\[292b.4\]]byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te/_'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed/_
[\[292b.5\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod par byed na/_de nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[292b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/de de lta lags te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsti stang du bgyis pa dang /_bla mar bgyis pa dang /_ri mor bgyis pa dang /_mchod par bgyis pas ni/_'das 
[\[292b.7\]]pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bgyis pa dang /_bla mar bgyis pa dang /_ri mor bgyis pa dang /_mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]snyed dag gi sems can de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam mchis pa sha stag bgyid du stsal nas/_de dag las bskal pa 'am/_
[\[293a.2\]]bskal pa las lhag par lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phyi ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das/_
[\[293a.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du phyogs bcu re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 
[\[293a.4\]]mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam mchis pa sha stag bgyid du stsal cing /_de dag la bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' 
[\[293a.5\]]dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi 
[\[293a.6\]]ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka mang ngo /_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas/_'dzin par bgyid/_'chang bar bgyid/_klog par bgyid/_kun 
[\[293a.7\]]chub par bgyid/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /_de la yang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_mchod par 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]bgyid pa de ches bsod nams mang du skyed lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i slad du ste/_'di lta ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs 
[\[293b.2\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_sbyin 
[\[293b.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_
[\[293b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_thams cad 
[\[293b.5\]]shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa lags te/_de la 
[\[293b.6\]]bslabs nas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams kyang nges par byung lags so/_/nges par 'byung lags so/_/nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri 
[\[293b.7\]]brgyad stong pa las/_mchod rten gyi le'u zhes bya ste/_nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed kyi steng du/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs 
[\[294a.2\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed pa de dag ni gzhi de las bsod nams mang po tshad med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du med/_dpag tu med pa dag skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de bzhin 
[\[294a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung la/_kau shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_
[\[294a.4\]]mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_mig lnga dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung zhing /_
[\[294a.5\]]kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin/_kau shi ka nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba 
[\[294a.6\]]yin zhing /_kau shi ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka de lta bas na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris shing glegs bam du chud par byas te/_'dzin pa dang /_
[\[294a.7\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_de la yang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/grangs dang /_cha dang /_rgyu dang /_dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi 
[\[294b.2\]]ka ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par 'gyur ba de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog med par mi 'gyur/_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog med par mi 'gyur zhing /_de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi 
[\[294b.3\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar 
[\[294b.4\]]gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_thams 
[\[294b.5\]]cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur la/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_rgyal 
[\[294b.6\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir 
[\[294b.7\]]mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/_grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_
[\[295a.2\]]kun chub par bya'o/_/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gdon par bya/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ngam/_bcangs sam/_blags sam/_kun chub par byas sam/_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[295a.3\]]byas na/_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur/_dge ba'i chos thams cad ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur/_lha ma yin gyi ris rnams ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur/_lha'i ris rnams ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung 
[\[295a.4\]]ngam/_bcangs sam/_blags sam/_kun chub par byas sam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_chos kyi tshul dang /_dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur zhing /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun chad par mi 'gyur la/_grogs po dag pha rol tu 
[\[295a.5\]]phyin pa thams cad kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur la/_byang chub sems 
[\[295a.6\]]dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[295a.7\]]kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig_/kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chongs shig_/klogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams 'di 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]snyam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul sprad par bya'o snyam du sems shing shom pa de'i tshe/_kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid la soms la kha ton du gyis shig dang /_des lha ma yin de dag gi bsam pa de phyir nub par 'gyur zhing /_phyis kyang g.yul sprod pa'i sems 
[\[295b.2\]]skyed par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo gang dag 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe yang de dag gi mdun du khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton gyis shig dang /_gal te de dag gis bdag nyid ngan song du skye bar mthong na yang /_de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pas/_ngan song du skye ba'i 
[\[295b.3\]]sems bskyed pa de nub cing /_lha'i gnas de nyid du phyir skye bar 'gyur te/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa ni de ltar mthu che ba yin no/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/_lha'i bu'am/_lha'i bu mo gang yang rung ba'i rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags par 
[\[295b.4\]]gyur pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[295b.5\]]dang bcas pa gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[295b.6\]]rnams dang /_da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[295b.7\]]par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_nyan thos kyi chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na ma mchis 
[\[296a.2\]]pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 
[\[296a.3\]]rdzogs par bgyi ba'i ched du yang dag par zhugs pa'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo 
[\[296a.4\]]yin no/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na med pa yin no/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten 
[\[296a.5\]]nas gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur 
[\[296a.6\]]ba dang /_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang 
[\[296a.7\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid kyang 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_mig lnga dang mngon par shes pa drug dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong 
[\[296b.2\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[296b.3\]]nyid kyi bar dag 'jig rten na yod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag 'jig rten na yod pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas rtsi dang /_skar ma'i tshogs thams cad yod pa yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du byang 
[\[296b.4\]]chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_dge ba'i spyod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med 
[\[296b.5\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsi dag kyang yod pa yin la/_slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu skar dang /_skar ma dag kyang yod pa yin/_thams cad shes pa nyid kyang yod pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa yin te/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[296b.6\]]'das 'jig rten du mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid sems can rnams la 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ston par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar lha'i 
[\[296b.7\]]theg pa dang /_mi'i theg pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_stong pa 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]nyid thams cad la sgom pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad thob par byed pa dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_
[\[297a.2\]]dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par byed pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du mi byed pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /_rnam pa 
[\[297a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin 
[\[297a.4\]]du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang 
[\[297a.5\]]ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_
[\[297a.6\]]klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_me dang mtshon dang /_chus kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur zhing /_nad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur te/_las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma 
[\[297a.7\]]gtogs so/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyal po'i pho brang nas 'tshe ba zhig byung bar gyur na yang de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na de la glags lta ba de dag gis glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du 'don cing rgyal po'i pho brang der song na/_de la rgyal po'i bu'am/_rgyal po'i blon po sna chen po la gtogs pa dag kyang gsong por smra bar bya'o 
[\[297b.2\]]snyam du sems/_snyan par smra bar bya'o snyam du sems/_dga' bar bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag cing snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar 
[\[297b.3\]]gzhag pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[297b.4\]]kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe phyi ma'i yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_nam du yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/_nam 
[\[297b.5\]]du yang bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[297b.6\]]pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam du yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/_nam du yang 
[\[297b.7\]]dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/_nam du yang yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/_nam du yang dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/_'od ma mkhan gyi khyim rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/_g.yung po'i khyim rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/_dmangs rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /_de de phyin chad kyang rtag 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]par rgyun du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur la/_'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /_nam du yang mngon par shes pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[298a.2\]]de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos nyan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na yang sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[298a.3\]]kau shi ka de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de dag thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar bya ste/_de ni bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[298a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe 'di'i yon tan dang /_tshe phyi ma'i yon tan de dag dang nam du yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[298a.5\]]de nas gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pa can rab tu mang po brgya zhig klan ka btsal ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pa can rab tu mang po brgya 
[\[298a.6\]]po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong gis/_gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag ci nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mi 'dong zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji tsam zhig gzung ba de bdag gis nges par kha ton 
[\[298a.7\]]du bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji tsam zhig gzung ba de kha ton du byas so/_/de nas gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag gis rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/_lam gang nas lhags pa'i lam de nyid nas phyir dong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]bu 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag rgyang ring po nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas gang nas lhags pa'i lam de nyid nas phyir dong zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 
[\[298b.2\]]thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsams te/_des na gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag gis rgyang ring po nyid nas/_nga la bskor ba byas te/_lam gang nas lhags pa de nyid nas phyir dong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[298b.3\]]gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag gi nang na gcig la yang dkar po'i cha yod par ngas ma mthong ngo /_/gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag thams cad ni zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang /_klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pas 'ong bar sems te/_shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la klan ka btsal ba'i 
[\[298b.4\]]bsam pa'am/_zhe 'gras pa'i sems kyis 'ong bar nus pa de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na ngas ma mthong ste/_de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[298b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min man chad kyi lha rnams dang /_nyan thos gang dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gzung 
[\[298b.6\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dang /_phyogs bcu'i bar du phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas 
[\[298b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag spyan snga na 
[\[299a.2\]]'khod cing /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag kyang spyan snga na 'khod pa las na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur du nges kyis/_mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[299a.3\]]'gro bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro bar bsams so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma bdud sdig can 'di ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[299a.4\]]ga la ba der 'gro bar 'dod de/_bdud sdig can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i bkod pa gang yin pa/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yang ma yin/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i bkod pa 'di lta bu ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi yang ma yin/_
[\[299a.5\]]shAkya rnams kyi yang ma yin/_lid tsa bI rnams kyi yang ma yin gyi/_bdud sdig can ni yun ring po nas/_bcom ldan 'das la glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba dang /_sems can yang dag pa la zhugs pa rnams la/_gtse ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin pas/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gang yin pa 'di ni bdud sdig can gyis 
[\[299a.6\]]mngon par sprul pa yin gyis/_bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsam par bya'o/_/dran nas kyang kha ton du bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsams so/_/dran nas kyang kha ton du byas te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji 
[\[299a.7\]]tsam du kha ton byed pa de tsam du/_bdud sdig can lam de nyid dang /_sgo de nyid nas phyir log go/_/de nas 'khor der rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag gis lha'i me tog rnams mngon par sprul nas/_bar snang la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]'das ga la ba de logs su 'dor zhing 'thor bar byed la/_tshig 'di skad ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la gnas pa de srid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas med par mi 'gyur zhing /_dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas 
[\[299b.2\]]par 'gyur la/_dge 'dun yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa'i khyad par yang grags par 'gyur la/_phyogs 
[\[299b.3\]]gang logs na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger bris te/_glegs bam du byas nas 'chang ba'i phyogs de snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur la/_gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de yang mgon yod cing mun pa dang bral bar 'gyur bas na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[299b.4\]]phyin pa 'di 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams yun ring du spyod par gyur cig ces smras so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka phyogs gang dang /_gang gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam na shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[299b.5\]]phyin pa 'di spyod cing glegs bam la bris pa yod pa'i sa phyogs de ni snang bar gyur pa yin te/_sa phyogs de ni mgon yod cing /_mun pa mun nag dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i me tog rnams mngon par sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor te/_tshig 'di skad ces 
[\[299b.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom 
[\[299b.7\]]ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag ni rigs kyi bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_klog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]la bgyid pa de la ston pa lags so snyam du 'dzin lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub 
[\[300a.2\]]par bgyid dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[300a.3\]]tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar dag tu bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ba lags la/_
[\[300a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_de ltar na rnam pa thams 
[\[300a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su dbyer ma mchis shing tha mi dad de/_gcad du ma mchis lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/
[\[300a.6\]]ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gzhan mu stegs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste/_nyi shu 
[\[300a.7\]]rtsa dgu pa'o//_//_//_//
